anya-e0601n:10: Amataṃ amataṃ santaṃ, asamaṃ asamaṃ dadaṃ.
anya-e0601n:11: Saraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ lokaṃ, araṇaṃ araṇaṃ karaṃ;
anya-e0601n:12: Abhayaṃ abhayaṃ ṭhānaṃ, nāyakaṃ nāyakaṃ name.
anya-e0601n:129: Sattappīno ca dīghaṅguli matha sugato lomakūpekalomo,
anya-e0601n:132: Nātho uṇhīsasīso itiguṇasahitaṃ taṃ mahesiṃ namāmi.
anya-e0601n:135: Loke tasmā vibhāvī vividhahitasukhaṃ sādhavo patthayantā.
anya-e0601n:136: Iṭṭhaṃ atthaṃ vahantaṃ suranaramahitaṃ nibbhayaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0601n:137: Lokānaṃ nandivaḍḍhaṃ dasabalamasamaṃ taṃ namassantu niccaṃ.
anya-e0601n:139: Puññenetena sohaṃ nipuṇamati sato samparāye ca titto,
anya-e0601n:141: Tikkho sūro dhitatto saparahitacaro dīghajīvī arogo,
anya-e0601n:142: Dhañño vaṇṇo yasassī atibalavadharo kittimā khantupeto.
anya-e0601n:147: Pāsaṃso pemavāco sujanaguṇavidū māmako so bhaveyyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:168: Vandantānaṃ jinaṃ natvā, dhammaṃ suddhaṃ gaṇuttamaṃ.
anya-e0601n:171: Likhitvā ṭhapitaṃ puñña, buddhiyā tena vandinaṃ.
anya-e0601n:176: Vaṇṇantopi ca tassatthaṃ, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhakathādisu;
anya-e0601n:179: Namanaṃ namatītī vā, namatī tena vā namo;
anya-e0601n:185: Na diṭṭhaṃ katakāraṇaṃ, tasmā hitatthikehi ca;
anya-e0601n:187: Taṃ kāraṇaṃ viññūhī ca, vicāretvā vijānitanti.
anya-e0601n:190: Amataṃ amataṃ santaṃ, asamaṃ asamaṃ dadaṃ.
anya-e0601n:191: Saraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ lokaṃ, araṇaṃ araṇaṃ karaṃ;
anya-e0601n:192: Abhayaṃ abhayaṃ ṭhānaṃ, nāyakaṃ nāyakaṃ name.
anya-e0601n:193_0: 1. [Ka] idāni paṭhamaṃ tāva sugatantyādīhi aṭṭhārasahi guṇehi thometvā buddhassa
anya-e0601n:193_1: vanditukāmena sugatantiādi gāthādvayaṃ āraddhaṃ. Ayaṃ pana sabbapādādiyamakapathyā
anya-e0601n:193_2: vattagāthāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ pana yamakaṃ subodhālaṅkāre kiliṭṭhadosanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:197_0: Ayaṃ panettha patītasaddaracitattāyeva pasādaguṇa saṅkhātena saddālaṅkārena saṃyuttā
anya-e0601n:197_1: hoti. Tasmā taṃ yamakaṃ suvuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ parāsu yamakagāthāsu. Tena vuttaṃ punā laṅkāre –
anya-e0601n:200_0: Tattha sugatanti sobhanagamanattā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā sammā gatattā ca sugato,
anya-e0601n:200_1: so hi sobhanaṃ ariyamaggena gacchatīti sugatoti vuccati, supubbo gamudhātu ta. Susaddo
anya-e0601n:200_2: sobhanattho. Ariyamaggagamanena parisuddhaṃ anavajjaṃ khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti
anya-e0601n:200_3: attho. Tañca gamanaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti kāyagamanaṃ, ñāṇagamanañcāti. Tattha bhagavato
anya-e0601n:200_4: veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhassa nipphāda nato sobhanaṃ kāyena
anya-e0601n:200_5: gamanaṃ kāyagamanaṃ nāma. Sayambhū ñāṇena pana sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena
anya-e0601n:200_6: parijānanato ñāṇena gamanaṃ ñāṇagamanaṃ nāma. Idha pana ñāṇagamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. Aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:200_7: pana “sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato”ti vuttaṃ. Sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:200_8: sugatoti ca vuccati, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena amataṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti attho. Sammā aviparītaṃ
anya-e0601n:200_9: cesa gacchatīti sugatoti vuccati. Susaddo sammāsaddattho. Tena tena maggena ye kilesā
anya-e0601n:200_10: pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti attho. Atha vā sammā āgacchatīti
anya-e0601n:200_11: sugatoti ca vuccati, dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti yāva bodhimaṇḍā tāva samatiṃsapāramipūrikāya
anya-e0601n:200_12: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto sassataṃ ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ
anya-e0601n:200_13: attakilamathañcāti ime cante anupagacchanto āgatoti attho. Taṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ name namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:201_0: Puna sugatanti sammā gadattā sugato. So hi sammā gadati bhāsatīti sugatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:201_1: Supubbagadadhātu bhāsāyaṃ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ vā, ta, dassa to. Chasu vācāsu yuttaṭṭhāne
anya-e0601n:201_2: yuttameva dvivācaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Vuttañhi majjhimapaṇṇāsapāḷiyaṃ abhayarājakumārasutte –
anya-e0601n:203_0: . “Rājakumāra yaṃ tathāgato taṃ vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ, sā
anya-e0601n:203_1: ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, na taṃ tathāgato vācaṃ bhāsati. 2. Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ
anya-e0601n:203_2: jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā. Tampi tathāgato
anya-e0601n:203_3: vācaṃ na bhāsati. 3. Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:203_4: sā ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, tatrakālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāya.
anya-e0601n:203_5: 4. Yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ piyā
anya-e0601n:203_6: manāpā, na taṃ tathāgato vācaṃ bhāsati. 5. Yampi tathāgato jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ
anya-e0601n:203_7: anatthasaṃhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ piyā manāpā, tampi tathāgato vācaṃ na bhāsati. 6.
anya-e0601n:203_8: Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ piyā
anya-e0601n:203_9: manāpā. Tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:204_0: Ettha pāḷiyaṃ panesā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅkhepena veditabbā. Kathaṃ hesā abhūtā anatthasaṃhitā
anya-e0601n:204_1: appiyā vācā ca, bhūtā anatthasaṃhitā appiyā vācā ca, bhūtā attha saṃhitā appiyā vācā
anya-e0601n:204_2: ca, abhūtā anatthasaṃhitā piyā vācā ca, bhūtā anatthasaṃhitā piyā vācā ca, bhūtā
anya-e0601n:204_3: atthasaṃhitā piyā vācā cāti chabbidhā hotīti. Tattha acoraṃyeva coro ayantiādivasena
anya-e0601n:204_4: vattabbavācā paṭhamavācā nāma. Coraṃyeva coro ayantiādivasena vattabbavācā dutiyavācā
anya-e0601n:204_5: nāma. Akatapuññatāya duggato dubbaṇṇo appesakkho, idha pana ṭhatvāpi puna puññaṃ
anya-e0601n:204_6: na karoti, dutiyacittavāre kathaṃ catūhi apāyehi muccissatīti evaṃ mahājanassa atthapurekkhārena
anya-e0601n:204_7: dhammapurekkhārena anusāsanīpurekkhārena vattabbavācā tatiyavācā nāma. Eko dhutto
anya-e0601n:204_8: āha-mayhaṃ bho mātu mayi kucchigate kapiṭṭhaphaladohaḷo ahosi. Sā aññaṃ kapiṭṭhahārakaṃ
anya-e0601n:204_9: alabhamānā maṃyeva pesesi. Ahaṃ gantvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhituṃ asakkonto attanāva attānaṃ
anya-e0601n:204_10: pāde gahetvā muggaraṃ viya rukkhassa upari khipiṃ. Atha sākhato sākhaṃ vicaranto
anya-e0601n:204_11: phalāni gahetvā otarituṃ asakkonto gharaṃ gantvā nisseṇiṃ āharitvā oruyha mātu santike
anya-e0601n:204_12: gantvā phalāni mātuyā adāsiṃ. Tāni pana mahantāni honti cāṭippa māṇāni. Tato me mātarā
anya-e0601n:204_13: ekāsane nisinnāya samasaṭṭhiphalāni khāditānīti. Evamādivasena vattabbavācā catutthavācā
anya-e0601n:204_14: nāma. Āmisahetu cāṭukamyatādivasena nānappakārakaṃ paresaṃ thomanā vācā ceva rājakathaṃ
anya-e0601n:204_15: corakathantiādinayappavattā tiracchānakathā ca pañcamavācā nāma. Ariyasaccasannissitā
anya-e0601n:204_16: dhammakathā chaṭṭhamavācā nāma. Taṃ pana vassasatampi suṇantā paṇḍitā neva tittiṃ
anya-e0601n:204_17: gacchanti. Tāsu pana bhagavā tatiyachaṭṭhamā dvivācāeva bhāsati. Tasmā sappurisehi
anya-e0601n:204_18: sāyeva dvivācā vattabbāti. Ayaṃ tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgato saṅkhepanayo. Visuddhimagga
anya-e0601n:204_19: mahāṭīkāyaṃ pana sāratthadīpanīṭīkāyañca tadaññākārena vaṇṇito. Tāsu pana taṃ oloketvā
anya-e0601n:209_0: Seṭṭhanti guṇamahantattā pasatthataraṃ. So hi pasatthānaṃ visesena pasatthoti seṭṭhoti
anya-e0601n:209_1: vuccati. Pasatthapadaṃ, visesataddhite iṭṭhapaccayo. Pasatthasaddassa so, pasatthānaṃ
anya-e0601n:209_2: paccekabuddhāriyasāvakādīnaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādi guṇehi visesena pasatthoti attho.
anya-e0601n:209_3: Atha vā sundare satipaṭṭhānādibhede dhamme esati gavesati esiṃ gavesinti vā seṭṭho,
anya-e0601n:209_4: buddho. Supubboesa gavesane ta. Tassa raṭṭho. Susaddo sundarattho. Santehi sappurisehi
anya-e0601n:209_5: esitabbo gavesitabboti vā seṭṭho. Santasaddūpapado isa gavesane ta, santasaddassa
anya-e0601n:209_6: so, ikārasse, tassa ṭṭho. Santehi sappurisehi icchiyati kantiya tīti vā seṭṭho. Santasaddūpapado
anya-e0601n:209_7: isu icchākantīsu ta. Atha vā santānaṃ sappurisānaṃ hitasukhaṃ icchatīti seṭṭho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:209_8: Kattusādhanoyaṃ. Sundare satipaṭṭhānā dibhede dhamme eseti buddhetīti vā seṭṭho.
anya-e0601n:209_9: Hetu kattusādhanoyaṃ. Supubbaesadhātu buddhiyaṃ ta. Taṃ seṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:210_0: Kusalaṃkusalaṃ jahanti ettha kusalaṃ akusalaṃ jahanti padavibhāgo kātabbo. Kucchitaṃ
anya-e0601n:210_1: pāpadhammaṃ salayati calayati kampeti viddhaṃsetīti kusalaṃ, catubhūmikakusalaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0601n:210_2: Kupubbo saladhātu a. Tattha kāmāvacarakusalaṃ tadaṅgappahānena pāpadhammaṃ salayati
anya-e0601n:210_3: calayati, mahaggata kusalaṃ vikkhambhanappahānena salayati kampeti, lokuttara kusalaṃ
anya-e0601n:211_0: Atha vā kucchitaṃ apāyadvāraṃ salanti saṃvaranti pidahanti sādhavo etenāti kusalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:211_1: karaṇasādhanoyaṃ. Idha pana jahanti vuttattā tebhūmakakusalamevādhippetaṃ. Taṃ pana
anya-e0601n:211_3: vā, yonisomanasikāra padaṭṭhānaṃ. Na kusalaṃ akusalaṃ, mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya
anya-e0601n:211_4: pahāyakapahātabbabhāvena kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho. Taṃ pana sāvajjadukkhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:211_7: apuññābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ akusalañca kusalaṃkusalaṃ. Taṃ pana padaṃ jahantipade kammaṃ.
anya-e0601n:212_0: Jahanti maggakkhaṇe samucchedappahānena phalakkhaṇe paṭippassambhanappahānena pajahantaṃ
anya-e0601n:212_1: viddhaṃsentanti attho. Tañhi arahattamaggañāṇena jahati pajahati, phalañāṇena jahiṃ
anya-e0601n:212_2: pajahiṃ paṭippassambhinti vā jaho, buddho. Hādhātu cāge a. Kiñcāpi panettha kusalaṃ
anya-e0601n:212_3: maggena pahātabbadhamme na vuttaṃ, vaṭṭamūlabhūte avijjātaṇhādikilese pana arahattamagga
anya-e0601n:212_4: ñāṇena jahite lokiyakusaluppattiyā mūlabhūtāya avijjātaṇhāya abhāvā puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0601n:212_5: saṃsāre puna paṭisandhiyā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā vaṭṭamūlabhūte kilese jahite
anya-e0601n:212_6: phalūpacārena kusalampi jahitaṃ nāma hoti. Rūpaṃ bhikkhave na tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahathātiādīsu
anya-e0601n:212_7: viya. Arahantena hi abhisamācārikavattaṃ katampi kusalanti na vuttaṃ, kriyāti pana
anya-e0601n:213: Vuttañhi nidānavaggasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “khīṇāsavena hi kataṃ kammaṃ neva kusalaṃ hoti nākusalaṃ, avipākaṃ hutvā kriyamatte tiṭṭhatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:214: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca “arahattamaggo ca kusalākusala kammakkhayāya saṃvattatīti evaṃ tena taṃ bhijjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:215_1: ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti
anya-e0601n:216_0: Amatanti maraṇavirahitaṃ. So jino hi na mato amato, maraṇadhammassa nibbattakānaṃ
anya-e0601n:216_1: kilesānaṃ arahatta maggena samucchinditattā puna maraṇato virahitoti vā amato. Atha
anya-e0601n:216_2: vā nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasena adhigate natthi mataṃ maraṇaṃ yassa jinassāti amatoti
anya-e0601n:216_3: vuccati. Jinena hi khandhamaccumāraṃ ajitopi kilesamāraṃ jayitvā tesaṃ avassaṃ jiyamānattā
anya-e0601n:217_0: Puna amatanti amatanibbānasamannāgataṃ. Natthi mataṃ maraṇaṃ etthāti amataṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:217_1: Taṃ pana santilakkhaṇaṃ, accutarasaṃ, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, nissaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:217_2: vā, nibbānassa pana padaṭṭhānaṃ na labbhati.
anya-e0601n:218: Vuttañhi milindapañhe nāgasenattherena “na kenaci kāraṇena nibbānaṃ uppajjatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:219_0: Taṃ assa atthīti amato, jino. Saddhādito ṇāti suttena assathyatthe ṇapaccayo. Saddho
anya-e0601n:219_1: paññotiādīsu viya. Assa jinassa catumaggañāṇena sacchikataṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ atthīti attho, taṃ amataṃ.
anya-e0601n:220_0: Santanti sabbakilesadarathehi ca vaṭṭadukkhehi ca suvūpasantaṃ. So hi buddho sabbakilesadarathavaṭṭadukkhehi
anya-e0601n:220_1: samittha vūpasamitthāti santoti vuccati. Samudhātu upasame ta. Dhātvantassa lopaṃ
anya-e0601n:220_2: tapaccayassantoādesaṃ katvā padasiddhi veditabbā. Saṃsāravaṭṭe darathakārakānaṃ kilesānaṃ
anya-e0601n:220_3: bodhimaṇḍe arahattamaggañāṇena samucchinditattā sītibhūto santakāyacittoti vuttaṃ hoti, taṃ santaṃ.
anya-e0601n:221_0: Asamanti sīlādiguṇehi kenaci puggalena asadisaṃ, so hi buddho natthi sīlādiguṇehi
anya-e0601n:221_1: samo sadiso etassāti asamoti vuccati. Imasmiṃ sattaloke sīla samādhipaññādiguṇehi
anya-e0601n:221_2: buddhena sadiso koci manusso vā devo vā brahmā vā natthīti attho. Bhagavato hi asīti
anya-e0601n:221_3: anubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍita bāttiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi vicitrarūpakāyo ca sabbākārehi
anya-e0601n:221_5: iddhimahattayasamahattapaññāmahattādiguṇehi ca paramukkaṃsagato ca atthi, tasmā bhagavā
anya-e0601n:221_6: sīlādiguṇehi kenaci asamo asadisoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:222_0: Asamaṃ dadanti lokiyadhammena asadisaṃ maggaphalanibbāna dhammaṃ veneyyānaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:222_1: desanāñāṇena dāyakaṃ. Ettha ca asamanti natthi ettha etesaṃ vā samo sadiso lokiyadhammoti
anya-e0601n:222_2: asamo, maggaphalanibbānaṃ labbhati. Atha vā asamanti aññesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggabhāvato
anya-e0601n:222_3: catubbidhena ariya maggena sacchikātabbaṃ nibbānaṃ vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0601n:222_4: “yāvatā bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:222_5: Tassa pana padassa dadantipadena kammabhāvena sambandho. Dadātīti dado, buddho. Dādhātu
anya-e0601n:222_6: a, so kenaci lokiyadhammena asamaṃ asadisaṃ maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:223_0: (Kha) dutiyagāthāyaṃ pana saraṇanti sabbasattalokassa paṭisaraṇabhūto parāyaṇo leṇo
anya-e0601n:223_1: tāṇoti vuttaṃ hoti. So hi buddho saranti paṭisaranti ettha sattalokāti saraṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:223_2: Saradhātu yu. Atha vā saranti osaranti samosaranti ettha sattalokāti saraṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:223_3: Saranti cintenti ettha saddhā pasannā devamanussā saraṇamidanti saraṇoti ca. Saranti
anya-e0601n:223_4: paṭivijjhanti etthupagatā devamanussā saddhammanti saraṇoti ca vuccati. Sara cintāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:223_5: yu. Saraṇagamanaṭṭhāne pana sarati hiṃsati bhayaṃ santāpaṃ dukkhaṃ kilesañcāti saraṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:223_6: Ratanatta yanti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Taṃ saraṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:224_0: Puna saraṇaṃ lokanti sattasaṅkhārokāsasaṅkhataṃ lokaṃ sarantaṃ jānantaṃ. Ettha hi
anya-e0601n:224_1: lokayati patiṭṭhayati ettha puññāpuññañca tabbipāko cāti loko, satta loko labbhati.
anya-e0601n:224_2: Lokadhātu patiṭṭhāyaṃ ṇa. Lujjati palujjatīti loko, saṅkhāraloko. Lujadhātuṇa. Lokiyati
anya-e0601n:224_3: vicittākārena dissatīti loko, lokiyanti patiṭṭhiyanti ettha vā jaṅgamā ca thāvarā
anya-e0601n:224_4: cāti loko, cakkavāḷasaṅkhato okāsaloko labbhati. Lokadhātuṇa. Ettha ca sassato lokoti
anya-e0601n:224_5: vā asassato lokoti vāti āgataṭṭhāne indriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ samūho
anya-e0601n:224_6: santāno ca sattoyeva loko sattalokoti vacanatthena sattalokoti veditabbo. Eko loko
anya-e0601n:224_7: sabbe sattā āhā raṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne indriyabaddhānaṃ vā anindriyabaddhānaṃ vā
anya-e0601n:224_8: khandhānaṃ samūho santāno ca paccayehi saṅkhariyantīti saṅkhārā, saṅkhārāeva loko
anya-e0601n:229_0: Āgataṭṭhāne anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ samūho santāno ca avakasanti patiṭṭhahanti
anya-e0601n:229_1: etthāti okāso, soyeva loko okāsalokoti vacanatthena okāsa lokoti veditabbo, taṃ lokaṃ.
anya-e0601n:229_2: Sarati jānāti ajānīti vā saraṇo, buddho. Sara cintāyaṃ yu. Lokaṃ saraṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:229_3: Buddho pana sattalokaṃ, saṅkhāralokaṃ, okāsalokaṃ, kilesalokaṃ, bhavalokaṃ, indriya
anya-e0601n:229_4: lokaṃ, khandhalokaṃ, āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokañcātiādimanekalokaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇena paṭivijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:230_0: Araṇanti nikkilesaṃ, kilesasaṅkhātaraṇavirahitaṃ vā. Raṇasaddo ca kilesesu ca yuddhe
anya-e0601n:230_1: cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe ca dissati. Tathā hi saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammātiādīsu kilesesu
anya-e0601n:230_2: dissati. Te hi raṇanti kandanti sattā etehīti raṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:233_0: Asadisajātake yuddhe dissati. Raṇaṃ katvāti hi yuddhaṃ katvā, saṃyamanti saṃyataṃ
anya-e0601n:233_1: isipabbajjaṃ ajjhupāgamīti attho. Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca raṇaṃ karonto, dhāviṃsu te aṭṭhadisā
anya-e0601n:233_2: samantatoti chaddantajātake cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe dissati. Raṇaṃ karontoti hi cuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:233_3: vicuṇṇaṃ karonto. Teti sabbe aṭṭhasahassanāgāti attho. Idha pana kilese daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:233_4: Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Raṇanti satte rāgādayo cuṇṇenti pīḷentīti raṇā, raṇanti
anya-e0601n:233_5: sattā etehi kandanti paridevantīti vā raṇā, kilesā. Raṇadhātu sadde a. Natthi raṇā
anya-e0601n:233_6: kilesā etassāti araṇoti vuccati. Jinassa kilesamārassa bodhimūle jiyamānattā raṇā
anya-e0601n:233_7: kilesā na santīti attho. Taṃ araṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:234_0: Araṇaṃ karanti veneyyasantāne raṇasaṅkhatakilesassa abhāvakaraṇaṃ. Ettha ca raṇanti
anya-e0601n:234_1: etaṃ yehi abhibhūtā sattā kandanti paridavanti etesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tesaṃ
anya-e0601n:234_2: abhāvaṃ veneyyasantāne desanāñāṇena karoti attho. Atha vā karotīti karo, buddho. Taṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0601n:235_0: Abhayanti jātibhayādīnaṃ abhāvato nibbhayaṃ. Ettha hi bhayaṃ cittutrāsabhayaṃ, ñāṇabhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:235_1: ārammaṇabhayaṃ, ottappa bhayañcāti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha bhāyati cittenāti bhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:235_2: cittutrāsabhayaṃ. Ñāṇena tīretvā bhāyatīti bhayaṃ, ñāṇaṃ. Bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:235_3: ārammaṇabhayaṃ. Bhāyati etena pāpatoti bhayaṃ, ottappabhayaṃ. Bhīdhātu bhaye ṇa.
anya-e0601n:236_0: Mahāniddesapāḷiyaṃ pana āgatāni jātibhayaṃ, jarābhayaṃ, byādhibhayaṃ, maraṇabhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:236_1: rājabhayaṃ, corabhayaṃ, aggibhayaṃ, udakabhayaṃ, attānuvādabhayaṃ, parānuvādabhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:236_2: daṇḍabhayaṃ, duggatibhayaṃ, ūmibhayaṃ, kumbhīḷabhayaṃ, āvaṭṭabhayaṃ, susukabhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:236_3: ājīvikabhayaṃ, asilokabhayaṃ, parisayasārajjabhayaṃ, madana bhayaṃ, duggatibhayantiādīni
anya-e0601n:236_4: gahitāni. Natthi bhayāni etassāti abhayo, buddho. Tassa bhayānaṃ kāraṇa bhūtānaṃ
anya-e0601n:236_5: sabbakilesānaṃ arahattamaggena samucchinditattā sabbabhayaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:237_0: Puna abhayaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāyakanti ettha abhayantipadaṃ ṭhānantipade visesanaṃ. Ṭhānantipadaṃ
anya-e0601n:237_1: nāyakantipade kammaṃ. Bhayasaddassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Natthi sabbabhayaṃ ettha
anya-e0601n:237_2: nibbāneti abhayaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Buddhapaccekabuddha arahantā ṭhanti uppajjanti etthāti
anya-e0601n:237_3: ṭhānaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Veneyyasatte netīti nāyako, buddho. Nīdhātu nayane ṇvu. So buddho
anya-e0601n:237_4: bhabbe kulaputte maggādhi gamappattiyā dhammadesanāya maggaphalañāṇaṃ adhigamento
anya-e0601n:238_0: Puna nāyakaṃ nameti nāyakaṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ name namāmīti sambandho. Tattha nāyakanti
anya-e0601n:238_1: veneyyasatte saṃsāraṇṇavato nibbānapāraṃ netīti nāyako, buddho. So hi yathā nāviko
anya-e0601n:238_2: jane nāvāya orimatīrato pārimatīraṃ neti, evaṃ satte maggaṅganāvāya saṃsāraṇṇavato
anya-e0601n:238_3: nibbāna pāraṃ neti pāpuṇetīti attho. Atha vā nāyakanti tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvagamanattā
anya-e0601n:238_4: nāyako jeṭṭha seṭṭhavuḍḍhataro. So hi jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ neti gacchati pāpuṇātīti nāyakoti
anya-e0601n:238_5: vuccati. Nīdhātu gatimhi ṇvu. So pana idha loke avijjaṇḍagatānaṃ sabbapajānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ
anya-e0601n:238_6: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ arahattamaggena padāletvā ariyāya jātiyā jātattā sabbasattānaṃ seṭṭhajeṭṭhavuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:238_7: gatoti attho. Taṃ nāyakaṃ. Nameti ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi sakkaccaṃ namāmīti attho. Ettha
anya-e0601n:238_8: hi vattamānamivibhattiyā kvacidhātutyādisuttena eādeso hoti. Ayaṃ panettha vāccatthādinayo.
anya-e0601n:238_9: Nametipadassa ākhyātapadattā vacanattho na kātabbo. Vuttañhi saddavidūhi –
anya-e0601n:241_1: Namudhātuyā vāccattho namanakriyā saṅkhāto kusalacittuppādo padhānavasena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:241_2: Mivibhattiyā vāccattho tena cittuppādena upalakkhito uppāda vanto tadākāro puggalo
anya-e0601n:241_3: appadhānavasena labbhati. Padasamudāyassa pana vāccattho kattukammabhāvesu kattubhūto
anya-e0601n:241_4: atītādikālesu paccuppannakālabhūto dhātvattha kiriyāvisesova labbhati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0601n:242_0: Vitthāro panevaṃ veditabbo. Namudhātuyā vaccaṃ sugatādi buddhaguṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0601n:242_2: cittuppādo ca dve viññattiyo asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāre vandanākārappavatto kusalacittuppādo
anya-e0601n:242_3: ca mukhyena labbhati. Buddhaguṇānussaraṇavasena pavatto yonisomanasikā rādipurecarānucarakusalacittuppādo
anya-e0601n:242_5: abhāvañca vā saggamokkhasampattisukhañca kāraṇūpacārena, pure pure vandanā sadisyūpacārena,
anya-e0601n:242_6: vandanassa nāmapaññatti ṭhānūpacārena, vatthudvārārammaṇaṃ ṭhānūpacārena, vandana
anya-e0601n:242_7: guṇena lakkhitaṃ puggaladabbaṃ guṇūpacārena. Ukkaṭṭhamajjha muduttamattabhāvo guṇyūpacārena,
anya-e0601n:242_8: avayavabhūtā vandanā ekadesūpacārena. Samūhabhūtā vandanā ekadesyūpacārena, pubbapubbakusalacittuppādo
anya-e0601n:242_10: paramatthadhammānaṃ nibyāpārabhāvo taddhammūpacārena. Tesaṃ evaṃ dhammatābhāvo ataddhammūpacārena,
anya-e0601n:242_11: vandanākāro abhedabhedūpacārena. Vandanasatti bhedaabhedūpacārena labbhati. Mivibhattiyā
anya-e0601n:242_12: vāccaṃ taṃmukhyādīhi lakkhito kattu kriyāvisesena ca vattamānavibhattisaṅkhātena
anya-e0601n:242_13: vibhattivise sena ca parassapadasaṅkhātena padavisesena ca uttamapurisa visesena
anya-e0601n:242_14: ca amhayogavisesena ca sabbadhātuvisesena ca ekavacanavisesena ca paccuppannakālavisesena
anya-e0601n:242_15: ca dhātvatthakriyāvisesena ca aliṅga visesena ca bhūvādigaṇa visesena ca novikaraṇavisesena
anya-e0601n:242_16: ca bhāvakammakattūsukattuvisesena ca lakkhito ahaṃsaṅkhāto khandhasaṅkhato santāno
anya-e0601n:242_17: appadhānena labbhati. Kriyāpadassa kriyāya padhānena vācakattā dhātvatthova padhānena
anya-e0601n:242_18: labbhati. Apaccayassa vāccaṃ bhūvādigaṇajotakā rūpasiddhimattā pada siliṭṭhatā labbhati.
anya-e0601n:243_0: Atha vā yo ahaṃ namāmīti so name. Sāmaññattha viggahoyaṃ. Vāccattho pana vuttanayena
anya-e0601n:243_1: veditabbo. Namanañcettha buddhassa sīlādianantaguṇesu ninnapabbhāratāvasena paṇāmakriyābhinipphādikā
anya-e0601n:243_2: kusalacetanā. Sā ca vandaneyya vandanakānaṃ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā
anya-e0601n:243_5: sādheti. Samparāye ca upapajjavedanīyabhūtā saggamokkhasampattisukhaṃ nibbattetīti.
anya-e0601n:244_0: Ayaṃ panettha dassanatthanayo. Nametiiminā buddhassa sugatādiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattā
anya-e0601n:244_1: tividhā paṇāmakusala cetanā mukhyena dasseti. Taṃ dassanena tassā kāraṇabhūtā yonisomanasikārādayo
anya-e0601n:244_2: ca catucakkasampattiñca buddhuppādanavamakhettañca pubbabhāge pavattaṃ saddhāpaññāpadhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:244_3: kusalacittuppādañca phalūpacārena dīpeti. Taddīpanena tassā phalabhūtaṃ diṭṭhadhammarogādiantarāyavisosanañca
anya-e0601n:244_4: saggamokkha sukhañca paṭhamakāraṇūpacārena pakāseti. Tappakāsanena buddhassa paṇāmārahabhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:244_5: dutiyakāraṇūpacārena vibhāveti. Taṃvibhāvanena vandakassa me khettaṅgatabhāvañca
anya-e0601n:245_0: Ayaṃ panettha alaṅkāranayo. Nametivācakapadassa vāccabhūtā tividhā buddhapaṇāmakusalacetanā
anya-e0601n:245_1: samaṭṭhāyī bhāvo nāma. Kasmā, sarīrattā. Atha vā tividhāya buddhapaṇā makusalacetanāya
anya-e0601n:245_2: sampayutto samādhippadhāno mahā kusalacittuppādo samaṭṭhāyībhāvo nāma. Kasmā, buddhassa
anya-e0601n:245_3: sugatādiguṇārammaṇe ekaggattā samāhitacittattā vā. Soyeva pana santaraso nāma. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:245_4: buddhapaṇāmacetanā kusalaṅgena akusalaṅgassa pahīnattā. Buddhantipāṭhasesa padassa
anya-e0601n:245_5: vāccabhūto buddhadabbo ārammaṇavibhāvo nāma. Kasmā, tassa paṇāmakusalacittuppādassa
anya-e0601n:245_6: ārammaṇapaccayena upakārattā. Buddhassa sugatantyādiguṇo uddīpanavibhāvo nāma. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:245_7: paṇāmassa kāraṇattā. Kāraṇabhūtaṃ taṃ samaṭṭhāyībhāvaṃ upādāya jānitabbo diṭṭhadhammarogā
anya-e0601n:245_8: diantarāyābhāvo ca samparāye saggamokkhasukhasampatti ca ānubhāvo nāma. Kasmā, ānisaṃsaphalattā.
anya-e0601n:246_0: Tattha hi kiñcāpi ānubhāvadīpakaṃ padaṃ natthi. Kāraṇassa pana phalena vinābhāvato
anya-e0601n:246_1: kāraṇassa phalaṃ viññeyyanti. Atha vā nametipadassa sāmatthiyato ānubhāvo dassitoyevāti
anya-e0601n:246_2: daṭṭhabbo. Āvibhūto ussuko ca buddhapaṇāmassa ānisaṃsapajānanā mati ca alasābhāvo
anya-e0601n:246_3: ca cittappasādo ca samādhityādi ca byabhicārībhāvo nāma. Lomahaṃsādibhāvo satvaṃkābhāvo
anya-e0601n:246_4: nāmāti alaṅkāra nayo veditabbo. Evaṃ pacchimapacchimagāthāsūti.
anya-e0601n:247_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Sugataṃ sobhanagataṃ sundaranibbānaṭṭhānaṃ gataṃ vā
anya-e0601n:247_1: sammā gataṃ vā, sugataṃ sammā vacanaṃ gadaṃ bhāsanaṃ, seṭṭhaṃ pasatthataraṃ satipaṭṭhānādibhede
anya-e0601n:247_2: dhamme gavesantaṃ vā santehi gavesitabbaṃ vā sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ icchitaṃ vā, kusalaṃkusalaṃ
anya-e0601n:247_3: kusalaṃakusalaṃ, jahaṃ jahitaṃ, amataṃ maraṇavirahitaṃ amataṃ amatanibbānasamannā
anya-e0601n:247_4: gataṃ, santaṃ kilesadarathavūpasamaṃ, asamaṃ lokiyadhammena asadisaṃ maggaphalanibbānadhammaṃ.
anya-e0601n:247_5: Dadaṃ dātaṃ dāyakaṃ vā, saraṇaṃ sabbasattalokassa paṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ. Lokaṃ sattasaṅkha
anya-e0601n:247_6: rokāsasaṅkhataṃ tilokaṃ, saraṇaṃ jānantaṃ, araṇaṃ nikkilesaṃ, kilesasaṅkhātaraṇavirahitaṃ
anya-e0601n:247_7: vā. Araṇaṃ sattesu kilesarajassābhāvaṃ, karaṃ desanāñāṇena kataṃ, abhayaṃ nibbhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:247_8: abhayaṃ nibbhayaṭṭhānaṃ nibbānadisaṃ, nāyakaṃ satte nibbānapāraṃ nentaṃ, nāyakaṃ
anya-e0601n:247_9: tilokānaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ buddhaṃ sakkaccaṃ tīhi dvārehi ahaṃ name namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:254_0: 2. Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ gāthādvayena buddhassa namassitvā idāni nayanasubhagakāyaṅgantyādīhi
anya-e0601n:254_1: pañcahi guṇehi thomitvā buddhaṃ vandituṃ nayanasubhagakāyaṅgantiādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ
anya-e0601n:254_2: pana na na magaṇayuttattā navakkharehi lakkhitā bhujagasu sugāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:255_0: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ nā ca dve nagaṇāmo ca magaṇo ca yadi siyā.
anya-e0601n:255_1: Sā bhujagasusu gāthāti matā ñātabbāti. Tattha pana nayanasubhagakāyaṅganti sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:255_2: cakkhussa sobhanaṃ gatena kāyaṅgenasamannāgataṃ. Ettha hi nayananti samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ
anya-e0601n:255_3: attabhāvaṃ netīti nayanaṃ, cakkhu labbhati. Nīdhātu yu. Subhaṃ sobhanaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:255_4: subhagaṃ, kāyaṅgaṃ labbhati. Subhasaddūpapado gamudhātu kvi. Kāyassa aṅgaṃ avayavaṃ
anya-e0601n:255_5: kāyaṅgaṃ. Bhagavato kāyaṅgaṃ labbhati. Chaṭṭhītappurisasamāsoyaṃ. Nayanassa subhagaṃ
anya-e0601n:255_6: nayanasubhagaṃ, taṃ kāyaṅgaṃ yassa buddhassāti nayanasubhaga kāyaṅgo, buddho. So
anya-e0601n:255_7: hi rūpakāyassa dassanā nuttariyaguṇayogato sabbasattānaṃ pasādacakkhussa sobhanaṃ
anya-e0601n:255_8: gatena dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asītyā nubyañjanalakkhaṇehi ca lakkhitena
anya-e0601n:256_0: Madhuravarasaropetanti piyapemanīyauttamasaddena samannāgataṃ, so hi bhagavā madhiyati
anya-e0601n:256_1: piyati pemiyati vāti madhuro. Madhadhātu uro. Vuttañhi majjhimapaṇṇāsaṭīkāyaṃ “madhuroti
anya-e0601n:256_2: piyo pemanīyo apalibuddho”ti. Atha vā madhiyati assādiyatīti madhuro, madhati sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:256_3: pītiṃ undeti vaḍḍhetīti madhuro, madhadhātu unde uro. Tena vuttaṃ saddanītiyaṃ “madha
anya-e0601n:256_4: unde”ti. Varitabbo icchitabbo patthitabbo vāti varo, saro. Varadhātu icchāyaṃ a.
anya-e0601n:256_5: Sarati gacchati sotaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvanti saro, saddo. Saradhātu gatiyaṃ a. Sarati
anya-e0601n:256_6: gacchati suyyamānatanti vā saro, sariyati suṇiyatīti vā saro, bhagavato aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato
anya-e0601n:256_7: saddo labbhati. Upasampajjatīti upeto, upapubbaidhātu ta. Madhuro ca varo ca so saro
anya-e0601n:256_8: cāti madhuravarasaro, tena upeto sampanno samannāgatoti madhuravarasaropetoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:256_9: Bhagavato pana hadaya vatthuno suvisuddhattā pittasemhādīhi apalibuddhattā deva manussehi
anya-e0601n:256_10: madhurena piyena manāpiyena varena icchitapatthi tena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena sarena
anya-e0601n:256_11: saddena upeto sampanno samannāgatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:257_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi saropetanti sāmaññavasena vuttaṃ, bhagavato saro pana visaṭṭho ca,
anya-e0601n:257_1: viññeyyo, mañju, savanīyo, bindu, avisārī, gambhīro, ninnādi cāti visesena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatoti
anya-e0601n:257_2: attho daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhi majjhima paṇṇāse brahmāyusutte “aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho
anya-e0601n:257_3: panassa gotamassa mukhato ghoso niccharati visaṭṭho ca, viññeyyo ca, mañju ca, savanīyo
anya-e0601n:257_4: ca, bindu ca, avisārī ca, gambhīro ca, ninnādi ca. Yathāparisaṃ kho pana so bhavaṃ
anya-e0601n:257_5: gotamo sarena viññāpeti, na cassa bahiddhā parisāya ghoso na niccharatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:258_0: Tassāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana visaṭṭhoti siniddho apalibuddho. Viññeyyoti viññāpanīyo pākaṭo.
anya-e0601n:258_1: Visaṭṭhattāyeva cesa viññeyyo hoti. Mañjūti madhuro. Savanīyoti sotasukho, madhurattāyeva
anya-e0601n:258_2: cesa savanīyo hoti. Bindūti sampiṇḍito. Avisārīti avisaṭo. Binduttāyeva cesa avisārī
anya-e0601n:258_3: hoti. Gambhīroti gambhīrasamuṭṭhito. Ninnādīti ninnadavā. Gambhīrattāyeva cesa ninnādi
anya-e0601n:258_4: hoti. Yathāparisanti cakkavāḷapariyantāpi ekabaddhaṃ parisaṃ viññāpeti. Bahiddhāti
anya-e0601n:258_5: aṅgulimattampi parisato bahiddhā na gacchati. Kasmā. So evarūpo madhurasaro akāraṇā
anya-e0601n:258_6: mā nassīti. Iti bhagavato ghoso parisāya mattakeneva caratīti vaṇṇitoti. Abhidhānappadīpikāyañca
anya-e0601n:261_0: Yathā hi brahmuno saro pittasemhehi apalibuddhattā visuddho madhuro hoti. Yathā ca
anya-e0601n:261_1: sīhabyagghādīhi vāḷamigehi anubandhā dhāvantā khuddakamigā karavīkasakuṇassa vikūjamānaṃ
anya-e0601n:261_2: saddaṃ sutvā sarassa madhurattā maraṇabhayaṃ hitvā adhāvitvā ukkhittapādaṃ anikkhipitvā
anya-e0601n:261_3: tiṭṭhantā suṇanti, evaṃ karavīkassa saddo dhammatābhāvena madhuro piyo manāpo hoti.
anya-e0601n:261_4: Evaṃ bhagavatā kataṃ kammaṃ vatthuṃ sodheti, vatthussa suddhattā pittasemhehi ca
anya-e0601n:261_5: apalibuddhattā bhagavato nābhito samuṭṭhahanto saropi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato suvisuddho
anya-e0601n:261_6: atimadhuro atipiyo atimanāpo hoti. Sā panesā hīnūpamā hoti, bhagavato hi saro tehi
anya-e0601n:261_7: saddehi satabhāgena sahassabhāgena atimadhuro atipiyo atimanāpo hoti, tathā hi dhammāso
anya-e0601n:261_8: karañño asandhimittā devī karavīkasakuṇassa madhurasaddaṃ sutvā cintesi “imassa tiracchānassa
anya-e0601n:261_9: madhuro saddo, ko nāma sabbaññutañāṇasiriṃ pattassa bhagavato atimadhuro saddo”ti,
anya-e0601n:261_10: pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā sattahi jaṅghasatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale
anya-e0601n:262_1: samitoti parimiṇitabboti mito, mādhātu parimāṇe ta, na mito amito. Guṇoti sīlādayo
anya-e0601n:262_2: dhammā. Te hi guṇenti taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ pakāsentīti guṇāti vuccanti. Guṇadhātu pakāsane
anya-e0601n:262_3: a. Maṇisāramañjūsāṭīkāyaṃ pana “guṇanti attano ādhāraṃ pākaṭaṃ karontīti guṇā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:263_0: Saddanītidhātumālāyañca “guṇa āmantane, guṇoti sīlādayo dhammā, kenaṭṭhena te guṇā,
anya-e0601n:263_1: goṇāpiyati āmantāpiyati attani patiṭṭhito puggalo daṭṭhuṃ sotuṃ pūjituñca icchantehi
anya-e0601n:263_2: janehīti guṇo. Ettha kiñcāpi sīlādi dhammānaṃ āmantāpanaṃ natthi, tathāpi taṃhetu
anya-e0601n:263_3: āmantanaṃ nimantanañca teyeva karonti nāmāti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññe pana guñjante abyayante
anya-e0601n:263_4: iti guṇāti atthaṃ vadanti. Tadanurūpaṃ pana dhātusaddaṃna passāma. Guṇa āmantane
anya-e0601n:263_5: icceva passāma. Vicāretvā gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Amito guṇo amitaguṇo, tesaṃ gaṇo
anya-e0601n:263_6: samūho amitaguṇagaṇo, tesaṃ. Ādhārati tiṭṭhati etthāti amitaguṇagaṇādhāro, jino labbhati.
anya-e0601n:263_7: So pana samuddodakaṃ nāḷipattena aparimitaṃ viya kenaci aparimitānaṃ sīlādiguṇasamūhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:264_0: Dasabalanti aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ tathāgatadasabalasampannaṃ. Ettha hi balanti kehici
anya-e0601n:264_1: viruddhehi kāraṇe hi balanti na kampenti thirantīti balaṃ, dasa balāni yassa soti
anya-e0601n:264_2: dasabalo, buddho. Taṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti tathā gatassa dasabalaṃ kāyadasabalañca,
anya-e0601n:264_3: ñāṇadasabalañcāti. Tesu hi kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusārena veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
anya-e0601n:267_0: Imāni hi dasa hatthikulāni. Tattha kāḷāvakanti pakatihatthikulaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0601n:267_1: dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ
anya-e0601n:267_2: balaṃ, taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gaṅgeyyānaṃ, taṃ ekassa paṇḍarassa. Yaṃ
anya-e0601n:267_3: dasannaṃ paṇḍarānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tambassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ tambānaṃ, taṃ ekassa piṅgalassa.
anya-e0601n:267_4: Yaṃ dasannaṃ piṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa gandhahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gandhahatthīnaṃ,
anya-e0601n:267_5: taṃ ekassa maṅgalassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ maṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa hemavatassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
anya-e0601n:267_6: hemavatānaṃ, taṃ uposathassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ uposathānaṃ, taṃ ekassa chaddantassa.
anya-e0601n:267_7: Yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa, nārāyanasaṅghātabalantipi idameva
anya-e0601n:267_8: vuccati. Tadetaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ gaṇanāya hatthikoṭisahassānaṃ. Purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ
anya-e0601n:267_9: purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ hoti. Idaṃ tathāgatassa kāyabalaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pana tāsu
anya-e0601n:267_10: tāsu pāḷīsu na āgataṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsuyeva āgataṃ. Tena vuttaṃ dasaka nipāta aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:267_11: “dasa balañāṇaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Na kāyabalaṃ viya aṭṭha kathārūḷhamevāti
anya-e0601n:267_12: adhippāyo”ti. Ettha ca nārāyana saṅghāta balanti ettha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo, tā
anya-e0601n:267_13: bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ. Tasmā nārāyanasaṅghāta balanti
anya-e0601n:268_0: Ñāṇadasabalaṃ pana vibhaṅgapāḷiyañca mūlapaṇṇāse mahā sīhanādasutte dasakanipātaaṅguttarapāḷiyañca
anya-e0601n:268_1: vitthārena āgatameva. Sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pana saṅkhepena dassayissāmi. Seyyathidaṃ.
anya-e0601n:268_3: nānādhātu loka ñāṇaṃ, sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ ñāṇaṃ, parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ
anya-e0601n:268_5: ñāṇaṃ, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ, sattānaṃ cutūpapātaṃ ñāṇaṃ, āsavānaṃ khayañāṇañcāti.
anya-e0601n:269_0: Cutūpapātañāṇaṭṭhāne pana mūlapaṇṇāsapāḷiyaṃ mahāsīhanādasutte ca dasakanipātaaṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:269_1: dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ āgataṃ. Atthato pana dibbacakkhuñāṇena cutūpapātassa passitattā
anya-e0601n:269_2: sadisamevāti. Tattha hi ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇanti kāraṇākāraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:269_3: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva pavattati
anya-e0601n:269_4: ca, tasmā ṭhānanti vuccati. Kammasamādānānaṃ vipākañāṇanti samādiyitvā katānaṃ atītānāgata
anya-e0601n:269_6: yathābhūtaṃ pajānanañāṇaṃ. Sabbattha gāminipaṭipadaṃ ñāṇanti sabbagatigāminiñca paṭipadaṃ
anya-e0601n:269_7: maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānanañāṇaṃ. Tattha ca paṭipadanti paṭipajjati pāpuṇāti etenāti
anya-e0601n:269_8: paṭipadaṃ, maggaṃ. Gatigāmininti nirayādipañcagatigāminiṃ. Agatigāmininti nibbānagāminiṃ.
anya-e0601n:270_0: Anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ ñāṇanti ettha aneka dhātūti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātūhi
anya-e0601n:270_1: vā bahudhātuṃ. Nānādhātūti tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ vilakkhaṇattā visadisa sabhāvattā nānāppakāradhātuṃ.
anya-e0601n:270_2: Lokanti khandhāyatana dhātulokaṃ. Ñāṇanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanañāṇaṃ. Sattānaṃ adhimuttikataṃ
anya-e0601n:270_3: ñāṇanti sattānaṃ hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:270_4: Parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattiñāṇanti ettha parasattānanti padhānasattānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:270_5: Parapuggalānanti tato paresaṃ hīnasattānaṃ. Ekatthameva vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ veneyyavasena
anya-e0601n:270_6: dvedhā vuttaṃ. Indriyaparopariyattiñāṇanti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ parabhāvaṃ vaḍḍhañca
anya-e0601n:271_0: Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇanti ettha jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnanti
anya-e0601n:271_1: paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ, rūpī rūpāni passatītiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ,
anya-e0601n:271_2: savitakkasavicārādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ, paṭhamajjhāna samāpattiādīnañca navannaṃ
anya-e0601n:271_4: Vuṭṭhānanti yena kāraṇena jhānādīhi vuṭṭhahanti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Ñāṇanti yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:271_6: pajānanañāṇaṃ. Sattānaṃ cutūpapātaṃ ñāṇanti sattānaṃ cutiñca upapātañca pajānanaṃ
anya-e0601n:271_7: dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ. Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇanti kāmāsavādīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ āsavanirodhaṃ
anya-e0601n:271_8: nibbānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānana ñāṇanti. Imāni pana ñāṇāni aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatassa
anya-e0601n:274: Anekadhātulokañca, sattānaṃ adhimuttikaṃ. [sā panesā setavavipulāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā;]
anya-e0601n:278: Dasimāni buddhassa cā, sādhāraṇāni ñāṇānī”ti. [sā panesā sāmaññagāthāti daṭṭhabbā;]
anya-e0601n:279_0: Nanu dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ natthi, sabbaññutañāṇameva hoti, atha kasmā taṃ
anya-e0601n:279_1: ñāṇaṃ dasabhedena vuttanti. Vuccate. Aññameva hi dasabalañāṇaṃ, aññaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:279_2: dasabalañhi sakasakakiccameva jānāti. Sabbaññutañāṇaṃ pana tampi tato avasesampi
anya-e0601n:279_3: pajānāti. Dasabalañāṇesu hi paṭhamaṃ kāraṇākāraṇameva jānāti. Dutiyaṃ kammantara
anya-e0601n:279_4: vipākantarameva. Tatiyaṃ kammaparicchedameva. Catutthaṃ dhātu nānattakāraṇameva.
anya-e0601n:279_5: Pañcamaṃ sattānaṃ ajjhāsayādhimuttimeva. Chaṭṭhaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvameva.
anya-e0601n:279_6: Sattamaṃ jhānādīhi saddhiṃ tesaṃ saṃkilesādimeva. Aṭṭhamaṃ pubbe nivutthakhandhasantatimeva.
anya-e0601n:279_7: Navamaṃ sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhimeva. Dasamaṃ saccaparicchedameva. Sabbaññutañāṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:279_8: pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti. Etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti.
anya-e0601n:279_9: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti. Iddhi hutvā vikubbituṃ na sakkoti. Maggo hutvā
anya-e0601n:279_10: kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti. Evaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇadvayānaṃ visesoti. Taṃ pana idha ñāṇadvayaṃ adhippetanti.
anya-e0601n:280_0: Atulanti sīlādīhi guṇehi kenaci puggalena asadisaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Tulanaṃ
anya-e0601n:280_1: ummānaṃ tulā, tula sadisyaṃ. Saddanītiyañhi “tula ummāne”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā tuliyati
anya-e0601n:280_2: pamiyati etāyāti tulā, pakatitulā. Tulā viyāti tulā, ñāṇaṃ. Tāya sammito tulo. Sammita
anya-e0601n:280_3: taddhite apaccayo. Tulasadisañāṇena sammito puggalo. Na tulo atulo. Kammadhārayamissakatappurisa
anya-e0601n:280_4: samāsoyaṃ. Sīlādiguṇehi kenaci puggalena asadiso bhagavā labbhati. Atha vā natthi
anya-e0601n:280_5: tulo sadiso puggalo etassāti atulo, bhagavā. Atagguṇasaṃviññāṇoyaṃ bahubbīhi. Sīlādiguṇehi
anya-e0601n:280_6: kenaci asadiso aggapuggaloti attho. Sadevake loke aggapuggalabhāvato. Yathāha “yāvatā
anya-e0601n:280_7: bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati,
anya-e0601n:280_8: virāgo seṭṭho dhammānaṃ dvipadānañca cakkhumā”ti. Taṃ atulaṃ buddhanti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:280_9: Vandeti buddhassa nayanasubhagakāyaṅgādiguṇaṃ anussaritvā tīhi dvārehi sakkaccaṃ
anya-e0601n:280_10: ahaṃ vandāmīti attho. Ettha ca mivibhattiyā mahāvisayasuttena ekārā desoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:280_11: Vandanā pana tividhā hoti kāyavacīmanovandanāvasenāti. Yathāha “tisso imā bhikkhave
anya-e0601n:280_12: vandanā. Katamā tisso. Kāyena vandati, vācāya vandati, manasā vandatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:281_1: pañca aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandaneyyānaṃ abhimukhaṃ nipatanto kāyena vandati
anya-e0601n:281_2: nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya “pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā”ti aṭṭha kathādīsu vuttaṃ. Buddhaguṇapadāni
anya-e0601n:281_3: vācāya pavattento vācāya vandati nāma. Vipassissa namatthu, sikhissāpi namatthu,
anya-e0601n:281_4: vessa bhussa namatthu, kakusandhassa namatthu, koṇāgamanassa namatthu, kassapassa
anya-e0601n:281_5: namatthu, aṅgīrassassa namatthu tyādīsupi vācāvandanāyeva. Buddhādi guṇāni anussaranto
anya-e0601n:282_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Nayanasubhagakāyaṅgaṃ sabbasattānaṃ cakkhussa sobhanaṃ
anya-e0601n:282_1: gatena kāyaṅgena samannāgataṃ, madhuravarasaropetaṃ piyapemanīyena assādi yena uttamasaddena
anya-e0601n:282_3: dasabalaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena tathāgatassa kāyañāṇadasa balena samannāgataṃ, atulaṃ
anya-e0601n:282_4: sīlādiguṇehi kenaci asadisaṃ buddhaṃ tīhi dvārehi sakkaccaṃ ahaṃ vande vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:289_0: 3. Evaṃ tatiyagāthāya buddhassa vanditvā idāni samādhi ādīhi catūhi guṇehi thomitvā
anya-e0601n:289_1: vanditukāmo yo buddho dhitimāññadhārako tiādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana masajagaṇa garuyuttattā
anya-e0601n:289_2: dasakkharehi lakkhitā suddhavirā jitagāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye-msā jgā
anya-e0601n:289_3: suddhavirā jitaṃ matanti. Tassattho. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ msā masagaṇā ca jgā jagaṇagarukā
anya-e0601n:289_4: ca ce siyyuṃ, taṃ vuttaṃ suddhavirājitanti mataṃ ñātabbanti. Dhitimā aññadhārako
anya-e0601n:289_5: yo buddho lokato saṃsāre kāyikaṃ dukkhañca cetasikaṃ dukkhañca anubhosi naradevamaṅgalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:290_0: Tattha hi yoti aniyamaniddeso. Yo yādisoti attho. Tassa ca aniyamavācaka sabbanāmapadattā
anya-e0601n:290_1: vacanattho na kātabbo. Tassa pana ya oti padavibhāgo kātabbo. Tesu ca yasaddassa
anya-e0601n:290_2: vāccaṃ aniyamo buddhadabbo appadhānena labbhati, tassa yādisayuttajaccanāmagottasīlavihārī
anya-e0601n:290_5: labbhati. Atha vā sabbanāmabhāvaṃ yāti gacchatīti yo, aniyamavācakabhāvaṃ yāti gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:290_6: vā yo, sabbanāma bhāvena yāti pavattatīti vā yo, sabbanāmabhāvena yātabbo ñātabboti
anya-e0601n:290_7: vā yo, yātabbo ñātabbo etena vā aniyamatthoti yo.
anya-e0601n:294_0: Buddhoti paṭividdhacatusaccadhammo. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Bujjhati cattāri saccānīti
anya-e0601n:294_1: buddho, bhagavā. Suddhakattusādhanoyaṃ. Budhadhātu ta. Bodhetā pajāyāti vā buddho,
anya-e0601n:294_2: hetu kattusādhanoyaṃ. Aññesaṃ cattāri saccāni bodhetīti attho. Atha vā anaññabodhito
anya-e0601n:294_3: hutvā savāsanāya sammohaniddāya bujjhati jāgarotīti buddho, dinakarakiraṇa samāgamena
anya-e0601n:294_5: sabbaññutañāṇappattiyā bujjhati vikasatīti vā buddho, nibbāna saṅkhātaṃ ekāyanamaggaṃ
anya-e0601n:294_6: bujjhati gacchatīti vā buddho. Budhasaddo hi ñāṇādīsu catūsvatthesu vattati.
anya-e0601n:298_0: Atha vā sabbañeyyadhamme bujjhati jānātīti buddho, pārami bhāvitāya paññāya sabbe
anya-e0601n:298_1: saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhamme bujjhati abujjhi bujjhissatīti vā buddho, sammāsambuddho vata
anya-e0601n:298_2: so bhagavāti adhigatañāṇaguṇavisesehi bujjhitabboti vā buddho, bhagavatā bujjhitabbaṃ
anya-e0601n:298_3: ñātabbanti buddhaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ, sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ, tadassatthīti buddho, bhagavā. Atthato
anya-e0601n:298_4: pana pāramitā bhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhasta niravasesakleso
anya-e0601n:298_6: “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni
anya-e0601n:298_7: abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
anya-e0601n:299_0: Ettha ca buddho nāma sabbaññubuddha, paccekabuddha, catusaccabuddha, suta buddhavasena
anya-e0601n:299_1: catubbidho hoti. Tattha kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni samatiṃsapāramiyo
anya-e0601n:299_2: pūretvā sambodhippatto sabbaññubuddho nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
anya-e0601n:299_3: pāramiyo pūretvā sayambhūpatto paccekabuddho nāma. Avasesā khīṇāsavā catusaccabuddho
anya-e0601n:299_4: nāma. Bahussuto sutabuddho nāma. Idha pana sabbaññubuddho adhippeto.
anya-e0601n:300_0: Dhitimāññadhārakoti ettha dhitimā aññadhārakoti padacchedo kātabbo. Dhitimāti samādhivanto,
anya-e0601n:300_1: sampayutta dhamme ekārammaṇe dhāretīti dhiti, samādhi. Dhādhātuti. Ākārassa ikārādeso.
anya-e0601n:300_2: Dhiyati ṭhapeti ekārammaṇe sampayuttadhammeti dhiti, cittena yogeneveso ekā rammaṇe
anya-e0601n:300_3: patiṭṭhāpanavasena cittassa ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena patiṭṭhāpetīti attho. Dhiti assa
anya-e0601n:300_4: atthīti dhitimā, buddho. So hi yathā mahāmeru catūhi disāhi bhusaṃ āgatehi vātehi
anya-e0601n:300_5: na samiñjati, evaṃ paṭipakkhehi micchāvāda vātehi ca iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇehi ca lābhālābha
anya-e0601n:300_6: yasāyasa nindā pasaṃsa sukhadukkhasaṅkhātehi lokadhammehi ca na samiñjati, samādhivantoyeva hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:301_1: vā. Jānāti paṭhama maggena diṭṭhasaccassa āmariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā vāti aññaṃ, arahattaphalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:301_2: Āpubbañādhātu kvi. Āsaddo mariyādattho. Saṃyogaparattā ākārassa rasso, taṃ dhāretīti
anya-e0601n:301_3: aññadhārako. Aññasaddūpapadadharadhātu ṇvu. Saṃsāreti khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ abbocchinnaṃ
anya-e0601n:305_0: Khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ aññamaññasambandhena saṃpunappunaṃ sarati gacchati pavattatīti
anya-e0601n:305_1: saṃsāro. Saṃpubbasaradhātu gatimhi ṇa. Atha vā khandhāyatanadhātuyo saṃ abbocchinnaṃ
anya-e0601n:305_2: saranti gacchanti pavattanti etthāti saṃsāroti vacanattho kātabbo, tasmiṃ. Anubhosīti
anya-e0601n:305_3: anupunappunaṃ abhuñji, avedayīti attho. Kāyikanti kāye sarīre pavattaṃ kāyikaṃ. Cetasikanti
anya-e0601n:305_4: cetasi pavattaṃ cetasikaṃ. Taṃ pana padadvayaṃ dukkhantipade visesanaṃ. Dukkhanti
anya-e0601n:305_5: vaṭṭadukkhaṃ. Dukkhanaṃ dukkhaṃ, atha vā dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ, dukkhadhātu a. Idaṃ
anya-e0601n:305_6: pana nibbacanaṃ kāritavasena vuttaṃ. Yassa uppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0601n:305_7: hoti. Lokatoti sattalokahetu. Lokiyanti pavattanti ettha puññāpuññāni tabbipāko cāti
anya-e0601n:305_8: loko. Lokadhātu ṇa. Atha vā kusalādīni lāti gaṇhātīti loko. Lādhātu okapaccayo. Satta
anya-e0601n:305_9: lokova labbhati. Dhitimā aññadhārako yo buddho saṃsāravaṭṭe nimuggānaṃ sattānamanudayāya
anya-e0601n:305_10: saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhato pamocetukāmo kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atidukkarāni
anya-e0601n:305_11: samatiṃsapāramiyo pañca mahā pariccāge ca karonto sattalokahetu kāyikaṃ cetasikaṃ
anya-e0601n:305_12: saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhaṃ anubhavasīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tanti tādisaṃ buddhaṃ. Vandeti vandāmi.
anya-e0601n:306_0: Naradevamaṅgalanti naradevānaṃ maṅgalabhūtaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha vacanatto. Nirayaṃ neti
anya-e0601n:306_1: pāpuṇātīti naro, manusso. Nidhātu pāpunane aro. Ariyamanusso pana bhūtapubbagatika
anya-e0601n:306_2: nayena naro nāmāti. Atha vā seṭṭhabhāvaṃ netīti naro, uttamaṃ pabbajjaṃ netīti attho.
anya-e0601n:306_3: Vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ netīti naro. Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo
anya-e0601n:306_4: mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, pageva bhattubhūto itarāsanti vuttaṃ. Visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:306_5: pana naratīti naro, puriso. Yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:306_6: puriucce ṭhāne seti pavattatīti purisoti vuccati, evaṃ nayanaṭṭhena naroti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:306_7: Puttabhātu bhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Pageva itarā
anya-e0601n:306_8: itarāsanti vuttaṃ. Tasmā idha pana naranti sāmaññena vuttampi visesena purisanaranti
anya-e0601n:306_9: viññāyati padhānanayena gahaṇassa yuttattā. Dibbanti kāmaguṇa jhānābhiññācittissariyādīhi
anya-e0601n:306_10: kīḷantīti devā. Divudhātu ṇa. Atha vā sarīrālaṅkārajutiyā dibbantīti devā. Devā ca
anya-e0601n:306_11: nāma tividhā honti sammutidevā, upapattidevā, visuddhidevā cāti. Tattha mahāsammatakālato
anya-e0601n:306_12: paṭṭhāya lokena devāti sammatattā rājāno deviyo rājakumārā ca sammutidevā nāma. Devaloke
anya-e0601n:306_13: upapannā upapattidevā nāma. Buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā visuddhidevā nāma. Idha
anya-e0601n:307_0: Maṅgalanti maṅgalabhūtaṃ. Tantipade visesanaṃ. Maṅganti vaḍḍhenti sabbasampattīhi
anya-e0601n:307_1: sattānaṃ etenāti maṅgalo, buddho. Maṅgala dhātu vaḍḍhane alo. Atha vā maṅgaṃ vuccati
anya-e0601n:307_2: pāpaṃ, taṃ veneyyānaṃ desanāya lunāti chindatīti maṅgalo, buddho. Maṅgasaddūpapadaludhātu
anya-e0601n:307_3: kvi. Narā ca devā ca naradevā, tesaṃ maṅgalo naradevamaṅgalo, buddho. So pana manussadevabrahmānaṃ
anya-e0601n:307_4: pūjanīyattā ca saṅkhe, cakkaṃ, puṇṇakumbho, garā, sirī, setacchattaṃ, aṅkuso, dhajaṃ,
anya-e0601n:307_5: sovattikañcāti aṭṭhahi lokiyamaṅgalehi seṭṭhattā uttamattā ca maṅgalo nāmāti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:308_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Dhitimā samādhivanto aññadhārako arahattaphaladhārako
anya-e0601n:308_1: arahattaphalase tacchattaṃ dhārento vā, yo yādiso buddho, saṃsāre saṃsāravaṭṭe, kāyikaṃ
anya-e0601n:308_2: kāye pavattaṃ dukkhañca vaṭṭadukkhañca cetasi pavattaṃ dukkhañca vaṭṭadukkhañca,
anya-e0601n:308_3: lokato lokahetu, anubhosi punappunaṃ abhavasi avedayi, naradevamaṅgalaṃ naradevānaṃ
anya-e0601n:308_4: maṅgalabhūtaṃ, taṃ tādisaṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ vande vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:316_0: 4. Evaṃ tatiyagāthāya buddhassa natvā idāni bāttiṃsatilakkhaṇacitradehantyādīhi chahi
anya-e0601n:316_1: guṇehi thomitvā munino vanditukāmo bāttiṃsati lakkhaṇa citra deha ntyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:316_2: Ayaṃ pana ta ja ja gaṇa garudvaya yuttattā ekādasakkharehi lakkhitā upaṭṭhitā gāthāti
anya-e0601n:316_3: daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye tjā jgā garunāyamupaṭṭhitā sā”ti. Tassattho. Yassaṃ
anya-e0601n:316_4: paṭipādaṃ tjā tajagaṇā ca jgājagaṇagarū ca garunā pādantagarunā ce yuttā, sā ayaṃ
anya-e0601n:316_5: gāthā upaṭṭhitā nāmāti. Ettha ca eka garuke satipi dvigarukepi lakkhaṇasamānattā
anya-e0601n:316_6: upaṭṭhitā gāthā nāmāti daṭṭhabbā. Tattha bāttiṃsati lakkhaṇa citra dehanti dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0601n:316_7: vicitraṃ sarīravantaṃ. Ettha ca dvīhi adhikaṃ tiṃsaṃ bāttiṃsati. Dvisaddassa bādeso.
anya-e0601n:316_8: Lakkhiyati lakkhitabbaṃ buddhasarīraṃ etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ. Dihati upacayati vaḍḍhati
anya-e0601n:316_9: vā ettha kusalā kusalanti dehaṃ, sarīraṃ. Dihadhātu upacaye vaḍḍhane vā ṇa. Bāttiṃsati
anya-e0601n:316_10: mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi citraṃ vicitraṃ dehaṃ sarīraṃ yassa soti bāttiṃsatilakkhaṇacitradeho, muni labbhati.
anya-e0601n:317_0: Idaṃ panettha dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasarūpassa saṅkhepa dassanaṃ. Suppatiṭṭhitapādo
anya-e0601n:317_1: ca, āyatapaṇhi, dīghaṅguli, muduta luṇahatthapādo, jālahatthapādo, ussaṅkhapādo,
anya-e0601n:317_2: eṇijaṅgho, ṭhitakova anonamanto ubhohi pāṇitalehi jāṇu kāni parimasati parimajjati,
anya-e0601n:317_3: kosohitavatthaguyho, suvaṇṇa vaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco, sukhumacchavī, ekekalomo,
anya-e0601n:317_4: uddhaggalomo, brahmujugatto, sattussado, sīhapubbaddha kāyo, citantaraṃso, nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo,
anya-e0601n:317_5: samavaṭṭakkhandho, rasaggarasī, sīhahanu, cattālīsadanto, samadanto, aviraḷadanto,
anya-e0601n:317_6: susukkadāṭho, pahūtajivho, brahmassaro karavīkabhāṇi, atinīlanetto, gopakhumo, uṇṇā
anya-e0601n:317_7: bhamu kantare jāto, uṇhīsasīso cāti dvattiṃsavidhāni honti mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0601n:318_0: Tena vuttaṃ pātheyyavagge lakkhaṇasutte “katamāni tāni bhikkhave dvattiṃsamahāpurisassa
anya-e0601n:318_1: mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni, yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dve gatiyo bhavanti, anaññā.
anya-e0601n:318_2: Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavatti…pe… sace khopana agārasmā anagāriyaṃ
anya-e0601n:318_3: pabbajati, arahaṃ hoti sammā sambuddho loke vivaṭacchado 1. idha bhikkhave mahā puriso
anya-e0601n:318_4: suppatiṭṭhitapādo hoti. Yampi bhikkhave mahā puriso suppatiṭṭhitapādo hoti. Idampi
anya-e0601n:318_5: bhikkhave mahā purisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavati 2. puna caparaṃ bhikkhave mahāpurisassa
anya-e0601n:318_6: heṭṭhāpādatalesu cakkāni jātāni honti sahassārāni sanemikāni sanābhikāni sabbā kāraparipūrāni.
anya-e0601n:318_7: Idampi bhikkhave mahāpurisassa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati 3. puna caparaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0601n:318_8: mahāpuriso āyatapaṇhī hoti 4. dīghaṅgulī hoti 5. mudutaluṇa hatthapādo hoti 6. jālahatthapādo
anya-e0601n:318_9: hoti 7. ussaṅkhapādo hoti 8. eṇijaṅgho hoti 9. ṭhitakova anonamanto ubhohi pāṇitalehi
anya-e0601n:318_10: jāṇukāni parimasati parimajjati 10. kosohitavatthaguyho hoti 11. suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco
anya-e0601n:318_11: 12. sukhumacchavī hoti sukhumattā chaviyā rajojallaṃ kāye na upalimpati 13. ekekalomo
anya-e0601n:318_12: hoti, ekekāni lomāni lomakūpesu jātāni 14. uddhaggalomo hoti. Uddhaggāni lomāni jātāni
anya-e0601n:318_13: nīlāni añjanavaṇṇāni kuṇḍalā vattāni padakkhiṇāvattakajātāni 15. brahmujugatto hoti
anya-e0601n:318_14: 16. sattussado hoti 17. sīhapubbaddha kāyo hoti 18. citantaraṃso hoti 19. nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo
anya-e0601n:318_15: hoti, yāvatakvassa byāmo, tāva takvassa kāyo 20. samavaṭṭakkhandho hoti 21. rasagga
anya-e0601n:318_16: saggī hoti 22. sīhahanu hoti 23. cattālīsadanto hoti 24. samadanto hoti 25. aviraḷadanto
anya-e0601n:318_17: hoti 26. susukkadāṭho hoti 27. pahūtajivho hoti 28. brahmassaro hoti karavīkabhāṇi
anya-e0601n:318_18: 29. atinīlanetto hoti 30. gopakhumo hoti 31. uṇṇā bhamukantare jātā hoti odātā mudutūla
anya-e0601n:318_19: sannibhā. Yampi bhikkhave mahāpurisassa uṇṇā bhamukantare jātā hoti odātā mudutūlasannibhā.
anya-e0601n:318_20: Idampi bhikkhave mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavati 32. puna caparaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0601n:318_21: mahāpuriso uṇhīsasīso hoti. Yampi bhikkhave mahāpuriso uṇhīsasīso hoti. Idampi bhikkhave
anya-e0601n:318_22: mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavati. Imāni kho tāni bhikkhave dvattiṃsamahāpurisassa
anya-e0601n:318_23: mahāpurisa lakkhaṇānī”ti. Etesaṃ pana dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ attho pacchā āvibhavissatīti.
anya-e0601n:319_1: obhāsehi parisamantato vijjotavantaṃ. Javati dibbatīti juti. Judhātuti. Nigacchati
anya-e0601n:319_2: niccharatīti niggatā, rasmi. Nipubbagamudhātu ta. Pakārena jalate dibbate pajjalantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:319_3: Ettha ca dehaniggatajutīti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ padavipariyāyena dehajjutiniggatanti
anya-e0601n:319_4: vuttaṃ. Tasmā dehato niggatā jutīti samāso daṭṭhabbo. Dehato rūpakāyato niggatehi
anya-e0601n:319_5: niccharehi jutīhi raṃsīhi pajjalantaṃ yassa soti dehajjuti niggatapajjalanto, muni
anya-e0601n:319_6: labbhati. Munino hi puratthimakāyato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:319_7: agga hesi. Pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇahatthato vāmahatthato chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0601n:319_8: asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi. Upari kesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesavattehi moragīvavaṇṇā
anya-e0601n:319_9: rasmi uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi. Heṭṭhāpādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā
anya-e0601n:319_10: rasmi uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi, evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ
anya-e0601n:319_11: ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikāhi niccharitvā
anya-e0601n:319_12: ākāsaṃ pakkhandajālā viya catuddīpika mahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya vidhāviṃsūti
anya-e0601n:320_0: Paññādhiti sīla guṇoghavindanti ettha paññāti sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ. Dhitīti jhānamaggaphalasampayuttasamādhi.
anya-e0601n:320_1: Sīlanti pacceka buddhāriyasāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ suvisuddhaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Oghanti
anya-e0601n:320_2: samūhaṃ. Vindanti laddhaṃ. Pakārena yathāsabhāvaṃ sabbañeyyadhammaṃ vā jānāti paṭivijjhatīti
anya-e0601n:320_3: paññā. Sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ. Papubbañādhātu a. Sā panesā pajānanalakkhaṇā paṭivedhalakkhaṇā
anya-e0601n:320_4: obhāsanalakkhaṇā ca, visayobhāsa rasā, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā, samādhipadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0601n:320_5: Dhitisaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Sīlatīti sīlaṃ. Kāyavacīkammāni sammā
anya-e0601n:320_6: dahati sammā ṭhapetīti attho. Atha vā sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susilya bhāvena
anya-e0601n:320_7: na vippakiratīti sīlaṃ, sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ etenāti vā sīlaṃ, catupārisuddhisīlaṃ.
anya-e0601n:320_8: Sīladhātu a. Idaṃ pana patiṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇaṃ, dussilyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ anavajjarasaṃ
anya-e0601n:320_9: vā, soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, hiriottappapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Guṇasaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā
anya-e0601n:320_10: vuttoyeva. Uhanati samūhaṃ karoti ettha avayavanti ogho, samūho. Upubbahanadhātu
anya-e0601n:320_11: ṇa. Ussa o. Hanassa gho. Abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ pana “avayavaṃ byapiyati gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:320_12: ogho”ti vuttaṃ. Vindanaṃlabhanaṃ vindaṃ, vindiyittha labbhitthāti vā vindaṃ, paññā
anya-e0601n:320_13: ca dhiti ca sīlañca taṃ guṇañcāti paññādhitisīlaguṇā, tesaṃ ogho samūhoti tathā,
anya-e0601n:320_14: taṃ vindaṃ labhanaṃ yassāti paññādhitisīlaguṇoghavindo, muni. Atha vā vindaṃ labhitabbaṃ
anya-e0601n:320_16: Vindānaṃ labhitabbānaṃ paññādhitisīla saṅkhātānaṃ guṇānaṃ samūho atthīti attho. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:321_0: Vandeti ahaṃ vandāmi. Muninti buddhaṃ. Munāti jānāti paricchindati vā hitāhitanti
anya-e0601n:321_1: muni, buddho. Munadhātu ñāṇe i. Atha vā munāti jānāti ubho attheti muni, khandhādi
anya-e0601n:321_2: loke tulaṃ āropetvā minanto viya ime ajjhattikā khandhā ime bāhirātiādinā nayena
anya-e0601n:321_3: idhalokatthañca paralokatthañca bhagavā jānātīti attho. So panesa agāriyamuni, anāgāriyamuni,
anya-e0601n:321_4: sekhamuni, asekhamuni, paccekamuni, munimuni cāti anekavidho. Tattha agāriyamunīti
anya-e0601n:321_5: gihipi āgataphalo viññātasāsano. Anāgāriyamunīti tathārūpova pabbajito. Sekhamunīti
anya-e0601n:321_6: satta sekkhā. Asekhamunīti khīṇāsavo. Paccekamunīti paccekabuddho. Munimunīti sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0601n:321_7: Tesu pana idha munimuni adhippeto, taṃ muniṃ. Antimajātiyuttanti antimena carimabhavena
anya-e0601n:321_8: yuttaṃ. Avasānaṃ amati gacchatīti antaṃ. Amadhātu ta. Massa no. Ante bhavo antimo,
anya-e0601n:321_9: carimabhavo. Jānanaṃ nibbattanaṃ jāti, khandhānaṃ pavatti. Kammena janiyati nibbattiyatīti
anya-e0601n:321_10: vā jāti. Upapattibhavo labbhati. Jānidhātuti. Dhātvanta lopo. Antimajātiyā yuttoti
anya-e0601n:321_11: antimajātiyutto, muni. Āyatiñhi tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhijanakānaṃ sabba kilesānaṃ
anya-e0601n:321_12: bodhipallaṅkeyeva aggamaggena samucchinditattā bhagavato anāgate punabbhavo natthi,
anya-e0601n:321_13: tasmā ayaṃ ariyajāti pacchimattabhāvayuttoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:323: “Ñāṇañca medassanaṃ udapādi, akuppāme vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthidāni punabbhavo”ti.
anya-e0601n:324_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Bāttiṃsatilakkhaṇacitraṃ dehaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0601n:324_1: vicitraṃ rūpakāyavantaṃ, dehajjutiniggata pajjalantaṃ rūpakāyato niggatehi chabbaṇṇaraṃ
anya-e0601n:324_2: sīhi parisamantato vijjotavantaṃ, paññādhitisīlaguṇo ghavindaṃ paññādhitisīlasaṅkhatānaṃ
anya-e0601n:324_3: guṇānaṃ samūhaṃ labhanavantaṃ, vinditabbānaṃ paññādhitisīlasaṅkhātānaṃ guṇānaṃ samūhavantaṃ
anya-e0601n:324_4: vā, antimajātiyuttaṃ carimabhavena carimattabhāvena vā yuttaṃ muniṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ
anya-e0601n:331_0: 5. Evaṃ catutthagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni sirīhi lalitantyādīhi catūhi guṇehi
anya-e0601n:331_1: thomitvā vanditukāmo pātodayantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana ta ta ja gaṇadvigarūhi yuttattā
anya-e0601n:331_2: ekādasakkharehi lakkhitā indavajirā gāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “indādikā
anya-e0601n:331_3: tā vajirā jagāgo”ti. Tassattho, yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ tā dveta gaṇā ca jagā jagaṇa garu
anya-e0601n:331_4: ca go garu ca ce bhavanti, sā indā dikā indasaddaādikā vajirā vajirāgāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:332_0: Tattha pātodayanti ettha pāto udayanti padacchedo kātabbo. Page pubbaṇhasamaye pācīnalokadhātuto
anya-e0601n:332_1: uggatanti attho. Pāto page pācīnalokadhātuto udeti uggacchatīti pātodayo, sūriyo.
anya-e0601n:332_2: Pātopubba udadhātu uggamane ayo, taṃ pātodayaṃ. Bāladivā karaṃ vāti bāladivākaraṃ
anya-e0601n:332_3: ivātipadacchedo. Bāladivākaraṃ vāti niggatābhinavasūriyaṃ viya. Ettha ca bāloti sampati
anya-e0601n:332_4: jāto taruṇadārako potako vā. So hi balati assasitapassasitamattena jīvati na seṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:332_5: paññājīvitenāti bālo, taruṇadārako. Baladhātu pāṇane jīvāyaṃ vā. Sūriyaraṃsinā divati
anya-e0601n:332_6: dibbatīti divā. Divudhātu a. Atha vā dīyati khīyati andhakāro etenāti divā. Dīdhātu
anya-e0601n:332_7: khaye a, vāgamo. Taṃ karotīti divākaro, divā divase vā karo ābhā yassāti divākaro,
anya-e0601n:332_8: sūriyo. Bālasadiso divākaro bāladivākaro. Atha vā bālo iva divākaroti bāladivākaro,
anya-e0601n:332_9: navuggatasūriyo. So pana ākāse nakkhattatārānaṃ majjhe sahassaraṃsīhi lalati vilāsati viyāti attho.
anya-e0601n:333_0: Yatīnanti bhikkhūnaṃ. Te hi yatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti kusale dhammeti
anya-e0601n:333_1: yatīti vuccanti. Yata dhātu patiyatane vāyāme vā i. Atha vā yamanti uparamanti akusale
anya-e0601n:333_2: dhammeti yatīti vuccanti. Yamudhātu uparame i. Dhātvantalopo. Tesaṃ yatīnaṃ. Lalitanti
anya-e0601n:333_3: vilāsitaṃ. Lalati vilāsetīti lalito, muni. Laladhātu vilāse ta. Taṃ. Sirīhīti bhagavato
anya-e0601n:333_5: sampattisirīhi vā. Katapuññe nissayatīti sirī. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ rapaccayo itthi liṅgajotakaīpaccayo
anya-e0601n:333_6: ca. Katapuññehi seviyatīti vā sirī, sampatti. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana “sirīti paññāpuññāna
anya-e0601n:333_7: metaṃ adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ. Yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe sirīhi lalitaṃ vilāsitanti
anya-e0601n:333_8: sambandho. Ettha ca idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, yathā pāto udito uggato sūriyo ākāse nakkhattatārānaṃ
anya-e0601n:333_9: majjhe sahassaraṃsīhi lalati vilāsati, evaṃ muni loke yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe bāttiṃsalakkhaṇā
anya-e0601n:333_10: sītyānubyañjanachabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi alaṅkatehi sarīrasobhagga pattīhi sampattisirīhi lalati vilāsatīti.
anya-e0601n:334_0: Puṇṇindusaṅkāsamukhanti puṇṇacandena sadisaṃ ānanasampannaṃ. Yathā hi cando kāḷapakkhe
anya-e0601n:334_1: pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya dine dine ūno hoti, evaṃ na munino mukhaṃ ānanaṃ ūnaṃ.
anya-e0601n:334_2: Bhagavato pana mukhaṃ niccaṃ paripuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya anūnaṃ hutvā sobhati, tasmā
anya-e0601n:334_3: puṇṇasaddena visesetvā puṇṇindusaṅkāsamukhanti thometi. Soḷasakalehi pūretīti puṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:334_4: Pūradhātu ta, tassa ṇṇo. Idati nakkhattatārānaṃ issariyaṃ karotīti indu, ididhātu
anya-e0601n:334_5: issariyaṃ u. Puṇṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ indu puṇṇindu, cando. Saṅkāsanti sadisaṃ. Saṅkāsasaddo
anya-e0601n:338_0: Puṇṇacandaṃ viya mukhati sobhatīti mukhaṃ, ānanaṃ. Mukhadhātu a. Puṇṇindunā saṅkāsaṃ
anya-e0601n:338_1: sadisaṃ mukhaṃ ānanaṃ yassa soti puṇṇindusaṅkāsamukho, munindo. Taṃ. Munindassa pana
anya-e0601n:338_2: puṇṇa candassa sahassaraṃsīhi sassiriko viya bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe bāttiṃsa mahāpurisa
anya-e0601n:338_3: lakkhaṇāsītyānubyañjana paṭimaṇḍitehi sirīhi ca byāmappabhāparikkhittehi āveḷāveḷā
anya-e0601n:338_4: yamakāyamakā gumbāgumbā hutvā viniccharantīhi ghanabuddharasmisaṅkhātehi alaṅkito
anya-e0601n:338_5: sassirikamukho hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā puṇṇindusaṅkāsamukhanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:339_0: Anejanti nittaṇhaṃ. Lābhālābhādiṃ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā, taṇhā. Ejadhātu kampane
anya-e0601n:339_1: a, natthi ejā yassāti anejo, munindo. Vuttañhi mahāniddesapāḷiyaṃ “lābhālābha yasāyasa
anya-e0601n:339_2: nindāninda sukhadukkhehi na iñjatīti anejo, bhagavā labbhatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:340_1: pañcavidhaṃ sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ jānāti paṭivijjhati sīlenāti sabbaññū, munindo. Sabbasaddūpapada
anya-e0601n:340_2: ñādhātu rū. Ettha ca sabbe saṅkhatadhammā saṅkharā nāma sakasakapaccayehi saṅkhariyantīti
anya-e0601n:340_3: katvā. Viññattidvayaṃ lahutādittayañca vikāro nāma catūhi mahābhūtehi virūpaṃ kariyatīti
anya-e0601n:340_4: katvā. Viññattidvayassa yathākkamaṃ cittajavāyodhātu cittajapathavī dhātūnaṃ visesaguṇattā,
anya-e0601n:340_5: lahutādittayassa ca citto tvāhārajanipphannarūpānaṃ visesaguṇattā. Phassādidhammānaṃ
anya-e0601n:340_7: nibbānassa santilakkhaṇañca, rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇañca, nāmassa namanalakkhaṇañca,
anya-e0601n:340_8: aniccatādittayāni ca upacayādicattāri lakkhaṇarūpāni ca lakkhaṇāni nāma lakkhiyanti
anya-e0601n:340_9: etena lakkhitabbā dhammāti katvā. Asaṅkhatadhātunibbānaṃ nāma vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā,
anya-e0601n:340_10: tato nikkhantanti katvā. Paricchedarūpaṃ itthipurisādighaṭapaṭādayo sabba vohāratthā
anya-e0601n:340_11: ca paññatti nāma paññāpiyati pakārena ñāpiyatīti katvā. Ettha ca saṅkhāranibbānāni
anya-e0601n:340_12: paramatthadhammā honti. Vikārādīsu pana vikāralakkhaṇāni paññattivisesattā visuṃ
anya-e0601n:340_13: vuttāni. Imehi dvīhi vinimuttā pana paricchedarūpā sabbavohāratthā paññattīti vuttāti
anya-e0601n:340_14: veditabbā. Apadāna aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sabbaṃ atītādibhedaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya jānātīti sabbaññū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:341_0: Sabbaññūti ca kamasabbaññū, sakiṃ sabbaññū, satatasabbaññū, satti sabbaññū, ñātasabbaññū
anya-e0601n:341_1: cāti pañcavidhā hoti sabbaññū. Tattha yathākkamaṃ sabbaṃ jānanadhammo kamasabbaññū
anya-e0601n:341_2: nāma. Ekāvajjanena javanavārena jānitabbaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ jānanadhammo sakiṃsabbaññū
anya-e0601n:341_3: nāma. Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ niyatārammaṇattaṃ jānanadhammo satatasabbaññū nāma. Ekappahārena
anya-e0601n:341_4: sabbadhammaṃ jānanasamattho dhammo sattisabbaññū nāma. Āvajjanābhedena jānitabbaṃ
anya-e0601n:341_5: sabbadhammaṃ jānanadhammo ñātasabbaññū nāma. Tesu ca sakiṃ sabbaññū sattisabbaññūvasena
anya-e0601n:341_6: dve dhammā maggañāṇāniyeva. Tadavasesā sabbaññutañāṇāni honti. Taṃ sabbaññuṃ.
anya-e0601n:342: Munindanti ettha munisaddassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Munīnaṃ indo issaro munindo, taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ vandāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:343_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Pātodayaṃ pageva udayaṃ uggataṃ, bāladivākaraṃva navuggatasūriyamāṇavoiva,
anya-e0601n:343_1: yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe sirīhi bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇā sītyānubyañjanasampattisaṅkhātehi
anya-e0601n:343_2: sirīhi lalitaṃ vilāsitaṃ, puṇṇindusaṅkāsamukhaṃ puṇṇacandena sadisaṃ ānanavantaṃ,
anya-e0601n:343_3: anejaṃ nittaṇhaṃ, lokadhammehi aniñjanaṃ vā, sabbaññuṃ sabbadhamma vijānantaṃ, munindaṃ
anya-e0601n:343_4: buddhaṃ sakkaccaṃ tīhi dvārehi ahaṃ vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:350_0: 6. Evaṃ pañcamagāthāya munindaṃ vanditvā idāni mārajinaguṇena thomitvā vanditukāmo
anya-e0601n:350_1: upetapuñño tyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana ja ta ja gaṇa dvigaruyuttattā ekādasakkharehi
anya-e0601n:350_2: lakkhitā upendavajirāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “upādikā sāva jatā jagā
anya-e0601n:350_3: go”ti. Tassattho, yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ jatā jagaṇa tagaṇā ca jagā jagaṇagarū ca go garu
anya-e0601n:350_4: ca ce siyā, sāva sāgāthāeva upādikā upasaddādikā indavajirāgāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:351_0: Upetapuñño yo sugato varabodhimūle sasena māraṃ jinitvā aruṇodayamhi bodhiṃ abojjhi
anya-e0601n:351_1: mārajinaṃ abhaṅgaṃ, taṃ sugataṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho. Tattha upetapuññoti sampannadānasīlādipāramīpuññavā.
anya-e0601n:351_2: Dānasīlādi pāramīpuññena samannāgato vā. Dānasīlādipāramīpuññena upeto samupeto upagato
anya-e0601n:351_3: samupagato sampanno samannāgatoti attho. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho, upanno sampanno
anya-e0601n:351_4: hutvā eti gacchati pavattatīti upetaṃ, puññaṃ. Upapubbaidhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Punāti
anya-e0601n:351_5: attano kārakanti puññaṃ, pāramīpuññaṃ labbhati. Pudhātu pīṇane sodhane vā ṇyo. Tassa
anya-e0601n:351_6: ño. Tattha attano kārakanti punappunaṃ pavattiyā sacittasantatiñca saṃjanitapaṇītarūpavisaṭena
anya-e0601n:351_7: sanissaya rūpasantatiñca punāti pīṇeti sodheti vāti attho. Ayaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggagaṇṭhipade
anya-e0601n:351_8: vutto. Pūreti ajjhāsayanti vā puññaṃ. Pūradhātu ṇya. Yo puggalo puññaṃ karoti tassa
anya-e0601n:352_0: Atha vā pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattetīti puññaṃ. Nibbattitaddhitāyaṃ. Pūja padaṃ ṇyapaccayo.
anya-e0601n:352_1: Yo puññaṃ karoti, tassa pūjitabbaṃ bhavaṃ pavattetīti attho. Tena vuttaṃ sammohavinodanī
anya-e0601n:352_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “punāti attano kārakaṃ pūreti cassa ajjhāsayaṃ pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattetīti
anya-e0601n:352_3: puñño”ti. Mūlaṭīkāyañca “punātīti sodheti apuññaphalato dukkhasaṃkilesato ca hitajjhāsayena
anya-e0601n:352_4: puññaṃ karotīti taṃ nipphādanena kārakassajjhāsayaṃ pūretīti puñño. Pūrako pujjanibbattako
anya-e0601n:352_5: ca niruttilakkhaṇena puññoti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāyañca- “punāti
anya-e0601n:352_6: attano santānaṃ apuññaphalato dukkhasaṃkilesato ca visodhetīti puññaṃ. Hitasukhajjhāsayena
anya-e0601n:352_7: puññaṃ karotīti taṃnipphādanena kārakassa ajjhāsayaṃ pūreti, pujjabhavaṃ nibbattetīti
anya-e0601n:352_8: vā puññaṃ. Iti pūrako pujjanibbattako ca niruttinayena puññanti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:352_9: Upetaṃ sampannaṃ puññaṃ pāramīpuññaṃ yassa soti upetapuñño, sugato labbhati.
anya-e0601n:353_0: Varabodhimūleti uttamassa bodhirukkhassa samīpe. Tattha varoti varitabbo patthitabbo
anya-e0601n:353_1: icchitabboti vā varo. Bodhimūleti ettha bodhīti vuccati rukkhopi, maggopi, sabbaññutañāṇampi,
anya-e0601n:353_2: nibbānampi. Tattha hi bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhi sambuddhoti ca, antarā ca bodhiṃ
anya-e0601n:353_3: antarā ca gayanti ca āgataṭṭhāne rukkho. Bodhīti vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇanti āgataṭṭhāne
anya-e0601n:353_4: maggo. Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūri medhasoti āgataṭṭhāne sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Patvāna bodhiṃ
anya-e0601n:353_5: amataṃ asaṅkhatanti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ bodhīti vuccati. Idha pana bodhirukkhoti
anya-e0601n:353_6: adhippeto. Ayaṃ pana tesaṃ vacanattho. Bujjhati abujjhi bujjhissati cattāri ariyasaccāni
anya-e0601n:353_7: sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammampi etthāti bodhi, bodhirukkho. Budhadhātu ṇi. Bujjhati cattāri
anya-e0601n:353_8: saccānīti bodhi, maggo. Bujjhati sabbañeyyadhammanti bodhi, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Ariyena
anya-e0601n:353_9: bujjhitabbanti bodhi, nibbānaṃ labbhati. Varo uttamo bodhirukkhoti varabodhi, tassa
anya-e0601n:354_0: Sasenamāranti saha senāya pavattaṃ mārarājaṃ. Tattha siyati bandhiyatīti senā. Sidhātu
anya-e0601n:354_1: bandhaneyu. Tāya saha pavattatīti saseno, mārarājā. Anatthe niyojento guṇamāraṇena
anya-e0601n:354_2: satte māretīti māro. Maradhātu ṇa. Sattānaṃ kusalaṃ māreti vināsetīti vā māro. Saseno
anya-e0601n:354_3: ca so māro cāti sasenamāro, mārarājā. Taṃ. Jinitvāti pade kammaṃ. Upetapuñño yo sugatoti
anya-e0601n:355_0: Jinitvāti visākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ buddhadine anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye pāramīpuññatejena
anya-e0601n:355_1: vijayitvāti attho. Abojjhīti paṭivijjhi adhigami vā. Bodhinti anuttaraṃ sammā sambodhiṃ,
anya-e0601n:355_2: arahattamaggasabbaññutañāṇanti attho. Sabbaññuta ñāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi maggañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca
anya-e0601n:356_0: Aruṇodayamhīti aruṇaudayamhīti padacchedo. Aruṇuggamanavelāyanti attho. Tattha āsamantato
anya-e0601n:356_1: ālokaṃ karonto unati gacchatīti aruṇo. Āpubbaunadhātu gatimhi ṇa. Ākārassa rasso.
anya-e0601n:356_2: Rakārāgamo. Nassa ṇo. Sūriyassa udayato pubbe uggataraṃsi aruṇo nāmāti attho. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:356_3: dasakanipāta aṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ “sūriyassa bhikkhave udayato etaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ etaṃ
anya-e0601n:356_4: pubbanimittaṃ yadidaṃ aruṇuggaṃ, evameva kho bhikkhave kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ etaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0601n:356_5: etaṃ pubbanimittaṃ yadidaṃ sammādiṭṭhī”ti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:356_7: arati gacchatīti aruṇo”ti vuttaṃ. Udeti uggacchatīti udayo, sūriyo. Udidhātu a. Udayassa
anya-e0601n:356_8: sūriyassa aruṇo uggataraṃsīti aruṇodayo. Tassaṃ aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ. Bodhiṃ abojjhīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:357_0: Bhagavā hi visākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye mārabalaṃ vidhametvā cīvarūpari
anya-e0601n:357_1: patamānehi bodhirukkhaṅkarehi rattapavāḷapallavehi viya pūjayamāno rattiyā paṭhamayāme
anya-e0601n:357_2: pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0601n:357_3: anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasikaritvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ
anya-e0601n:357_4: katvā mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena catutthamaggañāṇena
anya-e0601n:357_5: sabbakilese khepetvā yadā aruṇo uggamissati, tadā sabbaññutañāṇādisabba buddhaguṇe
anya-e0601n:358_0: Mārajinanti pañcamārānaṃ vijitāviṃ. Devaputta kilesābhi saṅkhārakhandhamaccusaṅkhāte
anya-e0601n:358_1: pañcamāre jināti ajini jinissatīti mārajino, sugato. Devaputtakilesābhisaṅkharasaṅkhataṃ
anya-e0601n:358_2: mārattayaṃ jināti ajini, khandhamaccusaṅkhataṃ māradvayaṃ avassaṃ jinissatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:358_3: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vijitāvinti vuttanti. Aviraddhaṃ ekantena jiyamānattāti. Abhaṅganti
anya-e0601n:358_4: sasenamārassa bhañjituṃ viddhaṃsituṃ asamatthaṃ. Yassa kassaci bhañjituṃ viddhaṃsituṃ
anya-e0601n:358_5: asamatthaṃ vā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho. Mārena yena kenaci bhañjituṃ na sakkotīti abhaṅgo,
anya-e0601n:358_6: tena vā na bhañjiyati na viddhaṃsiyatīti abhaṅgo, sugato. Napubba bhanjadhātu ta.
anya-e0601n:358_7: Tassa dhātvantena gakārādeso. Atha vā bhanjati viddhaṃsatīti bhaṅgo, māro. Yo koci
anya-e0601n:358_8: vā. Natthi bhaṅgo māro yo koci vā yassāti abhaṅgo, sugato. Taṃ abhaṅgaṃ. Tanti sugataṃ.
anya-e0601n:358_9: Mārajinaṃ abhaṅgaṃ taṃ sugataṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:359_0: Imissaṃ pana gāthāyaṃ ekanipātajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, apadānaṭṭhakathāyañca āgatanayena
anya-e0601n:359_1: buddhassa māravijayādiṃ sotujanānaṃ bahussutatthaṃ saṅkhepena veditabbaṃ. Bodhi satto
anya-e0601n:359_2: hi mahāsampattiṃ anubhavitvā hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho
anya-e0601n:359_3: chaṭṭetvā ekūnatiṃsavasse āsaḷhipuṇṇamāya uttarasaḷhanakkhattena yutte mahābhinikkhamaṃ
anya-e0601n:359_4: nikkhamitvā anomanadītīre ghaṭīkārabrahmunā dinnaṃ arahatta dhajabhūtaṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāraṃ
anya-e0601n:359_5: paṭiggahetvā nivāsetvā samaṇapabbajjaṃ katvā chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ caritvā nigrodharukkhamūle
anya-e0601n:359_6: senanigame senakuṭumbikassa dhītarāya sujātāya saha satasahassagghiyā suvaṇṇapātiyā
anya-e0601n:359_7: dinnaṃ sabbaṃ appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ ekaṭṭhitālapakkappamāṇaṃ ekūnapaññāsālopaṃ paribhuñjitvā
anya-e0601n:359_8: sāyanhasamaye devatāhi alaṅkatena maggena bodhirukkhābhimukho gacchante antaramagge
anya-e0601n:359_9: sotthiyena nāma tiṇahārakena dinnaṃ aṭṭhamuṭṭhikatiṇaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha
anya-e0601n:359_10: idaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitaṃ acalaṭṭhānaṃ kilesabhañjanaṭṭhānanti ñatvā
anya-e0601n:359_11: tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi. Tāvadeva cuddasahattho pallaṅko ahosi. Tānipi tiṇāni
anya-e0601n:359_12: tathārūpena saṇṭhānena santhariṃsu saṇṭhahiṃsu vā. Yathārūpaṃ sukusalopi vicittakāro
anya-e0601n:359_13: vā potthatāro vā ālikhitumpi samattho natthi. Bodhi satto bodhikhandhaṃ piṭṭhito
anya-e0601n:360: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasussatu;
anya-e0601n:362_0: Na tveva sammāsambodhiṃ apatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti asanisatasannipātenapi
anya-e0601n:362_1: abhejjarūpaṃ taṃ pallaṅkaṃ abhañjitvā nisīdi. Tasmiṃ samaye māro devaputto siddhatthakumāro
anya-e0601n:362_2: “mayhaṃ vasaṃ atikkamitukāmo, na dāni assa atikkamituṃ dassāmī”ti mārabalassa santikaṃ
anya-e0601n:362_3: gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā māraghosanaṃ nāma ghosāpetvā mārabalaṃ ādāya nikkhami.
anya-e0601n:362_4: Sā mārasenā mārassa purato dvādasa yojanā honti. Dakkhiṇato ca vāmato ca dvādasa
anya-e0601n:362_5: yojanā. Pacchato cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā ṭhitā, uddhaṃ navayojanubbedhā. Yassā
anya-e0601n:362_6: unnādantiyā unnādasaddo yojanasahassato paṭṭhāya pathavīundriyasaddo viya suyyati.
anya-e0601n:362_7: Atha māro devaputto diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ girimekhalaṃ nāma hatthiṃ abhirūhitvā bāhusahassaṃ
anya-e0601n:362_8: māpetvā nānāvudhāni aggahesi. Avasesāyapi māraparisāya dve janā ekasadisaṃ āvudhaṃ
anya-e0601n:362_9: na gaṇhiṃsu. Nānappakāravaṇṇā nānappakāra mukhā hutvā mahāsattaṃ ajjhottharamānā āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0601n:363_0: Dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā pana mahāsattassa thuti yo vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Sakko devarājā
anya-e0601n:363_1: vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ dhamamāno aṭṭhāsi. So kira saṅkho vīsahatthasatiko hoti. Sakiṃ
anya-e0601n:363_2: vātaṃ gāhāpetvā dhamanto cattāro māse saddaṃ karitvā nissaddo hoti. Mahākāḷanāga
anya-e0601n:363_3: rājā atirekapadasatena vaṇṇaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi. Mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ dhārayamāno
anya-e0601n:363_4: aṭṭhāsi. Māra bale pana bodhimaṇḍalaṃ upasaṅkamante tesaṃ ekopi ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0601n:363_5: Sammukha sammukhaṭṭhāneneva palāyiṃsu. Kāḷo nāma nāgarājā pathaviṃ nimujjitvā pañcayojanasatikaṃ
anya-e0601n:363_6: mantirakanāgabhavanaṃ gantvā ubhohi hatthehi mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipanno. Sakko vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ
anya-e0601n:363_7: piṭṭhiyaṃ katvā cakkavāḷamukha vaṭṭiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ koṭiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:363_8: gahetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi. Ekadevatāpi ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi. Mahāpuriso
anya-e0601n:363_9: ekakova nisīdi. Māropi attano parisaṃ āha “tāta suddhodanaputtena siddhatthena sadiso
anya-e0601n:363_10: añño puriso nāma natthi, mayaṃ sammukhā yuddhaṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāma, pacchā bhāgena
anya-e0601n:363_11: dassāmā”ti. Mahāpurisopi tīṇi passāni oloketvā sabbadevatānaṃ palāyitattā suññāni
anya-e0601n:363_12: addasa. Puna uttarapassena mārabalaṃ ajjhottharamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ettako jano maṃ
anya-e0601n:363_13: ekakaṃ sandhāya mahantaṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne mayhaṃ mātā vā pitā vā bhātā
anya-e0601n:363_14: vā añño koci ñātako vā natthi, imā pana dasa pāramiyova mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ puttaparijanasadisā,
anya-e0601n:363_15: tasmā mayā pāramiyova phalakaṃ katvā pāramisattheneva paharitvā ayaṃ balakāyo mayā
anya-e0601n:363_16: viddhaṃsetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dasa pāramiyo āvajjamāno nisīdi.
anya-e0601n:364_0: Atha māro devaputto eteneva siddhatthaṃ palāpessāmīti vātamaṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0601n:364_1: Taṅkhaṇaññeyeva puratthimā dibhedā vātā samuṭṭhahitvā aḍḍhayojanaekayojana dviyojanatiyojanappamāṇāni
anya-e0601n:364_2: pabbatakūṭāni padāletvā vanagaccharukkhādīni uddhaṃ mūlāni katvā sāmantā gāmanigame
anya-e0601n:364_3: cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ samatthāpi mahāpurisassa puññatejena mahānubhāvena bodhisattaṃ
anya-e0601n:364_4: patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Tato udakena ajjhottharitvā māressāmāti
anya-e0601n:364_6: vaḷāhakā uṭṭhahitvā vassiṃsu. Vuṭṭhidhārāvegena pathavī bhinnā ahosi. Vanarukkhādīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:364_7: uparibhāgena mahāmegho āgantvā mahā sattassa cīvare ussāvabinduggahaṇamattampi temetuṃ
anya-e0601n:364_8: nāsakkhi. Tato pāsāṇavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni
anya-e0601n:364_9: ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbamālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjiṃsu. Tato paharavassaṃ
anya-e0601n:364_10: samuṭṭhāpesi. Ekatodhārā ubhatodhārā asisattikhurappādayo dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā
anya-e0601n:364_11: bodhisattaṃ patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ. Tato aṅgāravassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Kiṃsukavaṇṇā
anya-e0601n:364_12: aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibba pupphāni hutvā vikiriṃsu. Tato
anya-e0601n:364_13: kukkuḷavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Accuṇho aggivaṇṇo kukkuḷo ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa
anya-e0601n:364_14: pādamūle dibbacandanacuṇṇaṃ hutvā nipatati. Tato vāḷukavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Atisukhumavāḷikā
anya-e0601n:364_15: dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:364_16: Tato kalalavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ kalalavassaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāse nāgantvā
anya-e0601n:364_17: bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbavilepanaṃ hutvā patati. Tato iminā bhiṃsetvā siddhatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:364_18: palāpessāmīti andhakāraṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ andhakāraṃ viya
anya-e0601n:364_19: mahātamaṃ hutvā bodhisattaṃ patvā sūriyappabhā vihataṃ viya antaradhāyati.
anya-e0601n:365_0: Evaṃ māro imāhi navahi vātavassapāsāṇapaharaaṅgāra kukkuḷavāḷuka kalalaandhakāravuṭṭhīhi
anya-e0601n:365_1: bodhisattaṃ palāpetuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ bhaṇe tiṭṭhatha imaṃ siddhatthakumāraṃ gaṇhatha
anya-e0601n:365_2: hanatha palāpethā”ti parisaṃ āṇāpetvā sayampi girimekhalassa hatthino khandhe nisinno
anya-e0601n:365_3: cakkāvudhaṃ ādāya bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “siddhattha uṭṭhāhi etasmā pallaṅkā,
anya-e0601n:365_4: nāyaṃ tumhākaṃ pāpuṇāti, mayhaṃeva pāpuṇātī”ti āha. Mahāsatto tassa vacanaṃ sutvā
anya-e0601n:365_5: avoca “māra neva tayā dasapāramiyo pūritā, na upapāramiyo na paramattha pāramiyo
anya-e0601n:365_6: nāpi pañcamahāpariccāgā pariccattā na ñātatthacariyā na lokatthacariyā na buddhatthacariyā
anya-e0601n:365_7: pūritā, sabbā tā mayāyeva pūritā, tasmā nāyaṃ pallaṅko tuyhaṃ pāpuṇāti, mayhameva
anya-e0601n:365_8: pāpuṇātī”ti. Māro kuddho kodhavegaṃ asahanto mahāpurisassa cakkāvudhaṃ vissajjesi.
anya-e0601n:365_9: Taṃ tassa dasapāramiyo āvajjantassa uparibhāge mālāvitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ kira
anya-e0601n:365_10: khuracakkāvudhaṃ aññadā tena kuddhena vissaṭṭhaṃ ekaghanapāsāṇa thambhe vaṃsakaḷīre
anya-e0601n:365_11: viya chindantaṃ gacchati. Idāni pana tasmiṃ mālāvitānaṃ hutvā ṭhite avasesā māraparisā
anya-e0601n:365_12: idāni pallaṅkato vuṭṭhāya palāyissatīti mahantamahantāni selakūṭāni vissajjesuṃ.
anya-e0601n:365_13: Tānipi mahāpurisassa pāramiyo āvajjantassa mālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:366_0: Devatā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhitā gīvaṃ pasāretvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā “naṭṭho vata
anya-e0601n:366_1: bho siddhatthakumārassa rūpaggappatto attabhāvo, kiṃ nu kho karissatī”ti olokenti.
anya-e0601n:366_2: Tato mahāpuriso pūritapāramīnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ abhi sambujjhanadivase pattapallaṅko
anya-e0601n:366_3: mayhaṃva pāpuṇātīti vatvā ṭhitaṃ māraṃ āha “māra tuyhaṃ dānassa dinnabhāve ko sakkhī”ti.
anya-e0601n:366_4: Māro “ettakā janā sakkhino”ti māra balābhimukhaṃ hatthaṃ pasāreti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe māraparisāya
anya-e0601n:366_5: “ahaṃ sakkhī ahaṃ sakkhī”ti pavattasaddo pathavīundriyasaddasadiso ahosi. Atha kho
anya-e0601n:366_6: māro mahāpurisaṃ āha “siddhattha tuyhaṃ dānassa dinnabhāve ko sakkhī”ti. Mahāpuriso
anya-e0601n:366_7: “tuyhaṃ tāva dānassa dinnabhāve sacetanā sakkhino. Mayhaṃ pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne sacetano
anya-e0601n:366_8: koci sakkhī nāma natthi. Tiṭṭhatu tāva me avasesattabhāvesu dinnadānaṃ, vessantarattabhāve
anya-e0601n:366_9: pana ṭhatvā mayhaṃ sattasattaka mahādānassa dinnabhāve acetanāpi ghanamahāpathavī
anya-e0601n:366_10: sakkhī”ti cīvaragabbhantarato dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā vessantarattabhāve mayhaṃ
anya-e0601n:366_11: sattasattakamahādānassa dinnabhāve tvaṃ sakkhi na sakkhīti mahāpathaviyābhimukhaṃ
