anya-e0601n:366_12: hatthaṃ pasāresi. Mahā pathavī “ahaṃ te dānassa sakkhī”ti viravasahassena viravasatasahassena
anya-e0601n:367_0: Tato mahāpurise dinnaṃ te siddhattha mahādānaṃ uttama dānanti vessantaradānaṃ sammasante
anya-e0601n:367_1: diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko girimekhalo hatthī jāṇukehi patiṭṭhāsi. Māraparisā disāvidisā
anya-e0601n:367_2: palāyiṃsu. Dve ekamaggena gatā nāma natthi. Sīsābharaṇāni ceva vatthābharaṇāni ca
anya-e0601n:367_3: pahāya sammukha sammukhaṭṭhāne disāvidisāhiyeva palāyiṃsu. Tato devasaṅgho palāyamānaṃ
anya-e0601n:367_4: mārabalaṃ disvā mārassa parājayo jāto. Siddhatthakumārassa jayo. Jayapūjaṃ karissāmāti
anya-e0601n:367_5: nāgā nāgānaṃ, supaṇṇā supaṇṇānaṃ, devatā devatānaṃ, brahmāno brahmānaṃ pesetvā gandhamālādi
anya-e0601n:367_6: hatthā mahāpurisassa santikaṃ bodhipallaṅkaṃ āgamaṃsu. Evaṃ gatesu ca panetesu –
anya-e0601n:384_0: Avasesesu dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā mālāgandhavilepanehi ca pūjayamānā nānappakāra
anya-e0601n:384_1: thutiyo ca vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Evaṃ anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye mahāpuriso mārabalaṃ vidhametvā
anya-e0601n:384_2: cīvarūpari pata mānehi bodhirukkhaṅkurehi rattapavāḷapallavehi viya pūjayamāno paṭhamayāme
anya-e0601n:384_3: pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭicca
anya-e0601n:384_4: samuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāresi. Athassa dvādasapadikaṃ paccayā kāraṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena
anya-e0601n:384_5: anulomato paṭilomato sammasantassa dasasahassilokadhātu udakapariyantaṃ katvā dvādasakkhattuṃ
anya-e0601n:384_6: sampakampi. Mahāpurisena pana dasasahassi lokadhātuṃ unnādetvā aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:384_7: sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ paṭivijjhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha pana vuttāvasesaṃ tāsu ca oloketvā gahetabbanti.
anya-e0601n:385_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Upetapuñño sampanna dānādipāramīpuññavā dānādipāramīpuññena
anya-e0601n:385_1: sampanno vā, yo sugato varabodhimūle uttamassa bodhirukkhassa samīpe, sasenamāraṃ
anya-e0601n:385_2: senāya saha pavattaṃ mārarājaṃ, jinitvā pāramīpuññatejena vijayitvā, aruṇodayamhi
anya-e0601n:385_4: bodhiṃ, abojjhi paṭivijjhi adhigami vā, mārajinaṃ pañcamārānaṃ vijitāviṃ, abhaṅgaṃ
anya-e0601n:385_5: sasenamāro yo koci vā bhindituṃ asamatthaṃ taṃ sugataṃ ahaṃ namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:392_0: 7. Evaṃ chaṭṭhamagāthāya sugataṃ vanditvā idāni arahatta maggañāṇādīhi catūhi guṇehi
anya-e0601n:392_1: thomitvā vanditukāmo rāgādityādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana indavajira upendavajira gāthādvayassa
anya-e0601n:392_2: lakkhaṇassa missakattā ekādasakkharehi lakkhitā upajātigāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:392_3: vuttodaye “anantarodīritalakkhaṇā ce, pādāvimissā upajātiyo tā”ti. Tassattho. Yassā
anya-e0601n:392_4: vuttiyā anantaro dīritalakkhaṇā anantare udīritaṃ vuttaṃ indavajiropenda vajiragāthānaṃ
anya-e0601n:392_5: lakkhaṇavantā pādā vimissā saṃsaṭṭhā ce bhavanti, tā vuttiyo upajātiyo nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:393_0: Tattha rāgādichedāmala ñāṇakhagganti ettha rāgaādicheda amalañāṇakhaggantipadacchedo.
anya-e0601n:393_1: Rāgādikilesaṃ chindantaṃ malavira hitaṃ arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ asivantanti attho.
anya-e0601n:393_2: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho. Rūpādīsu rañjatīti rāgo. Ranjadhātu rāge ṇa. Rāgo ādi yesanteti
anya-e0601n:393_3: rāgādayo, kilesā. Te chindatīti rāgādichedaṃ, arahattamaggañāṇaṃ. Apāyaṃ malati dhāretīti
anya-e0601n:393_4: malaṃ, rāgādi. Atha vā malati saṃkilissati etenāti malaṃ. Maladhātu saṃkilesane a.
anya-e0601n:393_5: Malato virahitaṃ amalaṃ, ñāṇaṃ. Cattāri saccāni jānāti paṭivijjhatīti ñāṇaṃ, arahattamaggañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:393_6: Rāgādichedañca amalañca taṃ ñāṇañcāti rāgādichedāmalañāṇaṃ. Rukkhādiṃ khaggati chindati
anya-e0601n:393_7: etenāti vā khaggaṃ, pakatiasi. Khaggaṃ viyāti khaggaṃ, ñāṇaṃ. Rāgādichedāmalañāṇasaṅkhataṃ
anya-e0601n:393_8: khaggaṃ yassa soti rāgādichedāmalañāṇakhaggo, buddho. Rāgādikilesaṃ chindantena malavira
anya-e0601n:393_9: hitena aggamaggañāṇasaṅkhatena asinā samannāgatoti attho. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:394_0: Satīsamaññā phalakābhigāhanti ettha satisamaññāphalaka abhigāhantipadacchedo. Sammāsatināmikaṃ
anya-e0601n:394_1: phalakaṃ daḷhagāha kanti attho. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho. Saraṇaṃ sati, sarati sampayuttadhammā
anya-e0601n:394_2: etāyāti, saratīti vā sati. Saradhātuti. Atha vā pamādaṃ sarati hiṃsatīti sati, sammāsati.
anya-e0601n:394_3: Saradhātu hiṃsāyaṃti. Sammā ājānāti etāyāti samaññā, satiiti samaññā satisamaññā,
anya-e0601n:394_4: asiādisatthaṃ phalati nivāretīti phalakaṃ, kheṭakaṃ. Phaladhātu nivāraṇe ṇvu. Satisamaññaṃ
anya-e0601n:394_5: phalakaṃ abhidaḷhaṃ gaṇhatīti satisamaññāphala kābhigāho, buddho labbhati. Yathā
anya-e0601n:394_6: hi senāya phalakaṃ asiādisatthaṃ rakkhati, evaṃ satisaṃvaro cakkhādi dvāresu rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:394_7: pavisituṃ adatvā rakkhati. Tasmā bhagavā satidhammo sabbākusalānaṃ rakkhakattā sabbakusala
anya-e0601n:394_8: dhammānaṃ upakārattā sabbatthānaṃ sādhakattā ca satiphalakaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhatīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0601n:394_9: hoti. Vuttañhi “ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā,
anya-e0601n:394_10: appamādo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti ca. “Satiṃ khvāhaṃ bhikkhave sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:395_0: Sīloghalaṅkāravibhūsitanti sīlaoghaalaṅkāra vibhū sitanti padacchedo. Visuddhasīlānaṃ
anya-e0601n:395_1: samūhasaṅkhātena alaṅkārena vibhūsitanti attho. Tattha sīlanti lokuttara sīlaṃ. Tassa
anya-e0601n:395_2: attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Taṃ pana cetanā sīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo
anya-e0601n:395_3: sīlañcāti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātā dīhi vā viramantassa
anya-e0601n:395_4: vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanā. Cetasikasīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa
anya-e0601n:395_5: virati. Saṃvaro sīlanti ettha saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, sati saṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro,
anya-e0601n:395_6: khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaro cāti pañcavidho hoti, sabbametaṃ saṃvaro sīlaṃ nāma.
anya-e0601n:395_7: Avītikkamo sīlaṃ nāma samādinnasīlassa kāyikavācasiko anatikkamoti. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:395_8: “kiṃsīlanticetanā sīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīla”nti. Idha
anya-e0601n:395_9: pana avītikkamo sīlaṃ nādhippetaṃ. Kasmā. Bhagavato samādinnasikkhāpadassa abhāvato.
anya-e0601n:395_10: Buddhānañhi sikkhāpadaṃ nāma natthīti. Oghoti samūho. Oghasaddo hi samūhavācako.
anya-e0601n:397: Sandoho nivaho ogho, visaro nikaro cayo”tyādi.
anya-e0601n:398_0: Avahanati gacchati pavattati avayavaṃ etthāti ogho, samūho. Avapubbahanadhātu gatimhi
anya-e0601n:398_1: ṇo. Avassa o, hanassa gho. Abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ pana “avayavaṃ katvā byāpiyati
anya-e0601n:398_2: gacchatīti ogho”ti vuttaṃ. Sīlānaṃ ogho samūho sīlogho. Alaṅkāroti piḷandhano. Alaṃ
anya-e0601n:398_3: vibhusaṃ taṃ samaṅgīpuggalaṃ karoti anenāti alaṅkāro, sīlaṃ. Alaṃsaddūpapadakaradhātu
anya-e0601n:398_4: ṇo. Sīlogho eva alaṅkāro sīloghālaṅkāro, tena vibhū siyatīti sīloghalaṅkāravibhūsito,
anya-e0601n:398_5: buddho. Tena pana aññehi asādhāraṇena lokuttarasīlālaṅkārena vibhūsito. Na cīvarādinālaṅkārenāti
anya-e0601n:398_6: attho. Sīlālaṅkārena hi sadiso alaṅkāro nāma natthi. Taṃ sīloghalaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:399_0: Namāmibhiññāvaramiddhupetanti ettha namāmi abhiññāvaraṃ iddhi upetanti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:399_1: Tattha namāmīti vandāmi. Abhiññāvaramiddhupetanti abhiññāsaṅkhātāya uttamāya iddhiyā
anya-e0601n:399_2: samannāgatanti attho. Abhivisesena jānātīti abhiññā, chabbidhaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Tañhi iddhividhadibbasota
anya-e0601n:399_3: paracitta vijānana pubbenivāsānussati cutūpapāta āsavakkhaya ñāṇavasena chabbidhaṃ
anya-e0601n:399_4: hoti. Tattha iddhividhañāṇanti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādinayappavatte iddhividhe
anya-e0601n:399_7: Pubbenivāsā nussatiñāṇanti attasantāne vutthavasena ceva gocara nivāsavasena ca pubbe
anya-e0601n:399_8: atītabhavesu khandhādīnaṃ anussaraṇa satiyā sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Cutūpapātañāṇanti
anya-e0601n:399_9: sattānaṃ cutiyañca upapāte ca jānanañāṇaṃ. Ettha ca aṭṭhakathāsu cutūpapātañāṇaṭṭhāne
anya-e0601n:399_10: tassa sādhakattā dibbacakkhuñāṇanti vuttaṃ. Āsavakkhayañāṇanti saccaparicchedassa
anya-e0601n:399_11: jānanaṃ arahatta maggañāṇanti. Varanti uttamaṃ. Iddhīti ijjhanaṃ samijjhanaṃ. Ijjhati
anya-e0601n:399_12: samijjhatīti vā iddhi. Idhadhātuti. Abhiññāsaṅkhātāya varāya iddhiyā upeto samupeto
anya-e0601n:399_13: samannāgatoti abhiññāvaramiddhupeto, buddho. Taṃ abhiññāvaramiddhupetaṃ. Taṃ buddhaṃ
anya-e0601n:400_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Rāgādichedāmalañāṇa khaggaṃ rāgādikilesaṃ chindantaṃ
anya-e0601n:400_1: malavirahitaṃ arahattamaggañāṇa saṅkhātaṃ asivantaṃ, satīsamaññāphalakābhigāhaṃ sammā
anya-e0601n:400_2: satināmikaṃ phalakaṃ daḷhagahaṇaṃ, sīloghalaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ sīlānaṃ samūhasaṅkhātena
anya-e0601n:400_3: alaṅkārena vibhūsitaṃ, abhiññā varamiddhupetaṃ abhiññāsaṅkhātāya varāya uttamāya
anya-e0601n:400_4: iddhiyā upetaṃ samupetaṃ samannāgataṃ taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:407_0: 8. Evaṃ sattamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni mahākaruṇā dīhi navahi guṇehi thomitvā
anya-e0601n:407_1: vanditukāmo dayālayantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana ja ta ja ragaṇehi yuttattā dvādasakkharehi
anya-e0601n:407_2: lakkhitā catupādantayamakā vaṃsaṭṭhagāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “vadanti
anya-e0601n:407_3: vaṃsaṭṭhamidaṃ jatā jarā”ti. Tassattho, yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ jatā jatagaṇā ca jarā jaragaṇā
anya-e0601n:407_4: ca ce bhavanti, idaṃ vuttaṃ vaṃsaṭṭhaṃ vaṃsaṭṭhagāthā nāmāti munayo isayo vadantīti.
anya-e0601n:408_0: Tattha dayālayanti mahākaruṇāya ca, mettāya ca ādhāraṃ. Dayāsaddo hi karuṇāya ca,
anya-e0601n:408_1: mettāya ca vattati. Adayāpannoti ettha hi karuṇāya vattati. Nikkaruṇikataṃ āpannoti
anya-e0601n:408_2: attho. Dayāpannoti ettha mettāya mettacittataṃ āpannoti attho. Idha pana tadubhayampi
anya-e0601n:408_3: vaṭṭati. Tasmā dayā ca dayā ca dayāti saddasarūpekaseso kātabbo. Vacanattho panettha
anya-e0601n:408_4: evaṃ veditabbo. Dayati hiṃsati kāruṇikanti dayā, mahākaruṇā. Dayadhātu hiṃsāyaṃ a.
anya-e0601n:408_5: Yā karuṇā yāva yathādhippetaṃ parassa hitanipphattiṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva kāruṇikaṃ
anya-e0601n:408_6: hiṃsatīti attho. Dayati hiṃsati apaneti paradukkhanti vā dayā. Atha vā dayati attano
anya-e0601n:408_7: sukhampi pahāya khedaṃ gaṇhāti sajjano etāyāti dayā, dayati anuggaṇhāti pāpajanampi
anya-e0601n:408_8: etāyāti vā dayā, dayanti gaṇhanti bodhisattā sammāsambodhiṃ etāyāti vā dayā, bodhisattā
anya-e0601n:408_9: buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārakaraṇa kāle hatthagatampi aggaphalaṃ chaṭṭetvā mahākaruṇāya
anya-e0601n:408_10: saṃsārasāgarato satte samuddharitukāmā anassāsa karaṃ mahantaṃ saṃsāradukkhañca pacchimabhave
anya-e0601n:408_11: saha amata dhātupaṭilābhena anekaguṇasamalaṅkataṃ sabbaññutañāṇañca gaṇhantīti attho.
anya-e0601n:408_12: Dayati dadāti sattānaṃ abhayaṃ etāyāti dayā, mettā. Dayadhātu dāne a. Dayati gacchati
anya-e0601n:408_13: vibhāgaṃ akatvā sattesu samaṃ pavattatīti dayā. Yathā udakaṃ sabbasattesu sītena
anya-e0601n:408_14: samaṃ pharati rajomalañca pavāheti, evaṃ mettā pāpakalyāṇajanesu vibhāgaṃ akatvā
anya-e0601n:409_0: Aparo nayo. Dayanti anurakkhanti satte etāya, sayaṃ vā anuddayati anuddayamattameva
anya-e0601n:409_1: vā etanti dayā, karuṇāmettā labbhanti. Tāya ālayati patiṭṭhati etthāti dayālayo,
anya-e0601n:409_2: buddho. Bhagavā hi devadattādīsu virodhi sattesu ca avirodhisattesu orase rāhule
anya-e0601n:409_3: ca samaṃ niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatāya mahākaruṇāya mettāya ca ṭhito, tasmā dayālayanti
anya-e0601n:412_0: Sabbadhīti sabbasmiṃ attabhāve. Buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya sabbattabhāvesūti
anya-e0601n:412_1: attho. Dukkaranti dukkhena karitabbaṃ pañcamahāpariccāgādikammaṃ dukkhena karitabbanti
anya-e0601n:412_2: dukkaraṃ, pañcamahāpariccāgādikammaṃ labbhati. Ettha ca pañcamahā pariccāgoti dhanapariccāgo,
anya-e0601n:412_3: aṅgapariccāgo, puttapariccāgo, bhariyapariccāgo, jīvitapariccāgo cāti pañcavidho
anya-e0601n:412_4: hoti. Tattha hatthiassa dāsidāsādi saviññāṇakassa dhanassa vā muttāmaṇirajatādi aviññāṇakassa
anya-e0601n:412_5: dhanassa vā pariccāgo dhanapariccāgo nāma. Hatthapādacakkhukaṇṇanāsādisarīrāva yavassa
anya-e0601n:412_6: pariccāgo aṅgapariccāgo nāma. Puttassa ca dhītuyā ca pariccāgo puttapariccāgo nāma.
anya-e0601n:412_7: Bhariyāya pariccāgo bhariyapariccāgo nāma. Jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhassa sarīrassa pariccāgo
anya-e0601n:412_8: jīvitapariccāgo nāma. Kiñcāpi pana dhanapariccāgā dayo dānapāramiyaṃyeva antogadhā,
anya-e0601n:412_10: visuṃ katanti adhippāyo. Mahāpadānasuttaṭīkāyaṃ pana “aṅgapariccāgo, nayanapariccāgo,
anya-e0601n:412_11: attapariccāgo, rajjapariccāgo, puttadārapariccāgoti ime pañca mahāpariccāgā. Tatthapi
anya-e0601n:412_13: sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca mahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tatoyeva ca aṅgapariccāgatopi
anya-e0601n:412_15: kata”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ dukkaraṃ. Idaṃ pana karanti etassa kammapadaṃ. Karanti karontaṃ,
anya-e0601n:413_0: Bhavaṇṇavātikkamamaggatanti ettha bhavaaṇṇavaatikkamaṃ aggatanti padacchedo. Bhavaṇṇavātikkamanti
anya-e0601n:413_1: kāmarūpaarūpabhavasaṅkhatā aṇṇavā samuddato atikkantaṃ. Bhavanti sattā etthāti bhavo.
anya-e0601n:413_2: Aṇṇo vuccati udakaṃ. Taṃ etasmiṃ atthīti aṇṇavā, samuddo. Bhavasaṅkhāto aṇṇavoti
anya-e0601n:413_3: bhavaṇṇavā, mahāsamuddo. Bahūhi ūmivegādīhi bhayehi okiṇṇo viya tividhopi bhavo bahūhi
anya-e0601n:413_4: jātijarāmaraṇādīhi dukkhabhayehi okiṇṇo hoti, tasmā bhavaṇṇavāti vuccati. Taṃ atikkamittha
anya-e0601n:413_5: uttaritthāti bhavaṇṇavātikkamo, buddho. Tassa hi gambhīre mahāudakakkhandhe mahāsamudde
anya-e0601n:413_6: udakaṃ abbocchinnaṃ pavattati sandatiiva tibhavasaṅkhate saṃsāre paṭisandhicutiyo
anya-e0601n:413_8: asesaṃ viddhaṃsitattā tīsu bhavesu punabbhavo natthi. Tasmā buddhaṃ bhavaṇṇavātikkamanti
anya-e0601n:413_9: abhitthavituṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ bhavaṇṇavātikkamaṃ.
anya-e0601n:414_0: Aggatanti sabbasattānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu
anya-e0601n:414_1: dissati. Tathā hesa ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatantiādīsu ādimhi dissati. Teneva
anya-e0601n:414_2: aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyyātiādīsu koṭiyaṃ. Anujānāmi bhikkhave vihāraggena
anya-e0601n:414_3: vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetuntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. Aggo hamasmi lokassātiādīsu seṭṭhe.
anya-e0601n:414_4: Svāyamidhapi soyeva daṭṭhabbo. Devamanussānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ ajati gacchatīti aggo,
anya-e0601n:414_5: buddho. Asadisaṭṭhena guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena asamasamaṭṭhena ca aggo seṭṭho nāmāti attho.
anya-e0601n:414_6: Atha vā dullabhapātu bhāvato acchariyamanussabhāvato bahujanahitasukhāvahato adutiyaasahāyādibhāvato
anya-e0601n:414_7: ca bhagavā loke aggo seṭṭho nāmāti attho. Vuttañhi aṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ “yāvatā bhikkhave
anya-e0601n:414_8: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:414_9: Aggassa bhāvo aggataṃ. Taṃ pana gatantietassa kammapadaṃ. Gatanti pattaṃ, pāpuṇantanti attho.
anya-e0601n:415_0: Tilokanāthanti kāmarūpaarūpasaṅkhatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ. Ettha ca lokasaddassa
anya-e0601n:415_1: attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Tayo lokā tilokā. Nāthasaddo pana nipphannānipphannavasena
anya-e0601n:415_2: duvidho hoti. Tattha anipphannanāthasaddo paṭisaraṇattho hoti saṅketavasena. Tathā
anya-e0601n:415_3: hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ, lokasammutikāraṇa”nti. Tilokānaṃ
anya-e0601n:415_4: nātho paṭisaraṇoti tilokanātho, buddho. Sabbānatthaparihāra pubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāyaniratisayāya
anya-e0601n:415_6: ca sabbasattuttamo bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ ekapaṭisaraṇo nāmāti attho.
anya-e0601n:416_0: Nipphannanāthasaddo pana yācane, upatāpe, issariye, āsīse cāti catūsvatthesu vattati.
anya-e0601n:416_1: Tattha yācane nāthati yācatīti nātho, buddho. Nāthadhātu a. So pana veneyyasatte
anya-e0601n:416_2: attano hitakaraṇe yācitvāpi niyojetīti attho. Atha vā bhagavā sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu
anya-e0601n:416_3: kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyātiādinā sattānaṃ taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ
anya-e0601n:416_4: yācitvāpi karuṇāya samussāhito te tattha niyojeti. Tasmā nātho nāmāti attho. Upatāpe
anya-e0601n:416_5: nāthati veneyyagate kilese upatāpetīti nātho, buddho. Dhammadesanāya veneyyasantāne
anya-e0601n:416_6: kilese viddhaṃsāpetīti attho. Issariye nāthati issariyati satteti nātho. Paramena
anya-e0601n:416_7: pana cittissariyena samannāgato bhagavā sabbasatte dhammena isati abhibhavatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:416_8: Āsīse pana nāthati āsīsatīti nātho. Veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ mettāya navasena patthetīti
anya-e0601n:416_9: attho. Tilokānaṃ nātho tilokanātho, buddho. Taṃ tilokanāthaṃ.
anya-e0601n:417_0: Susamāhitanti lābhālābhādilokadhammehi acala mānattā sundarasamādhivantaṃ. Saṃsamaṃ
anya-e0601n:417_1: ādhiyati ekārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme ṭhapeti etenāti samādhi. Saṃpubba dhā dhātu
anya-e0601n:417_2: i. Sundaro pasattho vā samādhi susamādhi. Taṃ assa atthīti susamāhito, buddho. Assathyatthe
anya-e0601n:417_3: to. Pabbatotiādīsu viya. Dhassa ho. Catūhi disāhi āgatehi vātehi acalamāno mahāmerupabbato
anya-e0601n:417_4: viya bhagavā lābhālābhādilokadhammehi ca micchāvāda vātehi ca acalamānena samādhinā
anya-e0601n:418_0: Hitanti manussadevabrahmasaṅkhātānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ payojana dhārentaṃ. Kāraṇānurūpaṃ
anya-e0601n:418_1: hinoti pavattatīti hitaṃ, payojanaṃ. Hidhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Taṃ dhāretīti hito, buddho.
anya-e0601n:418_2: Kitanta samāsoyaṃ. Hitadharanti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthāya uttara padalopena
anya-e0601n:418_3: hitanti vattabbaṃ. Yathā samajjanī padīpoti. Atha vā dukkhaṃ hiṃsatīti hitaṃ. Hiṃsadhātu
anya-e0601n:418_4: hiṃsāyaṃ tapaccayo. Yathā ca byādhiyā osamaṃ rogīnaṃ hitanti vuccati, evaṃ dukkhahananato
anya-e0601n:418_5: hitaṃ nāma hoti. Sukhaṃ vidadhātīti vā hitaṃ. Dhādhātu dhāraṇe ta. Yathā ca rudhiramaṃsādi
anya-e0601n:418_6: dhātu vaḍḍhanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ kissānaṃ hitanti vuccati, evaṃ sukhavahanato hitanti
anya-e0601n:418_7: vuccati. Payojanaṃ taṃ dhāretīti hito, buddho. So pana dhammadesanāya veneyyajanānaṃ
anya-e0601n:418_8: dukkhāpanayanampi ñāṇaparipācanampi katvā lokiyalokuttarahitasukhaṃ dhāretīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ hitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:419_0: Samantacakkhunti ettha cakkhu nāma buddhacakkhu, dhammacakkhu, ñāṇa cakkhu, samantacakkhu,
anya-e0601n:419_1: dibbacakkhūti pañcavidhaṃ hoti. Tattha addasaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhave buddhacakkhunā
anya-e0601n:419_2: lokaṃ volokentoti idaṃ buddhacakkhu nāma. Virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhunti idaṃ
anya-e0601n:419_3: heṭṭhimamaggatta yasaṅkhātaṃ dhammacakkhu nāma. Cakkhuṃ udapādīti idaṃ ñāṇacakkhu
anya-e0601n:419_4: nāma. Samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutañāṇanti idaṃ samantacakkhu nāma. Addasaṃ kho
anya-e0601n:419_5: ahaṃ bhikkhave dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenāti idaṃ dibbacakkhu nāma. Idha pana samantacakkhu
anya-e0601n:419_6: adhippetaṃ. Parisamantato sabbañeyyadhammaṃ passantaṃ sabbaññutañāṇavantanti attho.
anya-e0601n:419_7: Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Samantato sabbañeyyadhammaṃ cakkhati passatīti samantacakkhu,
anya-e0601n:419_8: sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Cakkhadhātu u. Tena vuttaṃ mahāniddesapāḷiyaṃ “samantacakkhu vuccati
anya-e0601n:419_9: sabbaññutañāṇa”nti. Samantacakkhu assa atthīti samantacakkhu, buddho. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge –
anya-e0601n:424_0: Tassattho. Tassa tathāgatassa addiṭṭhaṃ apassantaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ idhaloke na
anya-e0601n:424_1: atthi. Atho aviññātaṃ aviditaṃ apākaṭaṃ vā ajānitabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ na atthi. Neyyaṃ
anya-e0601n:424_2: ñātabbaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ atthi. Sabbaṃ taṃ dhammajātaṃ tathāgato abhiññāsi paṭivijjhi.
anya-e0601n:424_3: Tena tasmā tathāgato samantacakkhu nāmāti. Taṃ samantacakkhuṃ.
anya-e0601n:425_0: Paṇamāmi taṃmitanti ettha paṇamāmi taṃ amitanti padacchedo. Amitaṃ taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ
anya-e0601n:425_1: paṇamāmīti sambandho. Tattha amitanti aparimeyyaṃ ñāṇena aparicchinnaṃ vā, sīlasamādhi
anya-e0601n:425_2: paññādiguṇavantaṃ. Amitabbaṃ ñāṇena aparicchinditabbanti vā amitaṃ, sīlādiguṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:425_3: Napubba mādhātu parimāṇe ta. Taṃ assa atthīti amito, buddho. Yathā hi mahāsamudde
anya-e0601n:425_4: na sukaraṃ udakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ ettakāni udakāḷhakānīti vā, ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānīti
anya-e0601n:425_5: vā, ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānīti vā, ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānīti vāti. Atha
anya-e0601n:425_6: kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, evameva buddhassa
anya-e0601n:425_7: na sukaraṃ sīlādiguṇassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ ettakaṃ sīlaguṇaṃ, ettako samādhiguṇo, ettakā
anya-e0601n:425_8: paññāguṇātiādināti. Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāguṇakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0601n:433_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Dayālayaṃ mahākaruṇāya mettāya ādhāraṃ. Sabbadhi sabbasmiṃ
anya-e0601n:433_1: attabhāve, dukkaraṃ dukkhena karitabbaṃ pañcamahāpariccāgādikammaṃ karaṃ karontaṃ,
anya-e0601n:433_2: bhavaṇṇavātikkamaṃ tibhavasaṅkhātasamuddato atikkantaṃ, aggataṃ sabbasattānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ,
anya-e0601n:433_3: gataṃ pattaṃ, tilokanāthaṃ kāmarūpa arūpasaṅkhātassa tilokassa paṭisaraṇaṃ, susamāhitaṃ
anya-e0601n:433_4: sundara samādhivantaṃ, hitaṃ sabbasattānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ atthadhāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:433_5: samantacakkhuṃ parisamantato sabbañeyyadhammaṃ passantaṃ sabbaññutañāṇavantaṃ, amitaṃ
anya-e0601n:433_6: aparimeyyaṃ sīlādiguṇavantaṃ, taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ paṇamāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:440_0: 9. Evaṃ aṭṭhamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni pāramisañcayaṃ cayantyādīhi pañcahi
anya-e0601n:440_1: guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo tahiṃ tahiṃ pāramisañcayaṃcayantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana
anya-e0601n:440_2: jatajara gaṇehi yuttattā dvādasakkharehi lakkhitā sabbapādādyantayamakā vaṃsaṭṭhagāthāti
anya-e0601n:440_3: daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “vadanti vaṃsaṭṭhamidaṃ jatā jarā”ti. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:441_0: Tattha tahiṃ tahinti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave attabhāve vā, buddhavaraṃ paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0601n:441_1: tesu tesu bhavesu attabhāvesu vāti attho. Pāramisañcayanti dānādipā ramīnaṃ samūhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:441_2: Ettha ca pāramī nāma dānasīlanekkhammapaññā vīriya khantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāvasena
anya-e0601n:444_0: Ayaṃ pana pāramīsaddassa vacanattho. Dānasīlādiguṇa visesayogena sattuttamatāya mahābodhisatto
anya-e0601n:444_1: paramo. Tassa ayaṃ bhāvo kammanti vā pāramī, dānādi kriyāva labbhati. Santakabhāvakammataddhite
anya-e0601n:444_2: ṇapaccayo. Itthiliṅgajotaka īpaccayo ca. Atha vā dānādīni pūretīti paramo. Dānādiguṇānaṃ
anya-e0601n:444_3: pūrako pālako ca bodhisatto. Pūradhātu amapaccayo. Pare satte mavati attani bandhati
anya-e0601n:444_4: guṇavisesayogenāti vā paramo, bodhisatto. Parasaddūpapada mudhātu bandhane kvi. Paraṃ
anya-e0601n:444_5: atirekaṃ majjati kilesamalatoti vā paramo. Parasaddūpa pada majjadhātu saṃsuddhiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:444_6: kvi. Parasaddo atirekattho. Paraṃ seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena mayati gacchatīti vā
anya-e0601n:444_7: paramo. Parasaddūpapada mayadhātu gatiyaṃ kvi. Dhātvantalopo. Para saddo seṭṭhattho.
anya-e0601n:444_8: Paraṃ lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇa visesena idhalokamiva munāti paricchindatīti vā paramo.
anya-e0601n:444_9: Parasaddūpa pada munadhātu paricchindane kvi. Paraṃ ati viya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano
anya-e0601n:444_10: santāne minoti pakkhipatīti vā paramo. Parasaddūpapada midhātu pakkhipane kvi. Parasaddo
anya-e0601n:444_11: atirekavācako. Paraṃ attabhūtadhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:444_12: mināti hiṃsatīti vā paramo, mahābodhisatto. Parasaddūpapada midhātu hiṃsāyaṃ kvi.
anya-e0601n:444_13: Parasaddo aññavācako, paṭipakkhavācako vā. Paramassa ayantiādinā vuttanayena pāramīti.
anya-e0601n:444_14: Api ca pāre nibbāne majjati sujjhatīti pāramī, mahābodhi satto. Suddhakattusādhanoyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:444_15: Pārasaddūpapada majadhātu saṃsuddhiyaṃ kvi. Ī ca. Pāre nibbāne satte majjati sodhetīti
anya-e0601n:445_0: Pārenibbāne satte mavati bandhati yojetīti vā pāramī. Pāraṃ nibbānaṃ mayati gacchati
anya-e0601n:445_1: satte ca māyeti gameti vā pāramī. Pāraṃ nibbānaṃ yāthāvato munāti paricchindatīti
anya-e0601n:445_2: vā pāramī. Pāre nibbāne satte minoti pakkhipatīti vā pāramī. Midhātu pakkhipane ī.
anya-e0601n:445_3: Pāre nibbāne sattānaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti vā pāramī, mahābodhisatto. Tassa ayaṃ bhāvo
anya-e0601n:445_4: kammanti dānādikriyā pāramīti. Iminā vuttanayena pāramīsaddassa vacanattho veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:445_5: Kiñcāpi pana pāramīsaddassa nibbacanaṃ saṅkhepena vuttaṃ. Sotūnaṃ pana niruttinayakosallatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:446_0: Sā pana dasapāramī, dasaupapāramī, dasaparamatthapāramī cāti tividhā hoti. Tattha
anya-e0601n:446_1: saviññāṇāviññāṇakaṃ dhanaṃ pariccāgaṃ katvā pūritā bodhisambhārā dasapāramiyo nāma.
anya-e0601n:446_2: Hattha pāda kaṇṇa nāsādiaṅgapaccaṅgapariccāgaṃ katvā pūritā bodhisambhārā dasaupapāramiyo
anya-e0601n:446_3: nāma. Jīvitindriyapariccāgaṃ katvā pūritā bodhisambhārā dasa paramatthapāramiyo nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:446_4: Dānādipāramīnaṃ pana attho cariyapiṭakaaṭṭhakathādīsu gahetabbo. Avayavaṃ saṅgahavasena
anya-e0601n:446_5: cayati gacchati pavattatīti sañcayo, saṃpubba cidhātu gatiyaṃ ṇa. Sañcinoti avayavanti
anya-e0601n:446_6: vā sañcayo, samūho. Pāramīnaṃ sañcayo samūhoti pāramisañcayo, taṃ pāramisañcayaṃ.
anya-e0601n:446_7: Taṃ pana cayanti etassa kammaṃ. Cayanti upacitaṃ, parisambhūtanti attho. Cayati upacinātīti
anya-e0601n:446_8: cayo, ciyittha upaciyitthāti vā cayo, buddho. Cidhātu upacaye ṇa. Taṃ cayaṃ. Sabbhigatanti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:447_0: Tattha sabbhīti santehi sappurisehi. Rāgādikilese samenti upasamentīti santā, sappurisā.
anya-e0601n:447_1: Samudhātu upasameta, antapaccayo vā. Santehīti vattabbe smāhismiṃnaṃ mhā bhimhivāti
anya-e0601n:447_2: suttena hivibhattiyā bhikāraṃ santasaddassa so bhe bo canteti suttena bhakāre pare
anya-e0601n:447_3: santasaddassa sakāraṃ katvā ante ca bakārāgamaṃ katvā sabbhīti vuttaṃ. Tehi sabbhi.
anya-e0601n:447_4: Taṃ pana gatanti etassa avuttakattā. Gatanti upagamitabbaṃ. Tañhi devamanussehi gamiyati
anya-e0601n:447_5: upagamiyati upasaṅkamiyatīti gatoti vuccati. Taṃ buddhaṃ atthakāmehi sappurisehi
anya-e0601n:447_6: devamanussehi sīlādianantaguṇikattā saraṇanti abhimānā payirupāsitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:447_7: Taṃ gataṃ. Sukhappadaṃ padaṃ gatanti sambandho. Tattha sukhappadanti accantasukhassa
anya-e0601n:447_8: patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Sukhanaṃ sukhaṃ, tassa pajjati tiṭṭhati etthāti sukhappadaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:447_9: Padanti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi buddhādīhi ariyehi pajjiyati gamiyatīti padanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:447_10: Gatanti agaminti gato, buddho. Dukkhādiasammissassa ekantasukhassa patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:447_11: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena apāpuṇinti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ gataṃ.
anya-e0601n:448_0: Narānarānanti naraanarānanti padacchedo. Manussadevānanti attho. Pabbajjādiseṭṭhabhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:448_1: narati netīti naro, narīyati sakena kammena niyatīti vā naro, manusso, satto vā.
anya-e0601n:448_2: Naradhātu nayane a. Na naro anaro, devo. Naro ca anaro ca narānaro, tesaṃ narānarānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:449_1: puññaṃ vā. Sukhayatīti sukhaṃ. Tividhasukhaṃ. Yassa uppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti
anya-e0601n:449_2: attho. Atha vā suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ. Supubbakhanudhātu avadhāraṇe a. Sambhavati
anya-e0601n:449_3: sukhasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ anena puññenāti sambhavaṃ, puññakaraṇaṃ. Saṃpubbabhūdhātu sattāyaṃṇa.
anya-e0601n:449_4: Sukhassa sambhavaṃ sukhasambhavaṃ, taṃ pana bhavantipade kammaṃ. Bhavanti nibbattentaṃ.
anya-e0601n:449_5: Taṃ sukhasambhavaṃ bhāveti nibbattetīti bhavo, buddho. Taṃ bhavaṃ. So hi mahākaruṇāpubbaṅgamāya
anya-e0601n:449_7: puññaṃ kāreti, tasmā bhagavato narānarānaṃ sukhasambhavaṃ bhavanti thometīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:450_0: Namānamānanti padassa name anamānanti padacchedo. Nameti ahaṃ namāmīti attho. Ettha
anya-e0601n:450_1: ca mivibhattiyā ekārādesoti veditabbo. Anamānanti anamentānaṃ avandantānaṃ anādarānanti
anya-e0601n:450_2: attho. Taṃ pana gavantietassa visesanaṃ. Gavanti goṇasadisānaṃ bālānaṃ. Gavanti hi
anya-e0601n:450_3: chaṭṭhībahuvacanantanāmapadaṃ. Tato namaṃ patimhālutte ca samāseti sutte samabhiniviṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:450_4: caggahaṇena naṃvacanassa aṃ ādesañca goiccetassa okārassa avādesaṃ katvā rūpasiddhi
anya-e0601n:450_5: veditabbā. Gacchantīti gāvo, goṇā. Gāvo viyāti gāvo, tesaṃ gavaṃ bālānaṃ. Taṃ pana
anya-e0601n:450_6: jinapuṅgavantipade chaṭṭhīkammaṃ. Jinapuṅgavanti jayantapurisuttamaṃ buddhaṃ name
anya-e0601n:450_7: namāmīti sambandho. Ettha ca puṅgava saddo kammadhārayasamāse seṭṭhatthavācako. Munipuṅgavotiādīsu
anya-e0601n:453_0: Tassattho. Kammadhārayasamāse uttarapade vattamānā byagghapuṅgavosabhakuñjarā byagghapuṅgavausabhakuñjarasaddā
anya-e0601n:453_1: ca sīha saddūlanāgādyā sīha saddūla nāgāsaddā ca pume seṭṭhattha vācakāti. Ayaṃ panettha
anya-e0601n:453_2: vacanattho. Go viya buddhaguṇe ajānante anamante aññadiṭṭhike bāle jināti ajinīti
anya-e0601n:453_3: vā jino. Pakaṭṭhabhāvaṃ padhānabhāvaṃ vā uddhaṃ gacchatīti puṅgavo. Paupubba gamudhātu
anya-e0601n:453_4: gatiyaṃ avapaccayo. Niggahitā gamo. Tassa kavaggantaṃ dhātvantalopañca yadādinā katvā
anya-e0601n:453_5: rūpasiddhi veditabbā. Jino ca so puṅgavo cāti jinapuṅgavo, buddho. So pana gunnaṃ
anya-e0601n:453_6: viya buddhānaṃ sīlādike appameyyaguṇe ajānantānaṃ anamantānaṃ agāravantānaṃ avandantānaṃ
anya-e0601n:453_7: añña diṭṭhigatikānaṃ bālānaṃ asatthena pāramīpuññatejena ajinīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ jinapuṅgavanti.
anya-e0601n:454_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Tahiṃ tahiṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave, attabhāve vā, pāramisañcayaṃ
anya-e0601n:454_1: dānādipāramīnaṃ samūhaṃ, cayaṃ upacitaṃ parisambhūtaṃ, sabbhi santehi sappurisehi,
anya-e0601n:454_2: gataṃ upagamitabbaṃ payirupāsitabbaṃ, sukhappadaṃ accantasukhassa patiṭṭhāna bhūtaṃ,
anya-e0601n:454_3: padaṃ nibbānaṃ gataṃ pattaṃ agamiṃ, narānarānaṃ manussadevānaṃ, sukhasambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhassa
anya-e0601n:454_4: kāraṇaṃ tividha sukhassa labhanakāraṇabhūtaṃ puññaṃ vā bhavaṃ nibbattentaṃ, anamānaṃ
anya-e0601n:454_5: anamantānaṃ anādarānaṃ avandantānaṃ vā, gavaṃ goṇasadisānaṃ bālānaṃ jinapuṅgavaṃ
anya-e0601n:461_0: 10. Evaṃ navamagāthāya buddhaṃ natvā idāni bahū satte tibhavasaṅkhātā saṃsārasamuddato
anya-e0601n:461_1: tārentena guṇena ca sattānaṃ dukkhappahānena guṇena ca thomitvā buddhaṃ vanditu kāmo
anya-e0601n:461_2: maggaṅganāvantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana tata jara gaṇehi racitattā dvādasakkharehi
anya-e0601n:461_3: yuttā indavaṃsa gāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “sāyindavaṃsā khalu yattha tā jarā”ti.
anya-e0601n:462: Tassattho. Yattha yassaṃ gāthāyaṃ tā tagaṇadvayañca jarā jagaṇa ragaṇā ca ce siyuṃ, sā gāthā khalu ekantaṃ indavaṃsagāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:463_0: Tattha yo munidakkhanāvikoti sambandho. Yo buddha saṅkhāto cheko nāvājeṭṭhakoti attho.
anya-e0601n:463_1: Tattha munīti ubho loke munāti jānātīti muni, bhagavā. Munadhātu ñāṇe i. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:463_2: monaṃ vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti muni, bhagavā. Assathyatthe ipaccayo.
anya-e0601n:463_3: Vuttañhi ekanipāte vaṇṇapathajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ. Kāya
anya-e0601n:463_4: moneyyādīsu vā aññatarena samannāgatattā puggalo munīti vuccati. So panesa agāriyamuni,
anya-e0601n:463_5: anagāriyamuni, sekkhamuni, asekkhamuni, paccekamuni, munimunīti anekavidho. Tattha
anya-e0601n:463_6: agāriyamunīti gihi āgataphalo viññātasāsano. Anagāriyamunīti tathārūpova pabbajito.
anya-e0601n:463_7: Sekkhamunīti sattasekkhā. Asekkhamunīti khīṇāsavo. Paccekamunīti paccekasambuddho.
anya-e0601n:463_8: Munimunīti sammāsambuddho”ti. Idha pana munimuni adhippeto.
anya-e0601n:464_0: Dakkhoti cheko. Samuddataraṇe dakkhati kusalattaṃ gacchatīti dakkho, nāviko. Dakkhadhātu
anya-e0601n:464_1: gatiyaṃ a. Atha vā dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṃ
anya-e0601n:464_2: gacchatīti dakkho, yokoci kusalo puggalo. Dakkhadhātu sīghatthe a. Dakkho viyāti
anya-e0601n:464_3: dakkho, buddho. Nītatthena pana buddho sattānaṃ saṃsārasamuddato uddhāraṇassa kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:464_4: dakkhati paricchindati ñāṇenāti dakkhoti vuccati. Nāvikoti samuddatīraṃ nāvāya taratīti
anya-e0601n:464_5: nāviko, nāvājeṭṭhako. Taratitaddhite ṇiko. Nāviko viyāti nāviko, buddho. Nītatthena
anya-e0601n:464_6: pana buddho nibbānaṃ pāraṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya taratīti nāvikoti vuccati. Dakkho
anya-e0601n:464_7: nāviko dakkhanāviko, muni ca so dakkhanāvikocāti munidakkhanāviko, kammadhārayasamāsoyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:464_8: Atha vā dakkhanāviko viya dakkho munīti munidakkhanāviko, buddho. Upamākammadhārayasamāsoyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:464_9: Yathā hi samuddataraṇe cheko nāviko manusse samuddapāraṃ neti, evaṃ buddho veneyyasatte
anya-e0601n:465_0: Maggaṅganāvaṃ āruyhāti sambandho. Maggaṅganāvanti aṭṭhamaggaṅga saṅkhātaṃ nāvaṃ.
anya-e0601n:465_1: Āruyhāti ārohitvāti attho. Kilese mārento ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:465_2: maggo. Mārasaddūpapada gamudhātu kvi. Mārenta goti vattabbe niruttinayena maggoti
anya-e0601n:465_3: vuttaṃ. Atha vā nibbānaṃ maggati gavesatīti maggo. Maggadhātu gavesane a. Nibbānatthikehi
anya-e0601n:465_4: maggiyati gavesiyatīti vā maggo. Ekantato jāti jarābyādhimaraṇadukkhādīhi pīḷitehi
anya-e0601n:465_5: sattehi dukkhakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇatthāya maggitabbo gavesitabboti maggo, catumaggo.
anya-e0601n:465_6: Vuttañhi “maggoti kenaṭṭhena nibbānaṃ magganaṭṭhena nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:465_7: cā”ti. Aṅgati gacchati phalanibbānaṃ etenāti aṅgaṃ. Agidhātu gamane a. Maggassa aṅgaṃ
anya-e0601n:465_8: kāraṇanti maggaṅgaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappa sammāvācā sammākammanta sammāājīva
anya-e0601n:465_9: sammāvāyāma sammāsati sammāsamādhivasena aṭṭhamaggaṅgaṃ labbhati. Nuyati thavīyatīti
anya-e0601n:465_10: nāvā. Nudhātu thaviyaṃ avo. Atha vā orato pāraṃ netīti nāvā, bhāraṃ nayanti etāyāti
anya-e0601n:465_11: vā nāvā. Nidhātu nayane avo. Maggaṅgasaṅkhātā nāvā maggaṅganāvā. Atha vā nāvā viya
anya-e0601n:465_12: maggaṅganti maggaṅga nāvā. Yathā hi nāvā attani āruḷhe manusse samudda nadīpāraṃ
anya-e0601n:465_13: neti, evaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅgadhammā attānaṃ paṭipajjante nibbāna pāraṃ nentīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0601n:466_0: Īhāphiyanti vīriyasaṅkhātaṃ dabbisārakaṃ. Vuttañhi suttani pātaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “phiyenāti
anya-e0601n:466_1: dabbisārakenā”ti. Īhati ārabbhatīti īhā. Īhati vāyamati cetayati etenāti vā īhā,
anya-e0601n:466_2: vīriyaṃ. Saddanītiyaṃ pana “īha cetāya”nti vuttaṃ. Phāti vaḍḍheti udakaṃ etenāti
anya-e0601n:466_3: phiyaṃ. Phādhātu vaḍḍhiyaṃ iyo. Phāti ghaṭṭeti udakanti vā phiyaṃ. Atha vā phāyati
anya-e0601n:466_4: gacchati nāvaṃ etenāti phiyaṃ. Dabbisārakaṃ. Phāyi dhātu gatiyaṃ a. Ākārassa i. Īhāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:466_5: phiyanti īhāphiyaṃ. Phiyaṃ viya īhāti īhāphiyaṃ. Yathā hi phiyena nāvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:466_6: gacchati, evaṃ īhāsaṅkhātena vīriyena taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ sādheti, icchitaṃ nibbānaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:466_7: gacchatīti adhippāyo. Taṃ pana gāhakoti pade kammaṃ. Ñāṇakarenāti sabbaññutañāṇasaṅkhātena
anya-e0601n:466_8: hatthena. Sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ jānātīti ñāṇaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ karotīti
anya-e0601n:466_9: karo, hattho. Ñāṇasaṅkhāto karo ñāṇa karo, karaṃ viya ñāṇanti vā ñāṇakaro, tena ñāṇakarena.
anya-e0601n:466_10: Gāhakoti daḷhagaṇhamāno hutvā. Tāyāti aṭṭhamaggaṅga saṅkhātāya tāya nāvāya, bahūti
anya-e0601n:466_11: aneke veneyyasatte. Bhavaṇṇavāti tibhavasaṅkhātā saṃsāravaṭṭasaṅkhātā vā mahāsamuddato.
anya-e0601n:467_0: Tāresīti otiṇṇesi, atikkamesīti attho. Buddhanti paṭividdhacatusaccadhammaṃ. Aghappahanti
anya-e0601n:467_1: sattānaṃ dukkhappaja hantaṃ. Dukkhaviddhaṃsentanti attho. Atha vā aghappahanti sattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:467_2: kilesappajahantaṃ. Kilesaviddhaṃsentanti attho. Ettha hi aghasaddo dukkhe kilese
anya-e0601n:467_3: ca vattati. Tattha hi dukkhaṃ aghayati dukkhayatīti aghanti ca, aghayati dukkhākārena
anya-e0601n:467_4: pavattatīti vā aghanti ca vuccati. Kileso pana aghayanti pāpaṃ karonti sattā etenāti
anya-e0601n:467_5: aghoti vuccati. Aghadhātu pāpakaraṇe a. Aghaṃ pajahati viddhaṃsetīti aghappaho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:467_6: Aghasaddūpapadapapubbahādhātu cāge. Buddho veneyyasattānaṃ dukkhañca kilesañca dhammadesanāya
anya-e0601n:467_7: apanetīti attho. Ettha ca paṭhamavikappe dukkhassa appahātabbadhammattā maggena appahātabbampi
anya-e0601n:467_8: phalūpacārena dukkhappajahantanti vuttaṃ. Tanti munidakkhanāvikaṃ ahaṃ name namāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:468_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Yo munidakkhanāviko yo buddhasaṅkhāto cheko nāvājeṭṭhako,
anya-e0601n:468_1: maggaṅganāvaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha ārohitvā īhāphiyaṃ vīriyasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:468_2: dabbisārakaṃ, ñāṇakarena sabbaññutañāṇasaṅkhātena hatthena, gāhako daḷhaṃ gaṇhamāno
anya-e0601n:468_3: hutvā tāya aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya, bahū aneke veneyyasatte bhavaṇṇavā tibhavasaṅkhātamahāsamuddato,
anya-e0601n:468_4: tāresi otāresi, buddhaṃ paṭividdhacatusaccadhammaṃ aghappahaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhaviddhaṃsentaṃ
anya-e0601n:468_5: kilesa viddhaṃsentaṃ vā taṃ munidakkhanāvikaṃ ahaṃ name namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:475_0: 11. Evaṃ dasamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni samatiṃ satipāramisambharaṇādīhi pañcahi
anya-e0601n:475_2: pana catūhi sagaṇehi racitattā dvādasakkharehi yuttā toṭakagāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:475_3: vuttodaye “iha toṭaka mambudhisehi mita”nti. Tassattho. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ ambudhisehi
anya-e0601n:475_4: catūhi sagaṇehi mitaṃ pamitaṃ racitaṃ lakkhitaṃ vā vuttaṃ idha jagatichande toṭakaṃ nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:476_0: Tattha pana samatiṃsatipāramisambharaṇanti dasapāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyo
anya-e0601n:476_1: cāti samatiṃsapāramiyo sambhūtaṃ, paripūritanti attho. Tāsaṃ pana viseso pāramisaddassa
anya-e0601n:476_2: ca vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Sambharittha paripūrayitthāti sambharaṇo, jino. Saṃpubbabharadhātu
anya-e0601n:476_3: pūraṇe yu. Samatiṃsapāramiyo sambharaṇoti samatiṃsatipāramisambharaṇo, jino. Dīpaṅkarabuddhassa
anya-e0601n:476_4: pādamūle laddhabyākaraṇato paṭṭhāya kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
anya-e0601n:476_5: samatiṃsapāramiyo pūrayitthāti attho. Taṃ samatiṃsatipāramisambharaṇaṃ. Varabodhidumeti
anya-e0601n:476_6: uttamabodhirukkhamūle. Ettha ca varabodhisaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Davati
anya-e0601n:476_7: gacchati mūlakhandhatacasākha viṭapa pallava phalehi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullaṃ rajata
anya-e0601n:476_8: suvaṇṇamaṇi santā rucīhi atisobhanaṃ vā pāpuṇātīti dumo, bodhisattassa vijātadivaseyeva
anya-e0601n:476_9: bodhisattena saddhiṃ saha jāto satahatthubbedho asatthadumarājā labbhati. Dudhātu
anya-e0601n:476_10: gatimhi amo. Apadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “dunāti kampatīti dumo. Dumati pūreti ākāsatalanti
anya-e0601n:476_11: vā dumo”ti vuttaṃ. Varo bodhi varabodhi, varabodhi ca so dumo cāti varabodhidumo, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0601n:477_0: Catusaccadasanti cattāri ariyasaccāni maggañāṇena paṭivijjhitaṃ. Ettha ca saccasaddo
anya-e0601n:477_1: anekesvatthesu dissati. Seyyathidaṃ. Saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyyātiādīsu vācāsacce.
anya-e0601n:477_2: Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇātiādīsu viratisacce. Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse
anya-e0601n:477_3: kusalāvadānātiādīsu diṭṭhisacce. Ekañhi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthītiādīsu paramatthasacce
anya-e0601n:477_4: nibbāne ceva magge ca, catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati kusalātiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi
anya-e0601n:477_5: ariyasacce vattatīti veditabbo. Sathanaṃ saccaṃ, avitathaṃ. Sathadhātu avitathe ṇyo.
anya-e0601n:477_6: Yathā hi aggīnaṃ sabhāvo ekantaṃ uṇhoyeva hoti, na sītalo, evaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādi
anya-e0601n:477_7: sabhāvaṃ ekantaṃ saccaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana catubbidhaṃ hoti
anya-e0601n:477_8: dukkhasaccaṃ, samudayasaccaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ, maggasaccañcāti. Tattha dukkhasaccanti
anya-e0601n:477_9: dukkhacchitaṃ khaṃ tucchanti dukkhaṃ. Kammadhārayasamāsoyaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ saccavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:477_10: “duiti ayaṃsaddo kucchite dissati. Kucchitañhi puttaṃ duputtoti vadanti. Khaṃsaddo
anya-e0601n:477_11: pana tucche. Tucchañhi ākāsaṃ khanti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṃ kucchitaṃ. Anekaupaddavādhiṭṭhānato,
anya-e0601n:477_13: ca dukkhanti vuccatī”ti. Dukkhañca taṃ saccañcāti dukkhasaccaṃ. Tebhūmikavaṭṭaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0601n:478_0: Samudayasaccanti ayati pavattati dukkhaphalaṃ etenāti ayo, lobho. Ayadhātu gatimhi
anya-e0601n:478_1: a. Saṃ avasesa paccayasaṃyoge sati u dukkhuppattiyā ayo kāraṇoti samudayo. Chaṭṭhītappurisasamāsoyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:478_2: Vutteñhetaṃ sacca vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṃiti ca ayaṃsaddo samāgamo sametantiādīsu
anya-e0601n:478_3: saṃyogaṃ dīpeti. Uiti ayaṃsaddo uppannaṃ uditantiādīsu uppattiṃ. Ayasaddo pana kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:478_4: dīpeti. Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:478_5: Iti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccatī”ti. Samudayo ca
anya-e0601n:478_6: so saccañcāti samudayasaccaṃ, lobhasaṅkhātā taṇhā labbhati. Nirodhasaccanti rodhati
anya-e0601n:478_7: carati pavattatīti rodho, tebhūmikavaṭṭadhammo. Rodhadhātu caraṇe ṇa. Natthi tebhūmikavaṭṭadhammassa
anya-e0601n:478_8: rodho caraṇaṃ etthāti nirodho, nibbānaṃ. Atha vā nirujjhati saṃsāradukkhaṃ etthāti
anya-e0601n:478_9: nirodho, nibbānaṃ. Rudhidhātu āvaraṇe ṇa. Vuttañhetaṃ saccavibhaṅgaṭṭha kathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:478_10: “tatiyasaccaṃ pana yasmā nisaddo abhāvaṃ. Rodha saddo cārakaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā abhāvo
anya-e0601n:478_11: ettha saṃsāra cārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā. Samadhi gate vā
anya-e0601n:478_12: tasmiṃ saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti
anya-e0601n:478_13: vuccatī”ti. Dukkhassa vā anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodhanti. Nirodho ca so
anya-e0601n:478_14: saccañcāti nirodhasaccaṃ. Nibbānaṃ. Maggasaccanti dukkhanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ maggati
anya-e0601n:478_15: gacchati etenāti maggo. Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Maggadhātu gatiyaṃ a. Vuttañhetaṃ sacca
anya-e0601n:478_16: vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “catutthasaccaṃ pana yasmā etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena
anya-e0601n:478_17: tadabhimukhabhūtattā paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā. Tasmā dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāti
anya-e0601n:478_18: vuccatī”ti. Maggo ca so saccañcāti maggasaccaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo labbhati. Yasmā
anya-e0601n:478_19: panetāni buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānītipi vuccanti. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:478_20: buddhādīhi ariyehi paṭivijjhiyanti, tasmā ariyasaccānītipi vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:479_0: Tesaṃ pana lakkhaṇādīni evaṃ veditabbāni. Ettha hi bādhanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ,
anya-e0601n:479_4: Etesu pana catūsu saccesu paṭhamatatiyasaccāni phalāni honti. Dutiya catutthasaccāni
anya-e0601n:479_5: hetūni honti. Purimāni dvesaccāni dudda sattā gambhīrāni. Pacchimāni dvesaccāni gambhīrattā duddasāni.
anya-e0601n:480_0: Api ca kho pana dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ gambhīrañceva duddasañcāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:480_1: Ekekassa pana saccassa catunnaṃ catunnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena soḷasa saccaṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0601n:480_2: Tena vuttaṃ paṭisambhidā maggapāḷiyaṃ “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho
anya-e0601n:480_3: vipariṇāmaṭṭho, ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā. Evaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0601n:480_4: tathaṭṭhena saccaṃ. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho nidānaṭṭho saṃyogaṭṭho palibodhaṭṭho,
anya-e0601n:480_5: ime cattāro samudayassa samudayaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā. Evaṃ samudayo tathaṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:480_6: saccaṃ. Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho asaṅkhataṭṭho amataṭṭho, ime cattāro
anya-e0601n:480_7: nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā, evaṃ nirodho tathaṭṭhena saccaṃ.
anya-e0601n:480_8: Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetvaṭṭho dassanaṭṭho adhipateyyaṭṭho, ime cattāro maggassa
anya-e0601n:480_9: maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā, evaṃ maggo tathaṭṭhena sacca”nti.
anya-e0601n:481_0: Dassanaṃ dasaṃ, disati passatīti vā dasaṃ, catumaggañāṇaṃ. Disadhātu apekkhane a.
anya-e0601n:481_1: Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ assāti catusaccadaso, jino. Atha vā cattāri saccāni adassi
anya-e0601n:481_2: apassīti catusaccadaso, jino. So cattāri saccāni catumaggañāṇena appaṭivijjhīti attho.
anya-e0601n:481_3: Taṃ catusaccadasaṃ. Catusaccañāṇaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti anubodhañāṇañca, paṭivedha
anya-e0601n:481_4: ñāṇañcāti. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati,
anya-e0601n:481_5: paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhati.
anya-e0601n:481_6: Yathāha yo bhikkhave dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati. Dukkhanirodhampi
anya-e0601n:481_7: passati, dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭi padampi passatīti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Catusaccapaṭivedhañāṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:481_8: pana anubodhañāṇena vinā na pavattati, tasmā anubodha ñāṇatthāya pubbe catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:481_9: paṇḍitena samārambhi tabbanti. Nanu ca ariyasāvakā cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0601n:481_10: Atha kasmā jinoyeva catusaccadasanti thomitoti. Bhagavā pana ariyasāvakehi visiṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:481_11: anaññopadesena arahattamaggañāṇena cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti. Tasmā bhagavāyeva
anya-e0601n:481_12: catusaccadasanti abhitthavitoti. Tattha pana ṭhapetvā taṇhañca nibbānañca avasesadhammā
anya-e0601n:481_13: dukkhasaccaṃ nāma. Aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritā samudayasaccaṃ nāma. Nibbānaṃ nirodha saccaṃ
anya-e0601n:481_14: nāma. Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo maggasaccaṃ nāma. Vuttaṃ pana abhidhammatthasaṅgahe –
anya-e0601n:483: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato”ti.
anya-e0601n:484_0: Varamiddhigatanti varaṃ iddhigataṃ. Uttamaṃ atītabuddhānaṃ iddhiṃ pattanti attho.
anya-e0601n:484_1: Atha vā uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtanti attho. Ijjhanaṃ samijjhanaṃ iddhi,
anya-e0601n:484_2: ijjhati samijjhati nippajjatīti vā iddhi. Iddhividhañāṇañca arahattamaggo ca labbhati.
anya-e0601n:484_3: Vuttañhi visuddhimagge “tathā nekkhammaṃ ijjhatīti iddhīti ca arahattamaggo ijjhatīti
anya-e0601n:484_4: iddhī”ti ca. Atha vā ijjhanti sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi,
anya-e0601n:484_5: aṭṭhasamāpattiyo ca cattāro maggā ca labbhanti. Idhadhātu vuḍḍhiyanti paccayo. Atha
anya-e0601n:484_6: vā tapaccayo itthiliṅgajotako īpaccayo ca. Iddhiṃ agaminti iddhigato, jino. Atha
anya-e0601n:484_7: vā gacchati patiṭṭhahati etthāti gato, varānaṃ uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ gato patiṭṭhānabhūtoti
anya-e0601n:484_8: varamiddhigato, jino. Taṃ varamiddhigataṃ. Kiñcāpi pana ariyasāvakā iddhippattā honti,
anya-e0601n:484_9: buddhā pana visesato etāya abhiññāya iddhā samiddhā vuddhā atiukkaṃsagatā honti,
anya-e0601n:484_10: tasmā buddhoyeva varamiddhigatanti abhitthavituṃ arahatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:485_0: Naradevahitanti manussadevānaṃ lokiyalokuttara saṅkhātaṃ hitaṃ payojanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:485_1: Tesaṃ pana attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Tibhavūpasamanti tibhavaupasamaṃ. Punabbhavābhinibbattiyā
anya-e0601n:485_2: abhāvato kāmarūpaarūpasaṅkhātehi tīhi bhavehi tīsu bhavesu punabbhavābhinibbattito
anya-e0601n:485_3: vā upasamitaṃ nibbutaṃ niruddhanti attho. Bhavanti sattā etthāti bhavo, tayo bhavā
anya-e0601n:485_4: tibhavā, tehi upasamitthāti tibhavūpasamo, jino. Taṃ tibhavūpasamaṃ. Bhagavato pana
anya-e0601n:485_5: bodhipallaṅkeva kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātesu tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhijanakānaṃ avijjātaṇhāmūlakānaṃ
anya-e0601n:485_7: natthi. Tasmā bhagavantaṃyeva visesena tibhavūpasamanti thometīti vuttaṃ hoti. Jinanti
anya-e0601n:485_8: pañcamārajayantaṃ buddhaṃ. Paṇamāmīti ahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttacittena ādaraṃ vandāmīti yojanā.
anya-e0601n:486_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Samatiṃsati sambharaṇaṃ samatiṃsapāramiyo sambhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:486_1: paripūritaṃ, varabodhidume uttamabodhirukkhamūle, catusaccadasaṃ cattāri ariyasaccāni
anya-e0601n:486_2: maggañāṇena passantaṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ, varamiddhigataṃ uttamaṃ atīta buddhānaṃ iddhipattaṃ
anya-e0601n:486_3: uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vā, naradevahitaṃ manussadevānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:486_4: payojanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ, tibhavūpasamaṃ kāmarūpaarūpasaṅkhātehi tīhi bhavehi upasamitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:486_5: kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātesu tīsu bhavesu punabbhavā bhinibbattito upasamitaṃ nibbutaṃ
anya-e0601n:486_6: vā, jinaṃ pañcamārajayantaṃ buddhaṃ paṇamāmi ahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttacittena ādaraṃ vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:493_0: 12. Evaṃ ekādasamagāthāya jinaṃ vanditvā idāni satapuññajalakkhaṇikantyādīhi chahi
anya-e0601n:493_1: guṇehi thomitvā jinaṃ vanditu kāmo satapuññajalakkhaṇikantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana
anya-e0601n:493_2: catūhi sa gaṇehi racitattā dvādasakkharehi yuttā toṭakagāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Sādhakaṃ
anya-e0601n:494_1: sampannaṃ. Ettha ca satasaddo anekasaṅkhyāvācako. Satatejo sahassaraṃ sītiādīsu viya.
anya-e0601n:494_2: Satena anekena pāramīpuññatejena jātanti satapuññajaṃ, lakkhiyati lakkhitabbaṃ buddhadabbaṃ
anya-e0601n:494_3: etehīti lakkhaṇaṃ, dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇādi. Lakkhadhātu dassanaṅkesuyu. Satapuññajañca
anya-e0601n:494_4: taṃ lakkhaṇañcāti satapuññaja lakkhaṇaṃ. Taṃ assa atthīti satapuññajalakkhaṇiko,
anya-e0601n:494_5: jino. Taṃ. Bhagavā hi anantesu cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ satakkhattuṃ
anya-e0601n:494_6: kareyyuṃ. Ettakehi janehi kataṃ puññakammaṃ bodhisatto ekova ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0601n:494_7: nibbattena pāramīpuññatejena jātehi dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asītianubyañjana
anya-e0601n:494_8: lakkhaṇe hi ca sampannoti satapuññajalakkhaṇikanti thometīti adhippāyo. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:495_0: “Satapuñña lakkhaṇoti anantesu cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ satakkhattuṃ
anya-e0601n:495_1: kareyyuṃ, ettakehi janehi katakammaṃ bodhisatto sayameva eko sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto.
anya-e0601n:495_2: Tasmā satapuññalakkhaṇoti vuccati. Keci pana satena satena puññakammena nibbattaṃ
anya-e0601n:495_3: ekekalakkhaṇoti vadanti. Evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyāti. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhitta”nti.
anya-e0601n:495_4: Pātheyyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sata puññalakkhaṇanti satena satena puññakammena nibbattaṃ
anya-e0601n:495_5: ekekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ. Evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyāti na rocayiṃsu. Anantesu pana
anya-e0601n:495_6: cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ kammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ. Ettakehi janehi kataṃ
anya-e0601n:495_7: kammaṃ bodhisatto ekova ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto. Tasmā satapuññalakkhaṇoti
anya-e0601n:495_8: imamatthaṃ rocayiṃsū”ti vuttaṃ. Dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ pana upari āvibhavissatīti.
anya-e0601n:496_0: Virajanti rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvā vigatarajaṃ. Rañjati sañjati rūpādiārammaṇesūti rajo,
anya-e0601n:496_1: rāgādirajo. Ranjadhātu rāge a. Vigato rajo assāti virajo, jino. Taṃ virajaṃ. Jino
anya-e0601n:496_2: hi bodhipallaṅkeyeva sabbakilesamāra rajassa jayitattā vigatarajoti attho. Gaganūpamadhinti
anya-e0601n:496_3: ettha dhī vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Tasmā ākāsūpamasabbaññuta ñāṇavantanti attho.
anya-e0601n:496_4: Gacchanti ettha vihaṅgamādayoti gaganaṃ, ākāso. Gamudhātu gatiyaṃ yu. Makārassa go.
anya-e0601n:496_5: Upamiyate upamā. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Upapubbamādhātu parimāne a. Sabbañeyyadhammaṃ dharati
anya-e0601n:496_6: jānātīti dhī, sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ. Dharadhātu ñāṇe kvi, itthiliṅgajotakaīpaccayo ca.
anya-e0601n:496_7: Gaganena ākāsena yuttā upamā gaganūpamā, taṃ sadisaṃ dhī sabbaññutañāṇaṃ yassāti
anya-e0601n:496_8: gaganūpamadhi, jino. Taṃ gaganūpamadhiṃ. Ayaṃ pana anantādiguṇahīnattā dhammahīnopamā
anya-e0601n:496_9: nāma. Vuttañhi subodhālaṅkāre “dhammahīnāmukhambhoja, sadisaṃ munino itī”ti. Yathā
anya-e0601n:496_10: hi ākāso anantoti vuttattā ākāso ananto hutvā vittharati, evaṃ bhagavato anantaṃ
anya-e0601n:496_11: buddhañāṇanti vuttattā sabbaññutañāṇassa anantārammaṇattā ca ñāṇaṃ anantaṃ hutvā
anya-e0601n:497_0: Dhitimerusamanti ettha dhiti vuccati samādhi. Sinerupabbata sadisaṃ acalasamādhivantanti
anya-e0601n:497_1: attho. Dhiyati ṭhapiyati sampayuttadhamme ekārammaṇe etenāti dhiti, bhagavato lokiyalokuttarajhānasamādhi.
anya-e0601n:497_2: Dhidhātu dhāraṇeti. Raṃsiyā andhakāraṃ mināti hiṃsatīti meru, pabbatarājā. Mīdhātu
anya-e0601n:497_3: hiṃsāyaṃ rupaccayo. Imaṃ vacanatthañhi sinerussa pācīnapassaṃ rajatamayaṃ, dakkhiṇapassaṃ
anya-e0601n:497_4: maṇimayaṃ, pacchimapassaṃ phallikamayaṃ, uttarapassaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ hotīti vuttavacanaṃ
anya-e0601n:497_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atha vā mināti hiṃsati sabbe pabbate attano uccataraṭṭhenāti meru,
anya-e0601n:497_6: merunā samo dhiti samādhi yassāti dhitimerusamo, jino. Taṃ dhitimeru samaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0601n:497_7: hi merurājā aṭṭhahi disāhi āgatehi vātehi na kampati na calati, evaṃ jino kāmacchandādinīvaraṇe
anya-e0601n:497_8: pajahitvā lokuttarajjhānasamādhinā samannāgatattā aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi ca micchādiṭṭhivātehi
anya-e0601n:497_9: ca na kampati na calatīti dhitimerusamanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:498_1: saṃyuttaṃ. Vuttañhi apadāna pāḷiyaṃ “sīlaṃ tassa asaṅkhyeyya”nti. Tadaṭṭhakathāyañca
anya-e0601n:498_2: “bhagavato pana sīlaṃ asaṅkhyeyyamevā”ti. Jalati dibbatīti jalaṃ, udakaṃ. Jaladhātu
anya-e0601n:498_3: dittiyaṃ a. Jale udake jātaṃ jalajaṃ, padumaṃ. Jalajena padumena upamaṃ sadisanti
anya-e0601n:498_4: jalajūpamaṃ, sīlaṃ. Sukhatthikehi seviyatīti sītalaṃ, sīlaṃ. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ talapaccayo.
anya-e0601n:498_5: Atha vā sītaguṇaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti sītalaṃ, sīlaṃ. Sītasaddūpapada lādhātu gahaṇe kvi.
anya-e0601n:498_6: Udake pana jātaṃ padumaṃ udakena uṇhassa samitattā sītalaṃ viya. Sīlaṃ pana buddhassa
anya-e0601n:498_7: kilesatā panassa sametattā accantasītalaṃ hoti. Surakkhitañhi visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ kilesappahānena
anya-e0601n:498_8: sattānaṃ kilesapariḷāhaṃ upasameti na haritacandanaṃ muttāhāro maṇi udakaṃ vāto candakiraṇo
anya-e0601n:498_9: ca. Tasmā sīlameva sītalanti accantasītalanti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ visuddhimagge –
anya-e0601n:499: “Na taṃ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṃ;
anya-e0601n:500: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā;
anya-e0601n:503_0: Ayaṃ pana tassa gāthādvayassattho. Surakkhitaṃ suṭṭhurakkhitaṃ ariyaṃ visuddhaṃ accantasītalaṃ
anya-e0601n:503_1: idaṃ sīlaṃ idhaloke sattānaṃ yaṃ pariḷāhaṃ sameti, taṃ pariḷāhaṃ sajaladā udakadadena
anya-e0601n:503_2: meghena saha pavattā vātā sītavātā na samayanti haritacandanañcāpi na samayati. Hārā
anya-e0601n:503_3: muttāhārā neva samayanti. Maṇayo veḷuriyādimaṇiyo na samayanti. Candakiraṇaṅkurā
anya-e0601n:503_4: candassa raṃsiaṅkurā na samayantīti. Sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena
anya-e0601n:503_5: na vippakiratīti sīlaṃ. Sīladhātu samādhimhi a. Atha vā sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ
anya-e0601n:503_6: etenāti sīlaṃ, sīlenti vā etena kusale dhamme upadhārenti ābhuso dhārenti sādhavoti
anya-e0601n:503_7: sīlaṃ, cetanādhammo, kusalacittuppādo vā labbhati. Sīladhātu upadhāraṇe a. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0601n:503_8: visuddhimaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kenaṭṭhena sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. Kimidaṃ sīlaṃ nāma,
anya-e0601n:503_9: samādhānaṃ vā, kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Upadhāraṇaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:503_10: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti attho”ti. Jalajūpamena padumasadisena
anya-e0601n:503_11: sītalena accantasītalena sīlena asaṅkhyeyyasīlena yuttoti jalajūpamasītalasīlayuto,
anya-e0601n:503_12: jino. Taṃ jalajūpamasītalasīlayutaṃ. Yathā hi udake jātaṃ padumaṃ jalena sītalaṃ
anya-e0601n:503_13: hoti, evaṃ bhagavato maggasīlena kilesupatāpanassa pahīnattā taṃ sītalaṃ accantasītalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:503_14: Tena sampayuttoti jalajūpamasītalasīla yutanti thometīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:504_0: Pathavīsahananti pathavī viya khantisampannaṃ khantivantaṃ vā. Pathanti patiṭṭhahanti
anya-e0601n:504_1: ettha tarupabbatādayoti pathavī, bhūmi. Pathadhātu patiṭṭhāyaṃ vīpaccayo. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:504_2: puthu hutvā jātanti pathavī. Jātataddhitatthe vīpaccayo. Sahayate khamiyate sahanaṃ,
anya-e0601n:504_3: sahati khamatīti vā sahanaṃ, adhivāsanakhanti. Sahadhātu khantiyaṃ yu. Pathavī viya
anya-e0601n:504_4: sahanaṃ khamanaṃ yassa soti pathavīsahano, jino. Taṃ pathavīsahanaṃ. Yathā hi pathavī
anya-e0601n:504_5: attano upari pakkhittaṃ sucimpi asucimpi sabbaṃ sahati, na paṭighānunayaṃ karoti,
anya-e0601n:504_6: evaṃ jino iṭṭhārammaṇampi aniṭṭhārammaṇampi sabbaṃ sahati, na tattha paṭighānunayaṃ
anya-e0601n:504_7: karotīti pathavīsahananti thometīti adhippāyo. Tena vuttaṃ apadānapāḷiyaṃ –
anya-e0601n:506: Pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:508_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Satapuññajalakkhaṇikaṃ anekapāramīpuññatejena jātena
anya-e0601n:508_1: dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇena sampannaṃ, virajaṃ rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvā vigatarajaṃ,
anya-e0601n:508_4: asaṅkhyeyyasīlena sampayuttaṃ, pathavīsahanaṃ pathavī viya khantisampannaṃ, khantivantaṃ
anya-e0601n:508_5: vā, jinaṃ pañcamāravijayaṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ paṇamāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:515_0: 13. Evaṃ dvādasamagāthāya jinaṃ vanditvā idāni tāvatiṃsapure mātudevaputtappamukhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:515_1: upapattidevānaṃ abhidhammaṃ desaka guṇena abhitthavitvā vanditukāmo yo buddho sumatityādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:515_2: Ayaṃ pana ma na ja ra gaṇehi ca ekagarunā ca tīhi yatīhi ca dasahi yatīhi ca racitattā
anya-e0601n:515_3: terasakkhara saṃyuttā pahassiṇīgāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ vuttodaye “mnā jarā
anya-e0601n:516_0: Tassattho. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ mnā magaṇa nagaṇā ca jarā ja gaṇa ragaṇā ca go garu ca
anya-e0601n:516_1: tidasayati tiyati ca dasayati ca ce siyā, sā gāthā pahassiṇīgāthā nāmāti. Tattha
anya-e0601n:516_2: sumati yo buddho dhammaṃ devānaṃ adesīti sambandho. Yoti aniyamavācakasabbanāmapadaṃ.
anya-e0601n:516_3: Tassa vacanattho na kātabbo. Vuttañhi saddavidūhi –
anya-e0601n:518: Sabbanāmanti etesu, na kato viggaho chasū”ti.
anya-e0601n:519_0: Atha vā sabbanāmabhāvaṃ yātīti yo, aniyamavācaka bhāvaṃ yātīti vā yo. Sabbanāmabhāvena
anya-e0601n:519_1: yāti pavattatīti vā yo. Aniyamavācakabhāvena yāti pavattatīti vā yo. Sabbanāmabhāvena
anya-e0601n:519_2: yātabbo ñātabboti vā yo, yātabbo ñātabbo etena aniyamatthoti vā yo. Sabbanāmasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:519_3: yaitipadaṃ labbhati. Yo yādi soti attho. Buddhoti paṭividdhacatusaccadhammo, paṭividdhasabbañeyyadhammo
anya-e0601n:519_4: vā. Tassa pana vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Sumatīti sundarasabbaññutañāṇavāto, desanāñāṇavāto
anya-e0601n:519_5: vā. Adesi dhammaṃ devānanti vuccamānattā hi idha sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ sumatīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:519_6: Manati jānāti sabbañeyyadhammaṃ desetabbadhammaṃ vāti mati. Manadhātu ñāṇeti. Sundarā
anya-e0601n:519_7: mati sumati, sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvajānanasamatthaṃ tesaṃ dese tabbappakārajānanasamatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:519_9: sabbaññutañāṇaṃ labbhati. Sumatīti iminā hi sabbaññutañāṇameva abhidhammakathāya
anya-e0601n:519_10: samuṭṭhānabhāve samatthaṃ. Nāññanti imamatthaṃ dīpento abhidhammakathāya anaññasādhāraṇabhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:519_11: dasseti. Sundarā mati assa asmiṃ vā atthīti sumati, buddho. Samāsanta taddhitāyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:519_12: Tadassatthītivī cāti sutte casaddena apaccayo. Yathā pītisukhanti. Vuttañhi pārājikaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:519_13: “ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:520_0: Diveti divase. Sūriyobhāsena dibbati etthāti divo. Divudhātu jutiyaṃ a. Tasmiṃ dive.
anya-e0601n:520_1: Divā karovāti sūriyo iva. Divādinaṃ karotīti divākaro, sūriyo. Divāsaddūpa pada karadhātu
anya-e0601n:520_2: karaṇe a. Atha vā divā divase karo raṃsi assāti divākaro. Karasaddo hi raṃsivācako.
anya-e0601n:520_3: Sobhantoti virocamāno hutvā. Subhati virocati chabbaṇṇaraṃsiādīhīti sobhanto, buddho.
anya-e0601n:520_4: Subhadhātu sobhe, dittiyaṃ vā antapaccayo. Bhagavā hi chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0601n:520_5: asītyānubyañjanalakkhaṇehi ca devānaṃ majjhe sobhati virocatīti attho. Ratijananeti
anya-e0601n:520_6: devānaṃ atappakapītisomanassuppādane, pemuppādane vā. Ramanaṃ rati. Ramudhātu kīḷāyanti.
anya-e0601n:520_7: Taṃ janeti uppādetīti ratijananaṃ. Silāsanaṃ. Ratisaddūpapada janadhātu janane yu. Tasmiṃ ratijanane.
anya-e0601n:521_0: Silāsanamhīti tidasālaye, pāricchattakamūle jāte nikkhitte vā dīghato saṭṭhiyojane
anya-e0601n:521_1: vitthārato paṇṇāsa yojane puthulato pannarasayojane vaṇṇato jayasumanapupphasadise
anya-e0601n:521_2: rattakampalavaṇṇe vā saṇhasukhume paṇḍukampa lanāmake silāsane. Sakkena seviyatīti
anya-e0601n:521_3: silaṃ. Pāsāṇo. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ alapaccayo. Āsiyati etthāti āsanaṃ. Atha vā āgantvā
anya-e0601n:521_4: seviyati etthāti āsanaṃ. Āpubbasidhātu sevāyaṃ yu. Silaṃeva āsanaṃ silāsanaṃ. Paṇḍukampalasilāsanaṃ
anya-e0601n:521_5: labbhati. Tasmiṃ silāsanamhi. Āsīnoti dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ
anya-e0601n:521_6: devānaṃ gaṇena parivārito hutvā nisīdanto. Āsīdanaṃ nisajjanaṃ āsīno. Āsamantato
anya-e0601n:521_7: sīdati vasatīti vā āsīno. Abhidhammakathābhimukhaṃ sīdati nisajjatīti vā āsīno, buddho.
anya-e0601n:521_8: Āpubbasīdadhātu nisajjāyaṃ. Visaraṇa gatyāvasānesu vā tapaccayo. Tassa īṇādeso, ṇassanattaṃ,
anya-e0601n:521_9: dhātvantalopo. Sivasukhadanti nibbānasukhadāyakaṃ. Ariyehi seviyatīti sivaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:521_10: Sidhātu sevāyaṃ avo. Atha vā rāgaggiādīhi samati upasamati etthāti sivaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:521_11: Samudhātu upasame rivo. Abhidhānappadīpikaṭīkāyaṃ pana “sivaṃ khemabhāvaṃ karotīti
anya-e0601n:521_12: sivaṃ, saṃsārabhīrukehi sevitabbattā vā sivaṃ. Yadādinā vapaccayo”ti vuttaṃ. Sukhayatīti
anya-e0601n:521_13: sukhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Atha vā suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti
anya-e0601n:521_14: sukhaṃ. Supubba khanudhātu avadāraṇe kvi. Sivassa nibbānassa sukhaṃ sivasukhaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0601n:521_15: dadātīti sivasukhadaṃ, abhidhammadhammo. Sivasukhasaddūpapadadādhātu a. Yo hi abhidhammadhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:521_16: suṇāti, so tassa nibbānasukhaṃ dadātīti attho.
anya-e0601n:522_0: Adesi dhammaṃ devānanti devānaṃ dhammaṃ adesīti sambandho. Ettha ca dhammanti nānānayavicittaṃ
anya-e0601n:522_1: gambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ duddasaṃ abhidhamma dhammaṃ. Attano sabhāvaṃ dhāretīti dhammo,
anya-e0601n:522_2: paṇḍitehi dhāriyati na bālehīti vā dhammo, abhidhammapiṭakaṃ. Dharadhātu dhāraṇe
anya-e0601n:522_3: rammapaccayo. Taṃ dhammaṃ. Devānanti pubbe manussaloke mātubhūtadevaputtappamukhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:525: Ettha ca mātarantipadassa pubbe manussaloke mātubhūtaṃ devaputtanti attho daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ jinālaṅkārapāḷiyaṃ –
anya-e0601n:526: “Tato puttaṃ gahetvāna, gatā mātā sakaṃ gharaṃ;
anya-e0601n:528_0: Taṭṭīkāyañca “bodhisattamātā gabbhavuṭṭhānato sattame divase kālaṅkatvā tusitapure
anya-e0601n:528_1: devaputto hutvā nibbattī”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca devaputtasaddena vuttameva. Kāḷudāyī
anya-e0601n:528_3: itthibhāvaṃ devatābhāvaṃ vā sandhāya kato. Devūpapatti pana purisabhāvena jātā”ti
anya-e0601n:528_7: upapattidevāna”nti mātudevaputta saddena vuttaṃ. Sirīmahāmāyāsatthe ca “sirīmahāmāyā
anya-e0601n:528_8: devīpi sattadivaseyeva vasitvā kālaṅkatvā attano puññānubhāvena tusitabhavane devaputto
anya-e0601n:528_9: hutvā nibbattī”ti devaputtasaddena vuttaṃ. Maṇidīpaṭīkāyañca “mātaranti pubbe manussaloke
anya-e0601n:528_10: mātubhūtaṃ devaputtanti attho. Sirīmahāmāyā hi bodhisattaṃ vijāyitvā sattāhamattaṃ
anya-e0601n:528_11: ṭhatvā ito cavitvā tusitabhavane purisabhāveneva nibbatto, na itthibhāvenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:528_12: Tasmā mātarantipadassa mātubhūtaṃ devaputtanti attho mukhyena daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:538_0: Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “parivāritāti ca itthiliṅganiddeso purimatta bhāvasiddhaṃ itthibhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:538_1: devatābhāvaṃ vā sandhāya kato. Devūpapatti pana purisabhāvena jātāti vuttattā mātaranti
anya-e0601n:538_2: manussattabhāvavasena vutta”nti vadanti. Theraṭṭhakathā pana nasaṅgahāruḷhā. Aññaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu
anya-e0601n:538_3: ca tādisaṃ vacanaṃ natthi. Patthanākāle ca buddhamātā hutvā pacchā puriso homīti
anya-e0601n:538_4: patthanā natthi. Tiṃsadhammatāyañca buddhamātuyā purisabhāvo nāma natthi. Tasmā taṃ
anya-e0601n:538_5: vīmaṃsitabbantipi vidū vadantīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana na gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā, saṃsayavacanena
anya-e0601n:538_6: vīmaṃsitabbanti vidūvadantīti ca vuttattā ca yathāvuttaṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanehi ujukaṃ
anya-e0601n:538_7: viruddhattā ca. Devatāsaddo hi devaputte brahme devadhītāya ca vattati. Tathāhesa
anya-e0601n:538_8: “atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu devaputte.
anya-e0601n:538_9: Vuttañhi khuddakapāṭhaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññatarāti aniyamita niddeso. Sā hi nāmagottato
anya-e0601n:538_10: apākaṭā. Tasmā aññatarāti vuttā. Devoyeva devatā. Itthipurisasādhāraṇamevetaṃ. Idha
anya-e0601n:538_11: pana purisoeva. So devaputto. Kintusādhāraṇanāmavasena devatāti vutto”ti. Sunītattheraapadāna
anya-e0601n:538_12: pāḷiyaṃ āgatāsu “tathā tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā brahmā vimānā abhinikkhamitvā”tiādīsu
anya-e0601n:540: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā”ti.
anya-e0601n:541_0: Ādīsu devadhītāya. Evaṃ pana parivāritāsaddopi veditabbo. Tasmā ācariyadhammapālattherena
anya-e0601n:541_1: katāya theraṭṭhakathāya vuttavacanaṃ jātakaṭīkāya vuttavacanañca ācariyasumaṅgalattherena
anya-e0601n:541_2: katāya abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya vuttavacanaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā mātudevaputtoti atthoyeva
anya-e0601n:541_3: daṭṭhabbo. Etarahi pana keci ācariyā therāpāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ parivāritāsaddañca madhusāratthadīpanīṭīkāvacanañca
anya-e0601n:541_4: paṭicca mātudevadhītāti vadanti. Taṃ pana tesaṃ matimattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adesīti
anya-e0601n:541_5: mahākaruṇāpubbaṅgamena sabbaññutañāṇena kathesi. Asadisaṃ tanti sambandho. Ettha
anya-e0601n:541_6: ca tanti buddhaṃ. Asadisanti appaṭipuggalaṃ. Natthi etassa sadiso paṭipuggaloti asadiso,
anya-e0601n:541_7: buddho. Sadevake loke sīlādiguṇena buddhena sadiso koci puggalo natthīti attho. Tenāha
anya-e0601n:542: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0601n:544: Niccantisatataṃ samitaṃ, sabbakālaṃ nirantaranti attho. Asadisaṃ taṃ buddhaṃ niccaṃ namāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:545_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Sumati sundarasabbaññuta ñāṇavāto, desanāñāṇavāto vā.
anya-e0601n:545_1: Yo yādiso buddho. Dive divase divākarova sūriyoiva, sobhanto virocamāno hutvā, ratijanane
anya-e0601n:545_2: devānaṃ atappakapīti somanassuppādane, pemuppādane vā, silāsanamhi paṇḍu kampalanāmake
anya-e0601n:545_3: silāsane, āsīno nisīdanto hutvā sivasukhadaṃ nibbānasukhadāyakaṃ, dhammaṃ abhidhammadhammaṃ,
anya-e0601n:545_4: devānaṃ mātu pubbadevaputtappamukhānaṃ upapattidevānaṃ adesi kathesi. Asadisaṃ appaṭipuggalaṃ
anya-e0601n:545_5: taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:552_0: 14. Evaṃ terasamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni buddhassa pādatale vicittappavattehi
anya-e0601n:552_1: aṭṭhasatacakkalakkhaṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo yo pādapaṅkajatyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ
anya-e0601n:552_2: pana ta bha ja ja gaṇehi ca garudvayena racitattā cuddasakkharehi yuttā vasantatilakāgāthāti
anya-e0601n:552_3: daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ vuttodaye “vuttā vasantatilakā ta bha jā jagā go”ti. Tassāyamattho.
anya-e0601n:552_4: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ ta bha jā ta bha ja gaṇā ca jagā jagaṇagarukā ca go garu ca ce bhavanti,
anya-e0601n:553_0: Tattha pana yo nātho avikalehi nirākulehi pādapaṅkajamuduttalehitīhi lokehi nirupameyyataṃ
anya-e0601n:553_1: sampāpuṇeeva sabbalokamahitaṃ asamaṃ taṃ nāthaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho. Ettha pana
anya-e0601n:553_2: saddakkamena adassetvā atthakkamena vaṇṇanaṃ dassayissāma. Yo nāthoti yo yādiso sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:553_3: paṭisaraṇo buddho. Taṃ pana padaṃ sampāpuṇeevātipade kattubhāvena sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:553_4: Nāthassa pana vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Avikalehīti kenaci avekallehi sabbapādacakkalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0601n:553_5: sampuṇṇehīti attho. Virūpaṃ kalati gacchatīti vikalo. Vipubbakaladhātu gatiyaṃ a.
anya-e0601n:553_6: Natthi kiñci vikalaṃ etissā rājiyāti avikalā, pādarāji. Pādadvaye paribyattaṃ saṇṭhānarūpaṃ
anya-e0601n:553_7: kiñci vikalaṃ natthīti attho. Tehi avikalehi.
anya-e0601n:554_0: Nirākulehīti ākulavirahitehi. Pādacakkalakkhaṇānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṃmissehi asaṃsaṭṭhehīti
anya-e0601n:554_1: attho. Ābhuso kulati bandhatīti ākulaṃ, āpubba kuladhātu bandhane a. Atha vā ābhuso
anya-e0601n:554_2: kulati āvarati sobhananti ākulaṃ, natthi ākulaṃ aññamaññamissaṃ etissā pādarāji yāti
anya-e0601n:554_3: nirākulā, pādarāji. Tehi nirākulehi. Taṃ pana padadvayaṃ pādapaṅkajamuduttalarājikehītipade
anya-e0601n:554_4: visesanaṃ. Pādapaṅkajamuduttalarājikehīti pādasaṅkhātapadumassa saṇha tale jātehi
anya-e0601n:554_5: aṭṭhasatacakkalakkhaṇarājikehi padati gacchati etenāti pādo. Padadhātu gatimhiṇa.
anya-e0601n:554_6: Paṅke kaddame jātanti paṅkajaṃ, padumaṃ. Pādasaṅkhātaṃ paṅkajaṃ pādapaṅkajaṃ. Paṅkajaṃiva
anya-e0601n:554_7: pādo vā pādapaṅkajaṃ, pādo. Saṇhabhāvena mudati pavattatīti mudu, mudadhātu gatiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:554_8: u. Talati patiṭṭhati etthāti talaṃ. Taladhātu patiṭṭhāyaṃ a. Mudu ca taṃ talañcāti
anya-e0601n:554_9: muduttalaṃ, pādapaṅkajassa muduttalaṃ pādapaṅkajamuduttalaṃ, rājati dissatīti rājikā,
anya-e0601n:554_10: rājati sobhati etenāti rājikā. Rājadhātu sobhane ṇiko. Pādapaṅkaja muduttale jātaṃ
anya-e0601n:555_0: Taṃ pana aṭṭhasatapādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ nāmevaṃ veditabbaṃ. Bhagavato pādapaṅkajamudutalassa
anya-e0601n:555_1: majjhe nābhi dissati. Nābhipaṭicchinnā vaṭṭalekhā dissati. Nābhimukhaparikkhepapaṭṭo
anya-e0601n:555_2: dissati. Panāḷimukhaṃ dissati. Arā dissanti. Aresu vaṭṭalekhā dissanti. Nemi dissati.
anya-e0601n:555_3: Nemimaṇikā dissanti. Idaṃ tāva pāḷiāgatameva. Sampahulavāro pana anāgato, so evaṃ
anya-e0601n:555_4: daṭṭhabbo. Satti, sirīvaccho, nandiyāvaṭṭaṃ, sovattiko, vaṭaṃsako, vaḍḍhamānakaṃ,
anya-e0601n:555_5: macchayugalaṃ, bhaddapīṭhaṃ, aṅkusaṃ, tomaro, pāsādo, toraṇaṃ, setacchattaṃ, khaggo,
anya-e0601n:555_6: tālavaṇḍaṃ, morahatthako, vāḷabījani, uṇhīsaṃ, patto, maṇikusumadāmaṃ, nīluppalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:555_7: rattuppalaṃ, setuppalaṃ, padumaṃ, puṇḍarikaṃ, puṇṇaghaṭo, puṇṇapāti, samuddo, cakkavāḷaṃ,
anya-e0601n:555_8: himavā, sineru, candimasūriyā, nakkhattāni, cattāro mahādīpā, dveparittadīpasahassāni
anya-e0601n:555_9: antamaso cakkavatti rañño parisaṃ upādāya sabbo cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāroti ettakameva
anya-e0601n:556_0: Jinālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃ pana “heṭṭhāpādatalesu cakkāni jātānīti cakkalakkhaṇaṃ nāma dvīsu
anya-e0601n:556_1: pādatalesu dve cakkāni ekekasmiṃ sahassamattā arā yuttā honti. Nemivalayaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:556_2: Nābhi indanīlamaṇivaṇṇā. Tasmiṃ majjhe ca nābhipariyante ca nābhimukhe ca vaṭṭalekhā
anya-e0601n:556_3: majjhe chiddaṃ cakkapariyante nemito bahiddhā vaṭṭe. Satti, sirīvaccho, nandiyāvaṭṭaṃ,
anya-e0601n:556_4: sovattiko, vaṭaṃsakaṃ, vaḍḍhamānakaṃ, bhaddapīṭhaṃ, aṅkuso, pāsādaṃ, toraṇaṃ, setacchattaṃ,
anya-e0601n:556_5: khaggaṃ, tālavaṇḍaṃ, mayūrahatthaṃ, cāmaraṃ, uṇhīsaṃ, pattaṃ, maṇi, sumanadāmaṃ,
anya-e0601n:556_6: nīluppalaṃ, rattuppalaṃ, rattapadumaṃ, setapadumaṃ, puṇḍarikaṃ, puṇṇakalasaṃ, puṇṇapattaṃ,
anya-e0601n:556_7: samuddo, cakkavāḷapabbato, himavantapabbato, merupabbato, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ, candamaṇḍalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:556_8: nakkhattaṃ, saparivārā catumahādīpā, saparivāro sattaratanasamaṅgī cakkavatti, dakkhiṇāvaṭṭa
anya-e0601n:556_10: sattasīdantasāgarā, suvaṇṇa haṃsarājā, saṃsumāro, dhajapaṭāko, suvaṇṇasivikā, suvaṇṇavāḷabījani,
anya-e0601n:556_12: vāsukīnāgarājā, haṃsarājā, usabharājā, erāvaṇa hatthirājā, suvaṇṇamakaraṃ, catumukhasuvaṇṇanāvā,
anya-e0601n:556_13: savacchakā dhenu, kiṃpuriso, kinnarī, karavīko, mayūrarājā, koñcarājā, cakkavākarājā,
anya-e0601n:556_14: jīvañjīvakarājā cha devalokā, soḷasa brahmalokāti ime ettakā aggamaṅgalalakkhaṇā
anya-e0601n:556_15: pādatale paññāyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Iminā ca vacanena aṭṭhasata pādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e0601n:557_0: Tīhi lokehīti sambandho. Tīhi kāmarūpārūpa lokehīti attho. Tassa pana vacanattho
anya-e0601n:557_1: heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Taṃ panetaṃ katvatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tassa pana padassa nirupameyyāti
anya-e0601n:557_2: padena kattubhāvena sambandho. Nirupameyyatanti appameyyabhāvaṃ. Upamitabbanti upameyyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:557_3: Upapubba mādhātu pamāne ṇyo. Upameyyassa bhāvo upameyyataṃ. Natthi upameyyataṃ assa
anya-e0601n:557_4: rājikassāti nirupameyyataṃ. Atha vā natthi upameyyaṃ etassa rājikassāti nirupameyyo,
anya-e0601n:557_5: pādacakkalakkhaṇarājiko labbhati. Tassa bhāvo nirupameyyataṃ. Taṃ pana padaṃ sampāpuṇe
anya-e0601n:557_6: evātipade kammaṃ. Sampāpuṇeevāti sambandho. Sammā gacchatievāti attho. Kasmā pana
anya-e0601n:557_7: tīhi lokehi pādapaṅkajamudutalehi nirupameyyataṃ pāpuṇātīti. Buddhato aññassa kassaci
anya-e0601n:557_8: devamanussassa pādatalamajjhe pādacakkalakkhaṇassa abhāvato. Bhagavato hi pādapaṅkajamudutale
anya-e0601n:557_9: pāramipuññānubhāvena nibbattāni aṭṭhasatapādacakkalakkhaṇāni sampāpuṇanti, na aññesaṃ.
anya-e0601n:558_0: Sabbalokamahitanti sabbalokena pūjitaṃ. Sabbena devamanussalokena mahitabbo pūjitabboti
anya-e0601n:558_1: sabbaloka mahito, nātho labbhati. Taṃ. Uppanne hi tathāgate ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā
anya-e0601n:558_2: buddhassa pūjenti, pageva aññā. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati sinerumattena ratana dāmena
anya-e0601n:558_3: tathāgataṃ pūjeti. Yathābalañca aññepi devā manussā ca bimbisārakosalarājādayo nibbutampi
anya-e0601n:558_4: bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā asoka mahārājā sakalajambudīpe
anya-e0601n:558_5: caturāsītivihārasahassāni patiṭṭhāpeti. Kā kathā pana aññesaṃ pūjāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:559_0: Asamanti sabbamanussadevabrahmehi asadisaṃ. Appaṭipuggalanti attho. Natthi samo sadiso
anya-e0601n:559_1: puggalo assāti asamo, nātho. So pana asītianubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍita dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇa
anya-e0601n:559_3: Puññamahatta thāmamahattaiddhimahatta yasamahatta paññāmahattānaṃ paramukkaṃsa gato
anya-e0601n:559_4: ca hoti, tasmā tathāgatena samo sadiso nāma natthīti attho. Taṃ asamaṃ. Tanti nāthaṃ
anya-e0601n:560_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Yo nātho yo yādiso sabbasattānaṃ paṭisaraṇo buddho,
anya-e0601n:560_1: avikalehi kehici avekallehi, nirākulehi ākulavirahitehi, pādapaṅkaja muduttalarājikehi
anya-e0601n:560_2: pādasaṅkhātapadumassa saṇhatale jātehi aṭṭhasatacakkalakkhaṇarājikehi, tīhi lokehi
anya-e0601n:560_3: kattubhūtehi, nirupameyyataṃ appameyyabhāvaṃ appamitabba bhāvaṃ vā, sampāpuṇeeva
anya-e0601n:560_4: sammā gacchatieva, sabbalokamahitaṃ sabbalokena pūjitaṃ, asamaṃ sabbamanussadevabrahmehi
anya-e0601n:567_0: 15. Evaṃ cuddasamagāthāya nāthaṃ natvā idāni narānarasa mosaraṇantyādīhi sattahi
anya-e0601n:567_1: guṇehi thomitvā buddhaṃ vanditu kāmo buddhaṃ narānarasamosaraṇantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ
anya-e0601n:567_2: pana tabhajajagaṇehi garudvayena ca racitattā cuddasakkharehi yuttā vasantatilakāgāthāti
anya-e0601n:568_0: Tattha pana narānarasamosaraṇanti ettha naraanarasamaṃ osaraṇanti padavibhāgo. Manussadevānaṃ
anya-e0601n:568_1: samaṃ osaraṇaṃ sannipatitaṭṭhānanti attho. Narānarasaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:568_2: Samaṃ avasaranti sannipatanti etthāti samosaraṇo, buddho. Samaavapubba saradhātu
anya-e0601n:568_3: gatiyaṃ yu. Narānarānaṃ manussadevānaṃ samosaraṇo narānarasamosaraṇo, buddho. Yathā
anya-e0601n:568_4: hi mahānigrodho phalakāmānaṃ sakuṇa samūhānaṃ samosaraṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ buddho lokiya
anya-e0601n:568_5: lokuttarasampattikāmānaṃ manussadevānaṃ samosaraṇo sannipatito paṭisaraṇo vā hoti.
anya-e0601n:569_0: Dhitattanti samāhitacittaṃ. Ettha attasaddo attasammā paṇidhi cātiādīsu attasaddo
anya-e0601n:569_1: viya cittavācako daṭṭhabbo. Dhiyati ṭhapiyati ettha etena vā ekārammaṇe sampayutta
anya-e0601n:569_2: dhammāti dhito, samādhi. Dhādhātu patiṭṭhāyaṃ ta. Ārammaṇaṃ adati ādadātīti attaṃ,
anya-e0601n:569_3: cittaṃ. Adadhātu ādāne ta. Dhitaṃ samāhitaṃ attaṃ cittaṃ yassāti dhitatto, buddho. Taṃ dhitattaṃ.
anya-e0601n:570_1: paññā, arahattamagga ñāṇaṃ. Yathāsabhāvaṃ sabbappakārehi catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhatīti
anya-e0601n:570_2: attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato sabbapakārehi dhammasabhāvaṃ dīpetīti paññāpadīpo.
anya-e0601n:570_3: Jotetīti juti, paññāpadīpobhāso. Judhātu dittiyanti. Paññā padīpoeva juti paññāpadīpajuti.
anya-e0601n:570_4: Atha vā paññāpadīpassa juti paññāpadīpajuti, ayaṃ pana samāso abhedabhedū pacārena
anya-e0601n:571_1: hanitabboti vihato. Vipubbahanadhātu hiṃsāyaṃ ta. Andhaṃ tamaṃ karotīti andhakāro,
anya-e0601n:571_3: vuccati. Atha vā andhaṃ paññācakkhuandhaṃ karotīti andhakāro, moho. Andhasaddūpapada
anya-e0601n:571_4: karadhātu ṇa. Vihato andhakāro yena soti vihatandhakāro, buddho. Taṃ vihatandhakāraṃ.
anya-e0601n:571_5: Yathā hi loke padīpo attano jutiyā andhakāraṃ hanati, evaṃ buddhassa arahattamaggapaññāpi
anya-e0601n:571_6: avijjandhakāraṃ hanatīti vuttā. Ayaṃ pana hīnūpamāti vuccati. Paññāvato hi ekapallaṅkenapi
anya-e0601n:571_7: nisinnassa dasasahassi lokadhātu ekapajjotā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “cattārome
anya-e0601n:571_8: bhikkhave pajjotā. Katame cattāro. Candapajjoto, sūriyapajjoto, aggipajjoto, paññā
anya-e0601n:571_9: pajjoto. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro pajjotā. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave imesaṃ catunnaṃ pajjotānaṃ
anya-e0601n:572_0: Paññāpadīpajutiyā vihatandhakāranti ettha pana paññāpadīpa jutiyātiiminā buddhassa
anya-e0601n:572_1: arahattamaggañāṇaṃ mukhyena dasseti. Taṃ dassanena pāramīñāṇañca vipassanāñāṇañca
anya-e0601n:572_2: heṭṭhimamaggaphala ñāṇañca phalūpacārena dīpeti. Taddīpakena avijjandhakārappahānaṃ
anya-e0601n:572_3: paṭhamakāraṇūpacārena pakāseti. Tappakāsanena arahatta phalañāṇalabhanaṃ dutiyakāraṇūpacārena
anya-e0601n:572_4: vibhāveti. Taṃ vibhāvanena sabbaññutañāṇādisabbabuddhaguṇalabhanaṃ tatiya kāraṇūpacārena ānubhāveti.
anya-e0601n:573_0: Nanu ca sabbesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpadīpajutiyā vihatandhakāratā sambhavati, atha
anya-e0601n:573_1: kasmā aññasādhāraṇāvisesa guṇena buddhassa thomanā katāti. Savāsanappahānena anaññasādhāraṇavisesatāya
anya-e0601n:573_2: sambhavato. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpadīpajutiyā vihatandhakāratte
anya-e0601n:573_3: ariyasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ savāsanāya kilesappahānaṃ na vijjati. Sammāsambuddhānaṃyeva
anya-e0601n:573_4: savāsanappahānena kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayavasena avijjandhakārappahānena
anya-e0601n:574_0: Atthābhikāmanti sattalokassa lokiyalokuttara saṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ ativiya icchantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:574_1: Kāraṇānurūpaṃ asati bhavatīti atthaṃ, phalaṃ. Asadhātu bhuvimhi tha. Taṃ abhiatirekaṃ
anya-e0601n:574_2: kāmeti icchatīti atthābhikāmo, buddho. Atthasaddūpapada abhipubbakamudhātu icchāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:574_3: ṇa. Taṃ atthābhikāmaṃ. Naradevahitāvahanti manussadevānaṃ hitaṃ dhārakaṃ. Hitaṃ narati
anya-e0601n:574_4: netīti naro, manusso. Atha vā nariyati sakena kammena niyyatīti naro, manusso. Naradhātu
anya-e0601n:574_5: nayane a. Vuttañhi “kammena niyyati loko”ti. Kāmaguṇa jhānābhiññacittissariyādīhi
anya-e0601n:574_6: dibbanti kīḷantīti devā, tesu vā viharantīti devā, divudhātu kīḷādīsu ṇa. Narā ca
anya-e0601n:574_7: devā ca naradevā. Hinoti vaḍḍhatīti hitaṃ, phalaṃ. Hidhātu vaḍḍhane ta. Naradevānaṃ
anya-e0601n:574_8: hitaṃ naradevahitaṃ, taṃ āvahatīti naradevahitāvaho, buddho. Naradevahitasaddūpapadaāpubba
anya-e0601n:574_9: vahadhātu haraṇe ṇa. Buddho hi sabbadevamanussānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasampattiatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:574_10: dhammadesanāya dhāretīti vuttaṃ hoti, taṃ naradevahitāvahaṃ. Kāruṇikamaggamananta
anya-e0601n:574_11: ñāṇanti ettha kāruṇikaṃ aggaṃ anantañāṇantipadacchedo. Tattha kāruṇikanti sabbasattesu
anya-e0601n:574_12: mahākaruṇāya yuttaṃ, mahākaruṇavantaṃ vā. Kiratīti karuṇā. Kiradhātu apanayane uṇapaccayo.
anya-e0601n:575_0: Atha vā kinātīti karuṇā. Kidhātu hiṃsāyaṃ ruṇapaccayo. Paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ
anya-e0601n:575_1: hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
anya-e0601n:575_2: Karadhātu uṇapaccayo. Atha vā kaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Kaṃsaddūpapada
anya-e0601n:575_3: rudhidhātu āvaraṇe yupaccayo. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatā lakkhaṇā. Attasukhanirapekkhatāya
anya-e0601n:575_4: kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādhatīti attho. Karuṇāya mahākaruṇāya yutto kāruṇiko.
anya-e0601n:575_5: Karuṇā assa atthīti vā kāruṇiko, buddho. Taṃ kāruṇitaṃ. Agganti jātipuñña guṇamahattabhāvena
anya-e0601n:575_6: sabbasattuttamaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ ajati gacchatīti aggo, buddho. Ajadhātu gatiyaṃ a.
anya-e0601n:575_7: Jassa go. Buddho hi asambhinnakhattiyavaṃse jātattā jātivasena ca pūritapāramīpuññattā
anya-e0601n:575_8: puññavasena ca aparimitanirupamasīlādi guṇavisesena samannāgatattā guṇavasena ca
anya-e0601n:575_9: anantalokadhātūsu sabbasattuttamabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aggo. Nibbānaṃ ajati gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:575_10: vā aggo. Atha vā ajeti khepeti kileseti aggo, buddho. Ajadhātu khepane a. Taṃ aggaṃ.
anya-e0601n:575_11: Anantañāṇanti gaṇanavasena ca sabhāvavasena ca visayavasena ca antavirahitañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:575_12: Kenaci puggalena ñāṇena anantaṃ aparicchinnaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇavantaṃ vā. Natthi antaṃ
anya-e0601n:575_13: yassāti anantaṃ, ñāṇaṃ. Sabbañeyyadhammaṃ jānātīti ñāṇaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Anantaṃ
anya-e0601n:575_14: ñāṇaṃ yassa soti anantañāṇo, buddho. Buddhassa hi ñāṇaṃ koci manusso vā devo vā brahmā
anya-e0601n:575_15: vā ettakanti paricchindituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:578: Natveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave”ti.
anya-e0601n:579_0: Kāruṇikamaggamanantañāṇanti ettha ca karuṇaggahaṇena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti,
