anya-e0601n:700_3: madhuraṃ atthabyañjana sampannattā madhuraṃ, paguṇaṃ pakaṭṭhaguṇaṃ suvibhattaṃ suṭṭhu
anya-e0601n:700_4: vibhajitabbaṃ, imaṃ dhammaṃ pariyattidhammañca saraṇattaṃ saraṇabhāvaṃ upehi upagacchāhīti.
anya-e0601n:701_0: Ettha hi kāmarāgādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahiyati etenāti rāgavirāgoti maggo
anya-e0601n:701_1: kathito. Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyā sabbaso
anya-e0601n:701_2: parikkhīṇattā anejama sokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Kenaci paccayena asaṅkhatattā dhammamasaṅkhatanti
anya-e0601n:701_3: nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ. Avirodhadīpanato pana atthabyañjanassa sampannatāya pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato
anya-e0601n:701_4: suṭṭhu vibhajitattā ca appaṭikūlantiādinā sabbopi pariyatti dhammo kathito. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:701_5: tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ettha hi rāgavirāganti maggo kathito. Anejamasokanti phalaṃ. Dhammamasaṅkhatanti
anya-e0601n:701_6: nibbānaṃ. Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhā”ti.
anya-e0601n:701_7: Idha pana sāmaññato dasavidho dhammo. Visesato pana pariyatti dhammo adhippeto. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:701_8: subodhesīti vuccamānattā. Raṃsīti rasiyanti assādiyantīti raṃsī, rasanti assādenti
anya-e0601n:701_9: sattā etāyāti vā raṃsī, rasadhātu assādane a ca ī ca. Atha vā rasiyati sinehiyati
anya-e0601n:701_10: taṃ janehīti raṃsī. Rasadhātu sinehe. Niggahītāgamo.
anya-e0601n:702_0: Varoti uttamo, varitabbo patthitabboti varo, varati nivāreti hīnanti vā varo. Varadhātu
anya-e0601n:702_1: patthane nivāraṇe vā a. Dhammo ca so raṃsi cāti dhammaraṃsi, dhammassa vā raṃsi dhammaraṃsi.
anya-e0601n:702_2: Ayaṃ pana samāso abhedūpacārena vutto. Varo ca so dhammaraṃsi cāti dhammaraṃsivaro,
anya-e0601n:702_3: tehi dhammaraṃsivarehi. Subodhesīti catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhayamānena suṭṭhu pabodhesi
anya-e0601n:702_4: vikāsetīti attho. Yathā hi sūriyo attano raṃsiyā phusayitvā kuhara saṅkhāte sare
anya-e0601n:702_5: jātaṃ uppalaṃ vikāseti, evameva bhagavāpi attano dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaraṃsiyā kamalasarasaṅkhāte
anya-e0601n:702_6: bhavattaye vasantaṃ puññūpanissayaṃ paṭivijjhārahaṃ kamala saṅkhātaṃ vineyyappāṇoghaṃ
anya-e0601n:702_7: catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhayamāno phaladhammena pabodhesi vikāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:703_1: attho. Casaddo cettha padapūraṇamattoyeva. Visesena vividhaṃ vā āpati vaḍḍhatīti
anya-e0601n:703_2: byāpito. Vipubbaāpadhātu byāpane vaḍḍhane vā ta. Byāpanaṃ vā byāpitaṃ. Kittiyate
anya-e0601n:703_3: abhitthaviyate kittinaṃ. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Thutikriyā labbhati. Kittiyati abhitthaviyati
anya-e0601n:703_4: devamanussehīti kittinaṃ, thutighoso. Kittadhātu abhitthavane yu. Byāpito patthaṭo
anya-e0601n:703_5: kittano thutighoso yassa soti byāpitakkittino, munindakko. Taṃ. Bhagavato hi tiloke
anya-e0601n:703_6: devamanussehi sīlādiguṇehi ca arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotyādīhi guṇehi ca thomito kittisaddo
anya-e0601n:703_7: yāva bhavaggaṃ abbhuggacchatīti byāpitakkittinanti thometīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:704_0: Tilokekaccakkhunti tiloke ekacakkhūti padacchedo. Kāmarūpa arūpasaṅkhātānaṃ tilokānaṃ
anya-e0601n:704_1: ekaṃ paññācakkhubhūtanti attho. Tayo lokā tilokaṃ. Tassa cakkhu viya eka bhūtaṃpaññācakkhu
anya-e0601n:704_2: yassa soti tilokekaccakkhu, munindakko. Ettha ca ekacakkhusaddassa lopo hoti brahmassarotiādīsu
anya-e0601n:704_3: viya. Atha vā tilokassa ekaṃ paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti tilokekaccakkhu, munindakko.
anya-e0601n:704_4: Tilokekaccakkhubhūtanti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ bhūtasaddalopaṃ katvā tilokekaccakkhunti
anya-e0601n:704_5: vuttaṃ. Atha vā tilokassa ekabhūto paññācakkhu hutvā sabbadhamme cakkhati passatīti
anya-e0601n:704_6: tilokekaccakkhu, munindakko. Taṃ. Bhagavā hi paññācakkhu mayattā sattesu ca taduppādanato
anya-e0601n:704_7: tilokassa cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto hoti. Vuttañhi madhupiṇḍikasutte
anya-e0601n:704_8: “so hāvuso bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto
anya-e0601n:704_9: brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti.
anya-e0601n:705_0: Dukhamasahananti puthujjanehi atidukkhamitaṭṭhānaṃ khamanaṃ. Puthujjanehi dukkhena
anya-e0601n:705_1: kasirena khamitabbanti dukhamaṃ, iṭṭhāniṭṭhādi ārammaṇaṃ. Dukkhamanti vattabbe gajjabandhattā
anya-e0601n:705_2: chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ kakāralopaṃ katvā dukhamanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sahati khamatīti dukhamasahano,
anya-e0601n:705_3: munindakko. Sahadhātu parisahane yu. Taṃ dukhamasahanaṃ. Bhagavā hi puthujjanehi
anya-e0601n:705_4: sudukkhamitaṃ iṭṭhā niṭṭhādiārammaṇaṃ sītuṇhādiṃ lābhālābhayasāyasa nindapasaṃsasukhadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:705_5: lokadhammañca ativiya khamati adhivāseti, tasmā dukhamasahananti thometi.
anya-e0601n:706_0: Mahesinti mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhādiṃ pariyesamānaṃ mahantaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesamānaṃ vā
anya-e0601n:706_1: mahante sīlakkhandhādike esati gavesati pariyesatīti mahesī, munindakko. Mahantasaddūpa
anya-e0601n:706_2: pada esadhātu gavesane ī. Vuttañhi mahāniddese “mahesīti mahesī. Bhagavā mahantaṃ
anya-e0601n:706_3: sīlakkhandhaṃ esi gavesi pariyesīti mahesī. Mahantaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ mahantaṃ paññākkhandhaṃ
anya-e0601n:706_4: mahantaṃ vimuttikkhandhaṃ mahantaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti
anya-e0601n:706_5: mahesī”ti. Mahante sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiya dhamme esati gavesatīti vā mahesī, mahantaṃ
anya-e0601n:706_6: nibbānaṃ esati gavesatīti vā mahesī. Vuttañhi mahāniddese “mahante satipaṭṭhāne mahante
anya-e0601n:706_7: sammappadhāne mahante iddhipāde mahantāni indriyāni mahantāni balāni mahante bojjhaṅge
anya-e0601n:706_8: mahantaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ esī gavesī
anya-e0601n:706_9: pariyesīti mahesī”ti. Atha vā mahesakkhehi sattehi esiyati gavesiyati pariyesiyati
anya-e0601n:706_10: amhākaṃ kahaṃ buddhoti mahesī. Vuttañhi mahāniddese “mahesakkhehi vā sattehi esito
anya-e0601n:706_11: gavesito kahaṃ buddho”tyādi. Taṃ mahesiṃ. Tanti munindakkaṃ. Ahaṃ sirasā namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:707_1: udayapabba tato uggatasūriyāruṇo viya mahākaruṇā vā, ñāṇa vitthiṇṇabimbo sabbaññutañāṇasaṅkhāto
anya-e0601n:707_3: eko asahāyo ekabuddhabhūto, yo yādiso munindakko buddhādicco suddhe rāgādimalehi
anya-e0601n:707_4: visuddhe tibhava kuhare tibhavasaṅkhātakamalasare, kamalakathitaṃ uppalanti kathetabbaṃ,
anya-e0601n:707_6: subodhesi catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivedhayamānena suṭṭhu pabodhesi vikāsesi, byāpitakkittinaṃ
anya-e0601n:707_7: tiloke patthaṭaparikittanaṃ, sīlādiguṇehi patthaṭathutighosikaṃ vā, tilokekaccakkhuṃ
anya-e0601n:707_8: kāmarūpaarūpa saṅkhātānaṃ tilokānaṃ ekaṃ paññācakkhubhūtaṃ, dukhamasahanaṃ puthujjanehi
anya-e0601n:707_9: atidukkhamitaṭṭhānaṃ khamanaṃ, mahesiṃ mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhādiṃ pariyesamānaṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e0601n:707_10: nibbānaṃ gavesamānaṃ vā, taṃ munindakkaṃ ahaṃ sirasā namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:714_0: 21. Evaṃ vīsatimāya gāthāya munindakkaṃ vanditvā idāni pubbe anekajātiyaṃ bodhisattakāle
anya-e0601n:714_1: jīvitapariccāgādīhi ca dānādidasapāramiyo pūrentehi guṇehi ca thometvā jinaṃ vanditukāmo
anya-e0601n:714_2: yo jino tyādimāha. Ayaṃ pana raja raja raja gaṇehi ca garulahūhi ca racitattā vīsatakkharehi
anya-e0601n:714_3: lakkhitā vuttagāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “vutta mīdisantu nāmato rajā
anya-e0601n:715_0: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ rajā rajagaṇā ca rajā rajagaṇā ca rajā rajagaṇā
anya-e0601n:715_1: ca garullahū ca ce siyyuṃ, īdisantu īdisaṃ pana gāthā nāmato nāmena vuttaṃ vutta gāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:716_0: Tattha pana yo jinoti yo buddho. So hi devaputtakilesābhisaṅkhārakhandhamaccuvasena
anya-e0601n:716_1: pañcamāre ajini jināti jinissatīti jinoti vuccati. Nanu ca buddhasāvakāpi pañcamāre
anya-e0601n:716_2: jinattā jinā nāmāti ce. Na bhagavato parūpa nissayavirahaniratisayavasena pañcamārajinattā
anya-e0601n:717_2: ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā parūpanissayarahitaṃ niratisayaṃ taṃ bhañjanaṃ upādāya
anya-e0601n:718_0: Anekajātiyanti anekasaṃsārabhave. Ettha hi ayaṃ jātisaddo anekattho. Tathā hesa ekampi
anya-e0601n:718_1: jātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti ettha bhave āgato. Atthi visākhe nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātīti
anya-e0601n:718_2: ettha nikāye. Tiri nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosīti ettha
anya-e0601n:718_3: paññattiyaṃ. Jāti dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇe. Yaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:718_4: paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ. Tadupādāya sāvassa jātīti
anya-e0601n:718_5: ettha paṭisandhiyaṃ. Sampatijāto ānanda bodhisattoti ettha pasūtiyaṃ. Anupakuṭṭho
anya-e0601n:718_6: jātivādenāti ettha kule. Yatohaṃ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jātoti ettha ariyasīle. Idha
anya-e0601n:718_7: panāyaṃ bhave vattati. Tasmā anekasaṃsārabhaveti attho viññātabbo. So hi jāyati yoni
anya-e0601n:718_8: gatiādi vibhāgoti jātīti vuccati. Atha vā jāyanti nibbattanti ettha khandhādayoti
anya-e0601n:718_9: jāti, bhavo. Janidhātu nibbattaneti. Na ekā anekā, anekā ca sā jāti cāti aneka jāti.
anya-e0601n:719_0: Saputtadāranti puttena ca bhariyāya ca sahitaṃ. Attano kulaṃ punāti pavati sodhetīti
anya-e0601n:719_1: vā putto. Pudhātu pavane ta. Mātāpitūnaṃ manaṃ pūretīti vā putto. Pūradhātu pūraṇe
anya-e0601n:719_2: ta. Putto ca dhītā ca putto. Virūpeka sesoyaṃ. Sāmikena dhariyateti dāro. Dharadhātu
anya-e0601n:719_3: dhāraṇe ṇo. Dhassa do. Atha vā purisena bhogaṃ dīyatīti dāro. Dādhātu dāne rapaccayo.
anya-e0601n:719_4: Dākucchitā kārena purisena ramiyati etthāti vā dāro, bhariyā. Dāpubbaramudhātu ramane
anya-e0601n:719_5: kvi. Dāsaddo kucchitattho. Abhidhānaṭīkāyaṃ pana “dārayante yenāti dāro, dara vidāraṇe.
anya-e0601n:719_6: Akattari ca kārake saññāyaṃ ṇo”ti vuttaṃ. Putto ca dāro ca puttadāro. Samāhāradvandepi
anya-e0601n:719_7: hi pulliṅgaṃ icchanti ācariyā. Tena saha vattati yassāti saputtadāro, puttadārapariccāgo.
anya-e0601n:719_9: paṭibaddhasakalasarīrañca aṅgati gacchati kāyeti aṅgo, cakkhādisarīrāvayavo. Agidhātu
anya-e0601n:719_10: gatiyaṃ a. Jīvanti sattā etenāti jīvitaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ. Jīvadhātu pāṇadhāraṇe ta.
anya-e0601n:719_11: Aṅgo ca jīvitañca aṅgajīvitaṃ. Ettha ca pisaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena dhanaraṭṭhapariccāgaṃ
anya-e0601n:720_1: Atha vā sambhāvanattho. Tena bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇahetupi puttadāraaṅgajīvitampi
anya-e0601n:720_2: alaggamānaso pariccajeti, pageva dhanādibāhiravatthu pariccāgepīti sambhāveti.
anya-e0601n:721_1: hi topaccayo. Cattāri saccāni bujjhatīti bodhi, arahattamaggañāṇaṃ. Sabba ñeyyadhamme
anya-e0601n:721_2: bujjhatīti bodhi, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Budhadhātu ñāṇe ṇa. Itthiliṅgajotako īpaccayo
anya-e0601n:721_3: ca. Vuttañhi abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ – “bodhi sabbaññutañāṇe, ariyamagge ca nāriya”nti.
anya-e0601n:721_4: Bodhi ca bodhi ca bodhi sarūpekase savasena. Piyanaṃ pemo, piyāyitabboti vā pemo.
anya-e0601n:721_5: Pīdhātu tappanakantīsu manipaccayo. Bodhiyā pemo bodhipemo, tato bodhipemato. Bhagavatā
anya-e0601n:721_6: hi puttadāraaṅgajīvitehipi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena sata sahassaguṇenapi bodhiñāṇameva
anya-e0601n:722: “Na me dessā ubho puttā, maddī devī na dessiyā;
anya-e0601n:723: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā piye adāsaha”nti.
anya-e0601n:725_0: Alaggamānasoti puttadāraaṅgajīvitādīsu anallīyana citto hutvā laganaṃ saṅganaṃ laggo,
anya-e0601n:725_1: lagati saṅgati allayati vāti laggo. Lagadhātu saṅge allīyane vā gapaccayo. Na laggo
anya-e0601n:725_2: alaggo, natthi laggo ettha puttadāra aṅgajīvitādīsūti vā alaggo. Manati jānāti ārammaṇanti
anya-e0601n:725_3: mano. Soyeva mānaso. Alaggo mānaso yassa soti alaggamānaso, jino. Atthikassāti putta
anya-e0601n:725_4: dārādiṃ kāmikassa, yācakassa paṭiggāhakassa vāti attho. Attho kāmo assa atthīti atthiko,
anya-e0601n:725_5: ṇiko. Tassa atthikassa. Adāsiyevāti pūjānuggahakāmatāya ñāṇasampayuttapariccāgacetanāya
anya-e0601n:725_6: adāsievāti attho. Bodhisatto hi pāramīpūraṇa kāle sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatā
anya-e0601n:725_7: gatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sīsaṃ kantitvā galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni
anya-e0601n:725_8: akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyañca kheḷapiṇḍamiva
anya-e0601n:725_9: anapekkho pariccajitvā dīyamānova sammāsambodhiñāṇaṃ laddhuṃ sakkā, na puttadāraaṅgajīvitampi
anya-e0601n:725_10: apariccajitvā. Pañca hi mahāpariccāge apariccajitvā buddhabhūtapubbā nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:725_12: laddhuṃ samatthāva. Tasmāyeva bhagavantaṃyeva saputtadāramaṅgajīvitampi bodhipemato
anya-e0601n:725_13: alaggamānaso adāsiyeva atthi kassāti thometi. Vuttañhetaṃ vessantarajātakaṭṭha kathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:725_15: jīvitapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge apariccajitvā buddhabhūtapubbā nāma natthī”ti.
anya-e0601n:726_0: Evaṃ pañcahi mahāpariccāgaguṇehi bhagavato thomanaṃ katvā idāni dānādipāramīpūraṇaguṇena
anya-e0601n:726_1: thomanaṃ kattu kāmo dānapāramintiādimāha. Tattha dānanti tividhaṃ hoti cāgacetanā
anya-e0601n:726_2: ca, virati ca, deyyadhammo cāti. Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dānanti āgataṭṭhāne hi
anya-e0601n:726_3: cāgacetanā dānaṃ nāma. Abhayaṃ detīti āgataṭṭhāne viratī dānaṃ nāma. Dānaṃ deti annaṃ
anya-e0601n:726_4: pānanti āgataṭṭhāne deyyadhammo dānaṃ nāma. Tattha cāgacetanā deti vā deyyadhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:726_5: denti vā etāya deyyadhammanti dānaṃ. Virati avakhaṇḍanaṭṭhena lavanaṭṭhena vā dānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:726_6: Sā hi uppajjamānā bhayabheravasaṅkhātaṃ dussilyaṃ cetanaṃ dāti lunāti cāti dānaṃ,
anya-e0601n:726_7: deyyadhammo diyyatīti dānaṃ. Idha pana tividhaṃ dānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Pāramīsaddassa
anya-e0601n:726_8: vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Atha vā pāraṃ nibbānaṃ eti gacchati etāyāti pārami.
anya-e0601n:726_9: Pārasaddūpapada idhātu gatiyaṃ kvi. Pāraṃ itīti padacchedo kātabbo. Dānameva pāramī
anya-e0601n:726_10: dānapāramī, taṃ dānapāramiṃ. Tatoti dānapāramito. Paranti aññaṃ. Sīlapāramādikampīti
anya-e0601n:726_11: sīlatīti sīlaṃ. Sīla dhātu samādhimhi a. Kāyavacīkammāni samādahati samādhapetīti
anya-e0601n:726_12: attho. Sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susilyavasena na vippakiratīti vā sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:726_13: sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ etenāti vā sīlaṃ. Atha vā sīlayati upadhāretīti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:726_14: sīladhātu upadhāraṇe a. Kusala dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena ābhuso dhāretīti attho.
anya-e0601n:726_15: Sīlenti vā etena kusale dhamme upadhārenti sādhavoti sīlaṃ, sīliyati upadhāriyati
anya-e0601n:726_16: sappurisehi hadayamaṃsantaraṃ upanetvāti vā sīlaṃ, sīleti upadhāreti taṃ samaṅgī
anya-e0601n:726_17: puggalaṃ apāyesu uppattinīvāraṇavasena suggati nibbānanti vā sīlaṃ, sīlameva pāramī
anya-e0601n:726_18: sīlapāramī, sā ādi yāsanteti sīlapāramādikā. Ettha ca ādisaddena nekkhammapaññā vīriyakhantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramiṃ
anya-e0601n:729: Pisaddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho. Tena pañca mahāpariccāge sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0601n:730_0: Apūrīti sammāsambodhatthāya pūraṇaṃ akāsīti attho. Bhagavato hi dīpaṅkarapādamūle
anya-e0601n:730_1: aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhatthāya abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya anekajātīsu sammāsambodhiṃ
anya-e0601n:730_2: paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamanto adinnadānaṃ nāma natthi, arakkhitasīlaṃ nāma natthi. Apūritā
anya-e0601n:730_3: pāramī nāma natthi. Atibahumpi pūraṇaṃ akāsiyeva. Bhagavā hi bodhisatta bhūto catūsu
anya-e0601n:730_4: mahāsamuddesu udakaṃ parājetvā adhikaṃ lohitadānamakāsi. Sakalapathaviyā paṃsuṃ parājetvā
anya-e0601n:730_5: adhikaṃ maṃsamadāsi. Sinerupabbatarājaṃ parājetvā adhikaṃ sīsadānamadāsi. Ākāse tārakasamūhaṃ
anya-e0601n:737_0: Tattha ca soti so evaṃvidho bodhisatto. Sāgareti catūsu mahāsamuddesu. Jaladhikanti
anya-e0601n:737_1: udakato adhikaṃ katvā. Rudhiraṃ adāsīti lohitadānamadāsi. Bhūmiṃ parājiyāti paṃsupathaviyā
anya-e0601n:737_2: paṃsuṃ parājetvā attano sarīramaṃsaṃ adhikaṃ adāsi. Meruppamāṇamadhikanti yojana
anya-e0601n:737_3: aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassubbedhassa girirājassa pamāṇatopi adhikaṃ katvā. Samoḷisīsanti
anya-e0601n:737_4: moḷiyā saha abhisittasīsaṃ adāsi. Kheti cakkavāḷapabbatapariyante ākāse. Tārakādhikataranti
anya-e0601n:737_5: nakkhattāditārakarūpatopi adhikaṃ katvā. Nayanaṃ adāsīti nettadānaṃ adāsīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:738_0: Tāsamiddhiyopayātamaggatanti tāsaṃ iddhiyā upayātaṃ aggatanti padacchedo. Tāsanti
anya-e0601n:738_1: tāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ. Iddhiyāti samiddhiyā, hetvatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Upayātanti
anya-e0601n:738_2: upagataṃ. Aggatanti sabbasattānaṃ uttamabhāvaṃ, seṭṭhabhūtaṃ buddhattanti attho.
anya-e0601n:738_3: Taṃ pana padaṃ upayātantipade kammaṃ. Aggasaddo cettha uttamavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.
anya-e0601n:738_4: Atha vā aggati uttamabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhūtaṃ vā buddhabhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti aggo, jino. Aggadhātu
anya-e0601n:738_5: gatiyaṃ a. Aggassa bhāvo aggataṃ. Bhagavā hi anantalokadhātūsu sabba sattānaṃ aggo
anya-e0601n:738_6: uttamataro seṭṭhataroti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ dasanipāta aṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ –
anya-e0601n:739_0: “Yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino
anya-e0601n:739_1: vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññīnāsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti.
anya-e0601n:740_0: Tamekadīpakanti taṃ ekadīpakanti padacchedo. Tanti jinaṃ. Ekadīpakanti sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:740_1: ekapaṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhabhūtaṃ vā. Dīpakasaddo hi paṭisaraṇapatiṭṭhavācako nipphannapāṭipadiko.
anya-e0601n:740_3: paṭisaraṇabhāvena sattā etthāti vā dīpako, jino. Dīpadhātu patiṭṭhāyaṃ ako. Ekasaddo
anya-e0601n:740_4: saṅkhyāvācako. Eko ekabhūto dīpakoti ekadīpako, jino. Atha vā ekadīpakanti manussānaṃ
anya-e0601n:741_0: Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Jalamajjhe dippatīti dīpo. Dvidhā āposandati etthāti vā
anya-e0601n:741_1: dīpo. Soyeva dīpako. Soviya eko buddho hutvā eti gacchati pavattatīti ekadīpako,
anya-e0601n:741_2: jino. Yathā hi mahāsamudde bhinnanāvānaṃ manussānaṃ samuddadīpo paṭisaraṇo patiṭṭho
anya-e0601n:741_3: hoti, evaṃ jino saṃsārasāgare alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhe osīdantānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ ekabuddhabhūto
anya-e0601n:741_4: paṭisaraṇo patiṭṭho hotīti ekadīpakanti thometi. Taṃ jinaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:742_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Yo jino aneka jātiyaṃ anekasaṃsārabhave, saputtadāraṃ
anya-e0601n:742_1: puttena ca bhariyāya ca sahitaṃ, aṅgajīvitampi aṅgapaccaṅgajīvitindriyampi. Atha
anya-e0601n:742_3: bodhipemato arahattamagga sabbaññutañāṇasaṅkhātāya bodhiyā piyamānattā, alagga mānasoti
anya-e0601n:742_4: puttadāraaṅgajīvitādīsu anallīyanacitto hutvā, atthikassa puttadārādiṃ kāmikassa
anya-e0601n:742_5: yācakassa adāsiyeva pariccāgacetanāya adāsieva. Dānapāramimpi tato dānapāramito paraṃ
anya-e0601n:742_6: aññaṃ sīlapāramādikampi sīlapāramīādikampi, apūri sammāsambodhatthāya pūraṇaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0601n:742_7: tāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ iddhiyā samiddhiyā aggataṃ uttama bhāvaṃ seṭṭhabuddhattaṃ vā, upayātaṃ
anya-e0601n:742_8: upagataṃ, ekadīpakaṃ sabbasattānaṃ ekapaṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ ekapatiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vā, dīpakamiva
anya-e0601n:742_9: ekapaṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vā taṃ jinaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:749_0: 22. Evaṃ ekavīsatimāya gāthāya jinaṃ vanditvā idāni devādevātidevantyādīhi dasahi
anya-e0601n:749_1: guṇehi thometvā munindaṃ vanditukāmo devādevātidevantiādimāha. Ayaṃ pana ma ra bha
anya-e0601n:749_2: na ya ya gaṇehi ca timuniyatīhi ca racitattā ekavīsatakkharehi yuttā ādyantayamakā
anya-e0601n:749_3: saddharā gāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “mrā bhnā yo yotra yena timuniyatiyutā
anya-e0601n:750_0: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ mrā maragaṇā ca bhnā bhanagaṇā ca yogaṇo ca
anya-e0601n:750_1: yena yagaṇena saha yogaṇo ca timuniyatiyutā sattamakkharantetīhi yatīhi yuttā ca
anya-e0601n:750_2: ce siyuṃ. Atra imasmiṃ pakati chande ayaṃ gāthā saddharāgāthāti kittitāti. Ettha
anya-e0601n:750_3: ca munisaddo sattasaṅkhyāvācakoti daṭṭhabbo. Ekasmiṃ pāde sattamakkharante sattamakkharante
anya-e0601n:750_4: yatīnaṃ tiparivattattā timuniyatiyutāti vuttaṃ. Ekavīsatakkharavantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:751_1: atiuttamaṃ atiseṭṭhaṃ visuddhidevabhūtaṃ. Ettha hi devāti sammutidevā. Te hi mānussaissariyasampattīhi
anya-e0601n:751_2: dibbantīti manussarājadevī kumārā devāti vuccanti. Puna devāti upapattidevā. Te hi
anya-e0601n:751_3: dibbaissariyasampattīhi dibbantīti catumahārājikā devā vuccanti, dibbanti kāmaguṇādīhi
anya-e0601n:751_4: kīḷanti laḷanti, tesu vā viharanti, vijayasamatthatāyogena paccatthike vijetuṃ icchanti,
anya-e0601n:751_5: issariyadhanādisakkāradānaggahaṇaṃ taṃ taṃ atthānusāsanañca karontā voharanti. Puññātisayayogānubhāvappattāya
anya-e0601n:751_6: jutiyā jotanti. Yathādhippetañca visayaṃ appaṭighātena gacchanti. Yathicchitanipphādane
anya-e0601n:751_7: ca sakkontīti devāti visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāyaṃ āgatanayenapi veditabbo. Atidevanti
anya-e0601n:751_8: tesaṃ devānaṃ atiuttamaṃ atiseṭṭhaṃ vā visuddhi devabhūtaṃ bhagavantanti attho. So
anya-e0601n:751_9: hi tesaṃ sammuti upapattidevānaṃ sīlādiguṇehi atirekattā atireko devoti bhagavā atidevoti
anya-e0601n:751_10: vuccati. Devo devānaṃ atireko atiuttamo atiseṭṭho ativisiṭṭho devo devādevātidevo,
anya-e0601n:752_0: Vuttañhi dhammahadayavibhaṅge “devāti tayo devā sammuti devā, upapattidevā, visuddhidevā.
anya-e0601n:752_1: Sammutidevā nāma rājāno deviyo rājakumārā. Upapattidevā nāma catumahārājike deve
anya-e0601n:752_2: upādāya tadupari devā. Visuddhidevā nāma arahanto vuccantī”ti.
anya-e0601n:753_0: Bhagavā pana nirātisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānagatapañcavidhamāravija
anya-e0601n:753_3: jutiyā anaññasādhāraṇāya ñāṇasarīragatiyā māravijaya sabbaññuguṇaparahita nipphādanesu
anya-e0601n:753_4: appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti gamanīyato abhitthavanīyato
anya-e0601n:753_5: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitattā tesaṃ devānaṃ
anya-e0601n:753_6: atiseṭṭho atiuttamo devoti devādevātidevoti visuddhimagga mahāṭīkāyaṃ āgatanayenapi veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:754_0: Nidhanavapudharanti antimakāyadhāraṇaṃ. Ettha ca nidhanasaddo pariyosānavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.
anya-e0601n:754_1: Atha vā nidheti pariyosānaṃ karoti etenāti nidhanaṃ. Nidheti vināseti bhavanti vā
anya-e0601n:754_2: nidhanaṃ, antimakāyo labbhati. Nipubba dhā dhātu nāse yu. Vapati kusalākusalabījametthāti
anya-e0601n:754_3: vapu, kāyo. Vapadhātu bījasantāne u. Nidhanañca taṃ vapu cāti nidhanavapu, taṃ dhāretīti
anya-e0601n:754_4: nidhanavapudharo, munindo. Taṃ nidhanavapudharaṃ. So hi anamataggasaṃsārabhavesu
anya-e0601n:754_5: nibbattentānaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ bodhimaṇḍe aggamaggañāṇasatthena samucchindi tattā
anya-e0601n:754_6: punabbhavābhinibbatti natthi. Ayañhi buddhabhāvajāti antima bhavo hoti, tasmā visesena
anya-e0601n:754_7: munindameva nidhanavapudharanti thometi. Vuttañhetaṃ aṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ “buddho antima dharo”ti.
anya-e0601n:755_0: Mārabhaṅganti devaputtādipañcamāre viddhaṃsanaṃ. Mārasaddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:755_1: Pañcamāre bhañjati abhañji bhañjissatīti mārabhaṅgo, munindo. Mārasaddūpapada bhanjadhātu
anya-e0601n:755_2: avamaddane tapaccayo. Tassa saha dhātvantena goādeso. Nakārassa niggahitādeso. Tassa
anya-e0601n:755_3: kavaggantādeso. Taṃ mārabhaṅgaṃ. Abhaṅganti mārasenāya bhañjituṃ viddhaṃsituṃ asamatthaṃ,
anya-e0601n:755_4: bhañjiyate bhaṅgo. Nabhaṅgo abhaṅgo. Atha vā mārasenāya na bhañjiyatīti abhaṅgo.
anya-e0601n:755_5: Mārasenāya bhañjituṃ na arahatīti attho. Mārasenā bhañjituṃ na samatthoti vā abhaṅgo,
anya-e0601n:756_0: Dīpaṃdīpaṃ pajānanti ettha pajānaṃ dīpaṃ dīpanti sambandho. Tattha pajānanti sattānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:756_1: Tehi kammakilesehi pajāyanti nibbattiyanti, pakārena vā jāyanti nibbattanti paṭisandhicutivasenāti
anya-e0601n:756_2: pajāti vuccanti. Dīpanti paññāpadīpaṃ. Tañhi kusalākusale dhamme vibhajitvā dīpeti
anya-e0601n:756_3: pakāseti jotetīti dīpanti vuccati. Atha vā dippati jotetīti dīpo. Andhakāraṃ vidhametvā
anya-e0601n:756_4: ālokaṃ pakāsetīti attho. Dīpadhātu dittiyaṃ a. Dīpamivāti dīpā, paññā. Yathā hi padīpo
anya-e0601n:756_5: andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ pakāseti, evaṃ paññā avijjandhakāraṃ hantvā dhammālokaṃ
anya-e0601n:756_6: pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ dīpaṃ. Puna dīpanti dīpakaṃ pakāsentanti attho. So hi
anya-e0601n:756_7: dīpeti pakāsetīti dīpoti vuccati. Munindo hi payirupāsanavasena gatāgatānaṃ vineyyasattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:756_8: dhammadesanāya catumaggañāṇādipaññāpadīpaṃ pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ dīpaṃ.
anya-e0601n:757_1: jināti etthāti jayo, bodhirukkhapallaṅko. Jidhātu jaye ṇa. Varitabbo patthi tabboti
anya-e0601n:757_2: varo, varadhātu patthane a. Varati nivāreti hīnanti vā varo. Varadhātu nivāraṇe a.
anya-e0601n:757_3: Buddhena seviyati bhajiyati etthāti sayano. Sidhātu sevāyaṃyu. Varo uttamo sayano
anya-e0601n:757_4: varasayano, jayoeva varasayano jayavarasayano, bodhirukkhapallaṅko. Tasmiṃ.
anya-e0601n:758_0: Bodhipattaṃdhipattanti bodhipattaṃ adhipattanti padacchedo. Bodhipattanti arahattamaggasabbaññutañāṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:758_1: gataṃ. Ettha ca bodhisaddo rukkhamaggañāṇasabbaññutañāṇanibbānesupi vattati. Tathā
anya-e0601n:758_2: hesa bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddhotiādīsu rukkhe vattati. Bodhi vuccati catūsu
anya-e0601n:758_3: maggesu ñāṇantiādīsu magge. Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūrī medhasotiādīsu sabbaññutañāṇe.
anya-e0601n:758_4: Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhatantiādīsu nibbāne. Idha pana bhagavato arahattamaggasabbaññutañāṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:758_5: adhippetaṃ. Cattāri saccāni bujjhatīti bodhi, arahatta maggañāṇaṃ. Sabbañeyyadhamme
anya-e0601n:758_6: bujjhatīti bodhi, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Budhadhātu ñāṇe ṇa ī ca. Bodhi ca bodhi ca bodhi
anya-e0601n:758_7: sarūpekasesavasena. Taṃ apajjiṃ agaminti bodhi patto, munindo. Taṃ bodhipattaṃ. Adhipattanti
anya-e0601n:758_8: sadevake loke sabbadevamanussānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ gatanti attho. Sabbadevamanussānaṃ
anya-e0601n:758_9: adhikaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ patto gatoti adhipatto, munindo. Taṃ adhipattaṃ.
anya-e0601n:758_10: Yathā hi kukkuṭapotakānaṃ yo kukkuṭapotako aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhinibbhido, so tesaṃ
anya-e0601n:758_11: jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ gato, evameva bhagavā sadevake loke avijjā gatāya pajāya
anya-e0601n:758_12: taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātattā ca sīlasamādhipaññādi
anya-e0601n:758_13: sabbaguṇehi adhikattā ca appaṭisamattā ca sabbadevamanussānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:758_14: seṭṭhabhāvaṃ appaṭisamabhāvañca patto gatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā adhipattanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:759_0: Brahmābrahmāgatānanti brahma abrahma āgatānanti padacchedo. Āgatānaṃ payirupāsanavasena
anya-e0601n:759_1: āgatānaṃ brahma devamanussaparisānanti attho. Tattha brahmāti brahmapārisajjādi brahmā.
anya-e0601n:759_2: Te hi jhānādiguṇehi brūhanti vaḍḍhantīti brahmāti vuccanti, abrahmāti devamanussā.
anya-e0601n:759_3: Te hi na brahmā abrahmāti vuccanti, āgacchanti payirupāsanavasenāti āgatā, brahmā
anya-e0601n:759_4: brahmāno labbhanti. Āpubbagamudhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Āgatā brahmā ca abrahmā cāti brahmābrahmāgatā,
anya-e0601n:759_5: tesaṃ. Visesana paranipātapadametaṃ agyāhitotiādīsu viya. Taṃ pana padaṃ varagirakathikantipade
anya-e0601n:760_0: Varagirakathikanti uttamaṃ dhammavācaṃ desentaṃ. Seṭṭhavācāya dhammaṃ desamānaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:760_1: gāyati kathiyatīti girā, vācā. Gādhātu sadde īro. Varā seṭṭhā girā vācā varagirā.
anya-e0601n:760_2: Tāya dhammaṃ kathetīti varagirakathiko, munindo. Uttamāya manāpabhūtavācāya dhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:761_0: Pāpahīnanti lāmakaakusalakilesaṃ. Tañhi apāyādi dukkhaṃ pāpetīti pāpoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:761_1: Akusalakileso. Papubbaapadhātu pāpuṇane. Kusaladhammena hātabbaṃ caji tabbanti hīnanti
anya-e0601n:761_2: vuccati. Lāmakadhammo. Hādhātu cāge tapaccayo, tassino. Pāpoeva hīnaṃ pāpahīnaṃ.
anya-e0601n:761_3: Pahīnanti arahattamaggañāṇena susamucchinnaṃ. Pajahatīti pahīno, munindo. Papubbahādhātu
anya-e0601n:761_4: cāge ino. Sabbe akusaladhamme aggamaggañāṇena samucchindatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:762_1: abhirāmaṭṭhānabhūtanti attho. Lokoti manussa loko, so hi lokayati patiṭṭhahati pavattati
anya-e0601n:762_2: vā ettha puññāpuññaṃ tabbipāko cāti loko, manussa loko. Lokadhātu patiṭṭhāyaṃ a.
anya-e0601n:762_3: Na loko aloko. Devabrahmaloko. Loko ca aloko ca lokālokā, tesaṃ sattalokānaṃ abhiadhikaṃ
anya-e0601n:762_4: ramanti etthāti lokālokābhirāmo. Munindo, taṃ. So hi tilokānaṃ pūjānuggahādikaraṇavasena
anya-e0601n:762_5: abhirāmaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti lokālokābhirāmanti thometi. Satatanti niccaṃ. Rattidivaṃ abhiṇhanti
anya-e0601n:762_6: attho. Munindanti pañcamunissaraṃ, taṃ munindaṃ. Abhinameti ahaṃ abhisakkaccaṃ namāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:763_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Devādevātidevaṃ sammutidevaupapattidevānaṃ atiuttamaṃ
anya-e0601n:763_2: viddhaṃsanaṃ abhaṅgaṃ mārasenāya bhañjituṃ asamatthaṃ, mārasenā bhañjanārahaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:763_3: pajānaṃ sattānaṃ dīpaṃ paññāpadīpaṃ, kammabhūtaṃ dīpaṃ dīpakaṃ pakāsentaṃ, jayavarasayane
anya-e0601n:763_5: gataṃ adhipattaṃ sadevake loke sabbadevamanussānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ gataṃ, brahmā brahmāgatānaṃ
anya-e0601n:763_6: payirupāsanavasena āgatānaṃ brahmadeva manussaparisānaṃ varagirakathikaṃ seṭṭhavācāya
anya-e0601n:763_7: dhammaṃ desamānaṃ pāpahīnaṃ lāmakaakusalakilesaṃ pahīnaṃ arahattamagga ñāṇena susamucchinnaṃ
anya-e0601n:763_8: lokālokābhirāmaṃ manussa lokadevabrahmalokānaṃ abhirāmabhūtaṃ, munindaṃ pañcamunissaraṃ
anya-e0601n:763_9: taṃ munindaṃ satataṃ niccaṃ abhiṇhaṃ ahaṃ abhiname abhisakkaccaṃ namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:776: Sattappīno ca dīghaṅguli matha sugato lomakūpekalomo,
anya-e0601n:779: Nātho uṇhīsasīso itiguṇasahitaṃ taṃ mahesiṃ namāmi.
anya-e0601n:780_0: 23. Evaṃ dvāvīsatimāya gāthāya munindassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni buddho nigrodhabimbotyādīhi
anya-e0601n:780_1: tīhi gāthāhi buddhassa dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasampannehi guṇehi thomitvā mahesiṃ
anya-e0601n:780_2: vanditukāmo buddho nigrodhabimbotyādigāthāttayamāha. Taṃ pana gāthāttayaṃ saddharāgāthāti
anya-e0601n:781_1: vā. Taṃ pana padaṃ nigrodhabimbo tyādīsu padesu tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:781_2: So hi cattāri saccāni bujjhati abujjhi bujjhissatīti ca, niravasesasabbadhamme bujjhati
anya-e0601n:781_3: abujjhi bujjhissatīti ca buddhoti vuccati. Tesu pana dvīsu vikappesu paṭhamavikappe
anya-e0601n:781_4: budhadhātussa vāccaṃ catusaccadhammapaṭivijjhanaṃ arahattamaggañāṇaṃ mukhyena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:781_5: Heṭṭhā maggaphalañāṇañca vipassanāñāṇañca pāramīñāṇañca phalūpacārena. Arahattaphalañāṇañca
anya-e0601n:781_6: sabbaññutañāṇādipacchimapacchimañāṇāni ca kāraṇūpacārena. Tapaccayassa vāccaṃ tena
anya-e0601n:781_7: mukhyopacārena upalakkhito aparimitaguṇagaṇālaṅkāraṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paṭicca buddhobuddhoti
anya-e0601n:781_8: paññatto sattaviseso labbhati. Dutiya vikappe budhadhātussa vāccaṃ sabbañeyyadhammapaṭivijjhanasamatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:781_9: sabbaññutañāṇaṃ mukhyena labbhati. Catumaggaphalañāṇañca vipassanā pāramīñāṇañca
anya-e0601n:781_11: vāccaṃ tena mukhyopacārena upalakkhito aparimāṇaguṇoghālaṅkataṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0601n:781_12: buddhobuddhoti paññatto sattaviseso labbhati. Kiṃpanettha budhadhātussa vāccabhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:781_13: ñāṇameva buddho nāma hoti. Udāhu tapaccayassa vāccabhūto khandhasantāno buddho nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:781_14: Ñāṇena pana malakara kilesānaṃ savāsanānaṃ niravasesaṃ pahīnattā citta santāno suddho
anya-e0601n:781_15: hoti. Tassa pana suddhattā tassa nissayabhūto rūpakāyopi suddho hoti. Tasmā tapaccayassa
anya-e0601n:782_1: upādāya paṇṇattiko sabbaññutapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya paṇṇattiko sattaviseso buddho”ti.
anya-e0601n:783_0: Paramatthabhūte hi khandhasantāne vohārasukhatthaṃ satta puggalādivohāro āropito.
anya-e0601n:783_1: Evaṃ vohārappatto satto yāva bodhiñāṇatthāya na vāyamati, paṇidhānaṃ na karoti. Tāva
anya-e0601n:783_2: sattotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Yato pana paṭṭhāya bodhiñāṇatthāya vāyamati, paṇidhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:783_3: karoti, tadā bodhisatto nāma vohāro hoti. So pana yadā bodhiñāṇaṃ labhati, tadā buddho
anya-e0601n:783_4: nāma vohāro hoti. Tasmā paññattisaṅkhāto khandhasantāno buddho nāmāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:783_5: Vuttañhi mahāniddese “buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā kataṃ, na bhātarā
anya-e0601n:783_6: kataṃ, na bhaginiyā kataṃ, na mittāmaccehi kataṃ, na ñātisā lohitehi kataṃ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi
anya-e0601n:783_7: kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ, vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle
anya-e0601n:783_8: saha sabbaññutañāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddhoti taṃ buddha”nti.
anya-e0601n:783_9: Atha vā paṭṭhānanayena vā nānantarikanayena vā ñāṇappadhāno suvisuddhakhandhasantāno
anya-e0601n:784_0: Nigrodhabimboti nigrodharukkhassa parimaṇḍalo viya parimaṇḍalasarīro. Adhobhāgaṃ
anya-e0601n:784_1: rundhatīti nigrodho, vaṭarukkho. Nipubbarudhadhātu āvaraṇe ṇa, usso gāgamo. Vamati
anya-e0601n:784_2: uggiratīti bimbo, sarīro. Vamudhātu uggiraṇe bo. Vamissa vassa bittaṃ. Nigrodhassa
anya-e0601n:784_3: parimaṇḍalo viya parimaṇḍalo bimbo sarīro yassāti nigrodhabimbo, buddho. Nigrodhaparimaṇḍalabimboti
anya-e0601n:784_4: vattabbe parimaṇḍalasaddalope nevaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā hi paṇṇāsahatthatāya vā satahatthatāya
anya-e0601n:784_5: vā samakkhandhasākho nigrodho dīghatopi vitthāratopi ekappamāṇova hoti, evaṃ kāyatopi
anya-e0601n:784_6: byāmatopi ekappamāṇo. Yathā aññesaṃ kāyo vā dīgho hoti, byāmo vā na evaṃ visamappamāṇoti
anya-e0601n:784_7: attho. Vuttañhi brahmāyusutte “nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo. Yāvatakvāssa
anya-e0601n:784_8: kāyo, tāva takvāssa byāmo. Yāvatakvāssa byāmo, tāva takvāssa kāyo”ti.
anya-e0601n:785_0: Mudukaracaraṇoti saṇhahatthapādo. Ettha ca mudusaddo saṇhasukhumavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.
anya-e0601n:785_1: Atha vā mudeti modayati satteti mudu, saṇhahatthapādo. Mudadhātu modane hāse vā u.
anya-e0601n:785_2: Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ karoti etenāti karo, hattho carati gacchati etena taṃ taṃ ṭhānanti
anya-e0601n:785_3: caraṇo, pādo. Caradhātu gatiyaṃ yu. Mudukaro ca caraṇo ca yassāti mudukaracaraṇo,
anya-e0601n:785_4: buddho. Sappi maṇḍe osāritvā ṭhapitaṃ satavāraṃ vihatakappāsapaṭalaṃ viya mudujātamattakumārassa
anya-e0601n:785_5: viya ca niccakālaṃ muduhattha pādoti attho.
anya-e0601n:786_0: Brahmaghoseṇijaṅghoti brahmaghoso eṇijaṅghoti padacchedo. Brahmaghosoti brahmuno
anya-e0601n:786_1: saro viya aṭṭhaṅga sampannasaravantoti attho. Jhānādiguṇehi brūhati vaḍḍhatītibrahmā.
anya-e0601n:786_2: Brūhadhātu manipaccayo. Ghusiyati saddiyati kathiyatīti ghoso, saro. Ghusadhātu sadde
anya-e0601n:786_3: ṇa. Brahmuno ghoso saro brahmaghoso, so viya ghoso saro yassāti brahmaghoso, buddho.
anya-e0601n:786_4: Yathā hi mahābrahmuno pittasemhehi apalibuddhattā saro visuddho hoti, evameva tathāgatenapi
anya-e0601n:786_5: kataṃ kammaṃ vatthuṃ sodheti, vatthussa suddhattā nābhito paṭṭhāya samuṭṭhahanto
anya-e0601n:786_6: saro visuddho aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatoti attho. Tasmā brahmaghoso viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatasaravantoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:787_0: Eṇijaṅghoti eṇimigassa jaṅghā viya suvaṭṭajāṇuko. Eti gacchatīti eṇi, migo. Idhātu
anya-e0601n:787_1: gatiyaṃ ṇi. Jāyati kamanametāyāti jaṅgho, jāṇu. Janadhātu janane gho. Nassa niggahitādeso.
anya-e0601n:787_2: Eṇimigassa jaṅgho viya jaṅgho yassa soti eṇijaṅgho, buddho. Yathā hi eṇimigassa jaṅgho
anya-e0601n:787_3: suvaṭṭo hoti, evameva buddhassa maṃsussadena paripuṇṇajaṅgho. Na ekato bandhapiṇḍikamaṃso.
anya-e0601n:787_4: Samantato samasaṇṭhitena maṃsena parikkhittāhi suvaṭṭitāhi sāli gabbhayavagabbhasadisāhi
anya-e0601n:787_5: jaṅghāhi samannāgatoti attho. Tasmā eṇimigajaṅghasadiso suvaṭṭajāṇukoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:788_0: Kosacchādaṅgajātoti kosacchādaaṅgajātoti padacchedo. Usabhavāraṇādīnaṃ aṅgajāto viya
anya-e0601n:788_1: suvaṇṇapaduma kaṇṇikasadisena vatthakosena paṭicchannena guyhaṅgajātena samannāgatoti
anya-e0601n:788_2: attho. Kusati tiṭṭhati etthāti koso. Kusadhātu gatiyaṃ ṇa. Chādiyatīti chādo. Chadadhātu
anya-e0601n:788_3: paṭicchanne ṇa. Kosena chādo kosacchādo. Aṅge sarīrāvayave jātanti aṅgajātaṃ. Kosacchādaṃ
anya-e0601n:788_4: aṅgajātaṃ byañjanaṃ yassāti kosacchādaṅgajāto, buddho. Bhagavato hi usabhavāraṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:788_5: aṅgajāto viya suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇi kasadisena kosohitavatthaguyhena byañjanena samannāgatoti
anya-e0601n:788_6: attho. Tasmā kosacchādaṅgajātasampannoti thometi. Punarapīti puna apīti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:788_7: Rakārā gamo. Punāti eso atthantaratthe nipāto. Apisaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Sugatoti
anya-e0601n:788_8: buddho. So hi sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchatīti sugatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:789_0: Suppatiṭṭhitapādoti suvaṇṇapādukatalamiva bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitapādo. Samaṃ
anya-e0601n:789_1: suṭṭhu bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhatīti suppatiṭṭhito, pādo. Su pati pubbo ṭhā dhātu gatinivattiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:789_2: ta. Pajjati gacchati etenāti pādo. Padadhātu gatimhi ṇa. Suppatiṭṭhito pādo yassāti
anya-e0601n:789_3: suppatiṭṭhitapādo, sugato. Yathā hi aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapentānaṃ aggatalaṃ
anya-e0601n:789_4: vā paṇhiṃ vā passaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ phusati vemajjhaṃ vā pana chiddaṃ hoti, ukkhipantānampi
anya-e0601n:789_5: aggatalādīsu ekakoṭṭhāsova paṭhamaṃ uṭṭhahati, na evaṃ tassa. Tassa pana suvaṇṇapādukatalaṃ
anya-e0601n:789_6: viya ekappahāreneva sakalapādatalaṃ bhūmiṃ phusati, bhūmito uṭṭhahati. Sacepi hi
anya-e0601n:789_7: bhagavā anekasataporisaṃ narakaṃ akkamissāmīti pādaṃ nīharati, tāvadeva ninnaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:789_8: vātapūritaṃ viya kammārabhastaṃ unnamitvā pathavīsamaṃ hoti, unnataṭṭhānampi anto
anya-e0601n:789_9: pavisati, dūre akkamissāmīti abhinīharantassa sineruppamāṇopi pabbato seditavetthaṅkuro
anya-e0601n:789_10: viya namitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgacchati. Tathā hissa yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā yugandharapabbataṃ
anya-e0601n:789_11: akkamissāmīti pāde abhinīharato pabbato namitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgato. So taṃ akkamitvā
anya-e0601n:789_12: dutiyapādena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ akkami. Na hi cakkalakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:789_13: visamaṃ bhavituṃ sakkoti. Khāṇu vā kaṇḍako vā sakkharakathalā vā uccārapassāvo vā
anya-e0601n:789_14: kheḷasiṅghaṇikādīni vā purimatarāva apagacchanti. Tattha tattheva pathaviṃ pavisanti.
anya-e0601n:789_15: Tathāgatassa hi sīlatejena paññātejena dhammatejena dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ ānubhāvena
anya-e0601n:789_16: ayaṃ mahāpathavī samā mudu pupphākiṇṇā honti. Tatra tathāgato samaṃ pādaṃ nikkhipati.
anya-e0601n:789_17: Samaṃ uddharati, sabbāvantehi pādatalehi bhūmiṃ phusati, tasmā suppatiṭṭhitapādoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:790_0: Mūdo dātuṇṇalomoti muda odāta uṇṇalomoti padacchedo. Bhamukantare jāto saṇhasukhumo
anya-e0601n:790_1: seto suddho uṇṇalomavantoti attho. Ettha ca mudasaddo saṇhasukhumavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.
anya-e0601n:790_2: Atha vā mudeti mudayati satteti mudo, sukhumo. Mudadhātu modane a. Avadāyati khaṇḍiyatīti
anya-e0601n:790_3: odāto. Avapubba dādhātu avakhaṇḍane ta. Atha vā avadāyati sujjhatīti odāto, yathā
anya-e0601n:790_4: vodānanti. Mudo ca odāto ca mudodāto, uṇati uddhaṃ gacchatīti uṇṇā, lomo. Uṇṇasaddo
anya-e0601n:790_5: hi loke lomasaddapariyāyoti vadanti ācariyā. Maṃsassa upari pavattatīti attho. Uṇadhātu
anya-e0601n:790_6: gatiyaṃ ṇa. Maṃsacammāni lunāti chindatīti lomo. Ludhātu chindane manipaccayo. Lunitabboti
anya-e0601n:790_7: vā lomo, uṇṇā ca sā lomo cāti uṇṇalomo, lomaviseso. Mudo dāto uṇṇalomo yassa soti
anya-e0601n:790_8: mudodātuṇṇa lomo, sugato. Uṇṇālomaṃ pana bhagavato dvinnaṃ bhamukānaṃ vemajjhe nāsimatthakeyeva
anya-e0601n:790_9: jātaṃ. Uggantvā pana nalāṭamajjhe jātaṃ. Sappimaṇḍe osāretvā ṭhapitasata vitatakappāsapaṭalaṃ
anya-e0601n:790_10: viya mudaṃ. Parisuddhaosadhitārakavaṇṇaṃ viya ca sippalitūlalatātūlaṃ viya ca vigatamalena
anya-e0601n:790_11: odātaṃ uṇṇālomaṃ atthi, na aññesanti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ brahmāyusutte –
anya-e0601n:791: “Uṇṇā kho panassa bhoto gotamassa bhamukantare jātā odātā mudu tūlasannibhā”ti.
anya-e0601n:792_0: Taṃ panetaṃ koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhiyamānaṃ upaḍḍha bāhuppamāṇaṃ hoti. Vissaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0601n:792_1: dakkhiṇāvaṭṭavasena āvaṭṭitvā uddhaggā hutvā santiṭṭhati. Suvaṇṇaphalakamajjhe ṭhapitarajata
anya-e0601n:792_2: pupphuḷakaṃ viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭato nikkhammamānaṃ khīradhāraṃ viya aruṇappabhārañjite
anya-e0601n:792_3: gaganatale osadhitārakaṃ viya ca atimanoharāya siriyā virocati, tasmā mūdodātuṇṇalomoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:793_0: Athamapīti tadaññaṃ api. Sugatoti buddho. So hi sundaravācaṃ gadati vadatīti sugatoti
anya-e0601n:793_1: vuccati. Brahmujuggattabhāvoti brahmaujuuggataattabhāvoti padavibhāgo. Brahmuno uju
anya-e0601n:793_2: uggataattabhāvo viya ujumeva uggataattabhāvo dīghasarīroti attho. Brahmāyusutte pana
anya-e0601n:793_3: “brahmujugatto”tipāṭho. Tadaṭṭhakathāyañca brahmujugattoti brahmā viya ujugatto ujumeva
anya-e0601n:793_4: uggatadīghasarīroti vivarati. Taṃ pana sandhāya brahmujuggattabhāvoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:794_0: Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Jhānādiguṇehi uparūparibrūhati vaḍḍhatīti brahmā. Brūhadhātu
anya-e0601n:794_1: vaḍḍhane ma, arati avaṅkabhāvena pavattatīti uju, avaṅko. Aradhātu gatiyaṃ jupaccayo.
anya-e0601n:794_2: Arissa uādeso. Uddhaṃ gacchati pāpuṇātīti uggato. Upubba gamudhātu gatiyaṃ to. Āhito
anya-e0601n:794_3: āropito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, sarīro. Āpubba dhā dhātu ropane manipaccayo tupaccayo
anya-e0601n:794_4: vā. Dhassa to. Massa to. Atha vā sukhadukkhaṃ adati anubhavatīti attā. Adadhātu anubhavane
anya-e0601n:794_5: manipaccayo. Kaccāyanasaddasatthe pana “sukhadukkhaṃ adati bhakkhatīti attā, jātijarāmaraṇādīhi
anya-e0601n:794_6: adiyate bhakkhiyateti vā attā. Ātumā”ti vuttaṃ. Khyādīhi manimaca tovāti suttena
anya-e0601n:794_7: padasiddhi veditabbā. Attāti abhidhānaṃ buddhi ca bhavanti etasmāti attabhāvo, rūpakāyo.
anya-e0601n:794_8: Anuṭīkāyaṃ pana “āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, soeva bhavati uppajjati na paraparikappito
anya-e0601n:794_9: viya niccoti attabhāvo. Attāti vā diṭṭhigatikehi gahetabbākārena bhavati pavattatīti
anya-e0601n:794_10: attabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ. Brahmuno ujumeva uggato attabhāvo viya ujumeva uggato attabhāvo
anya-e0601n:794_11: yassa soti brahmujuggattabhāvo, sugato. Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇusūti
anya-e0601n:794_12: tīsu ṭhānesu namanti. Thokaṃ kaṭiyaṃ namantā pacchato namanti. Itaresu dvīsu ṭhānesu
anya-e0601n:794_13: purato. Dīghasarīrā paneke passā vaṅkā honti, eke mukhaṃ unnametvā nakkhattāni gaṇayantā
anya-e0601n:794_14: viya caranti, eke appamaṃsalohitā sūlasadisā honti, pavedhamānā gacchanti, tathāgato
anya-e0601n:794_15: pana ujumeva uggantvā dīghappamāṇo devanagare ussitasuvaṇṇa toraṇaṃ viya hoti. Tasmā
anya-e0601n:795_0: Nīlakkhīti nīlaakkhīti padacchedo. Atinīlanettena samannāgatoti attho. Ikkhati passati
anya-e0601n:795_1: anena rūpārammaṇaṃ samavisamaṃ vāti akkhi, nettaṃ. Ikkhadhātu dassane i. Issa attaṃ.
anya-e0601n:795_2: Nīlā atinīlā akkhi nettā yassāti nīlakkhi, sugato. Bhagavato hi na sakalanīlakkhiva
anya-e0601n:795_3: hoti. Nīlayuttaṭṭhāne panassa ummārapupphasadisena ativisuddhena nīlavaṇṇena samannāgatāni
anya-e0601n:795_4: akkhīni honti. Pītayuttaṭṭhāne kaṇikārapupphasadisena lohitavaṇṇena. Lohitayuttaṭṭhāne
anya-e0601n:795_5: bandhujīvakapupphasadisena lohitavaṇṇena. Seta yuttaṭṭhāne osadhitārakasadisena setavaṇṇena.
anya-e0601n:795_6: Kāḷa yuttaṭṭhāne addāriṭṭhakasadisena kāḷavaṇṇena samannāgatāni suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjarasadisāni
anya-e0601n:795_7: khāyanti. Vuttañhi mahāniddese “maṃsacakkhumhi bhagavato pañcavaṇṇā saṃvijjanti.
anya-e0601n:795_8: Nīlo ca vaṇṇo, pītako ca vaṇṇo, lohitako ca vaṇṇo, kaṇho ca vaṇṇo, odāto ca vaṇṇo
anya-e0601n:795_9: akkhilomāni ca bhagavato, yattha ca akkhi lomāni patiṭṭhitāni. Taṃ nīlaṃ hoti sunīlaṃ
anya-e0601n:795_10: pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ ummārapupphasamānaṃ. Tassa parato pītakaṃ hoti supītakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:795_11: pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ kaṇikārapupphasamānaṃ. Ubhato akkhikuṭāni bhagavato lohitakāni
anya-e0601n:795_12: honti sulohikāni pāsādikāni dassaneyyāni indagopakasamānāni. Majjhe kaṇhaṃ hoti sukaṇhaṃ
anya-e0601n:795_13: alūkhaṃ suddhaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ addāriṭṭhaka samānaṃ. Tassa parato odātaṃ hoti
anya-e0601n:795_14: suodātaṃ setaṃ paṇḍaraṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ osadhitārakasamāna”nti. Bhagavā pana
anya-e0601n:795_15: tena maṃsacakkhunā caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakārepi samantā yojanaṃ passati divā ceva rattiñca.
anya-e0601n:797_0: “Tena bhagavā pākatikena maṃsacakkhunā attabhāva pariyāpannena purimasucaritakammābhinibbattena
anya-e0601n:797_1: samantā yojanaṃ passati divā ceva rattiñca. Yadāpi caturaṅgasamannāgato andhakāro
anya-e0601n:797_2: hoti, sūriyo ca atthaṅgamito hoti, kāḷapakkho ca uposatho hoti, tibbo ca vanasaṇḍo
anya-e0601n:797_3: hoti, mahā ca kāḷamegho abbhuṭṭhito hoti, evarūpepi caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre
anya-e0601n:797_4: samantā yojanaṃ passati. Natthi so kuṭṭo vā kavāṭaṃ vā pākāro vā pabbato vā gaccho
anya-e0601n:797_5: vā latā vā āvaraṇaṃ rūpānaṃ dassanāyā”ti. Tasmā upalakkhaṇanayena nīlakkhīti thometi.
anya-e0601n:798_0: Dīghapaṇhīti āyatapaṇhi. Paripuṇṇapaṇhīti attho. Pasati bādhati anena paresanti paṇhi,
anya-e0601n:798_1: pādassa pacchābhāgo. Pasadhātu bādhane ṇi. Sassa ho. Ṇvādimoggallāne pana “paṇa byavahārathutīsu
anya-e0601n:798_2: hi paṇiyati vohāriyatīti paṇhi, pādassa pacchābhāgo”ti vuttaṃ. Dīghā paṇhi yassa
anya-e0601n:798_3: soti dīghapaṇhi, sugato. Yathā hi aññesaṃ agga pādo dīgho hoti. Paṇhimatthake jaṅghā
anya-e0601n:798_4: patiṭṭhāti paṇhiṃ tacchetvā ṭhapitā viya hoti. Na evaṃ tathāgatassa. Tathāgatassa
anya-e0601n:798_5: pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā aggapādā honti. Tatiye koṭṭhāse jaṅghā patiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0601n:798_6: Catutthe koṭṭhāse āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitā viya rattakambale geṇḍukasadisā paṇhi
anya-e0601n:799_0: Sukhumamalachavīti sukhuma amala chavīti padacchedo. Saṇhamalavisuddhataco saṇhamalavirahitataco
anya-e0601n:799_1: vāti attho. Ettha ca sukhumasaddo saṇhavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko. Atha vā sukhayati
anya-e0601n:799_2: saṇhabhāvenāti sukhumaṃ, saṇhaṃ. Sukhadhātu takkariyaṃ umapaccayo. Taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
anya-e0601n:799_3: kiliṭṭhaṃ malati dhāretīti malaṃ, rajādimalaṃ. Maladhātu dhāraṇe a, natthi malametissāti
anya-e0601n:799_4: amalā, chavī. Maṃsaṃ chādetīti chavī. Chada dhātu saṃvaraṇe ravapaccayo īpaccayo
anya-e0601n:799_5: ca. Sukhumā saṇhā amalā malavirahitā chavī yassāti sukhumamalachavī, sugato. Bhagavato
anya-e0601n:799_6: hi suvaṇṇasiniddhasaṇhasarīrattā kañcanasannibha tacattā ca rūpakāye padumapalāse
anya-e0601n:799_7: udakabindhu viya rajojallaṃ vā malaṃ vā na limpati. Vuttañhi majjhimapaṇṇāse brahmāyusutte –
anya-e0601n:800: “Sukhumacchavī kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo sukhumattā chaviyā rajojallaṃ kāye na upalimpatī”ti. Tasmā sukhuma malachavīti thometi.
anya-e0601n:801_0: Thomyarasaggasaggīti thomyarasa gasa aggīti padacchedo. Thomitabba rasaharaṇasattasahassanhārū
anya-e0601n:801_1: uddhaggikāti attho. Thomiyatīti thomyo, nhāru. Thomadhātu sīlāghāyaṃ ṇyo. Madhurādibhedaṃ
anya-e0601n:801_2: rasaṃ gasenti anto pavesentīti rasaggasā, nhāru. Rasasaddūpapadagasadhātu adane a.
anya-e0601n:801_3: Atha vā rasaṃ gasati harati etehīti rasaggasā, nhāru. Gasadhātu haraṇe a. Dhātusaddo
anya-e0601n:801_4: hi anekattho. Rasaggasānaṃ aggāti rasaggasaggā, te ettha santīti rasaggasaggī, nhāru.
anya-e0601n:801_5: Assathyatthe īpaccayo. Thomyo rasaggasaggī yassa soti thomyarasaggasaggī, sugato.
anya-e0601n:801_6: Tathāgatassa hi sattarasaharaṇisahassāni uddhaggāni hutvā gīvāyameva paṭimukkāni.
anya-e0601n:801_7: Tilaphalamattopi āhāro jivhagge ṭhapito sabbaṃ kāyaṃ anupharati. Teneva mahāpadhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:801_8: padahantassa ekataṇḍulādīhipi kaḷāyayūsapasatenapi kāyassa yāpanaṃ hoti. Aññesaṃ
anya-e0601n:801_9: pana tathā abhāvā na sakalakāyaṃ ojā pharati. Tena te bahvābādhā honti. Idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:801_10: appābādhatāsaṅkhātassa nissandaphalassavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmā thomyarasaggasaggīti thometi.
anya-e0601n:803_0: 24. Dutiyagāthāyaṃ jinoti pañcamārajitavā buddho. Tassa pana padassa samacattālīsaggadantotyādīhi
anya-e0601n:803_1: padehi tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho. Cattālīsaggadantoti cattālīsaaggadantoti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:803_2: Samacattālīsa uttamadantoti attho. Ettha ca aggasaddo uttamavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.
anya-e0601n:803_3: Atha vā uttamabhāvaṃ ajati gacchatīti aggo, danto. Daṃsati vidaṃsati bhojjamanenāti
anya-e0601n:803_4: danto. Daṃsadhātu daṃsane ta. Tassa nto dhātvantalopo. Samacattālīsaṃ aggo uttamo
anya-e0601n:803_5: danto yassāti cattālīsaggadanto, jino. Uparimahanuke patiṭṭhitā dantā vīsati heṭṭhime
anya-e0601n:803_6: vīsatīti samacattālīsadantā hontīti attho. Aññesañhi paripuṇṇadantānampi dvattiṃsadantā
anya-e0601n:803_7: honti. Tathā gatassa pana cattālīsaṃ. Tasmā cattālīsaggadantoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:804_0: Samakalapanajoti kakacena chinditvā ṭhapito viya samadantoti attho. Lapati vadati
anya-e0601n:804_1: etenāti lapanaṃ, mukhaṃ. Lapadhātu vadane yu. Tasmiṃ lapane mukhe jātoti lapanajo,
anya-e0601n:804_2: danto. Tappurisasamāsoyaṃ, samako lapanajo danto yassāti samakalapanajo, jino. Pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:804_3: pana “samadanto”ti pāṭho atthi. Ayamevattho. Aññesañhi keci dantā uccā, keci nīcāti
anya-e0601n:804_4: visamā honti. Tathāgatassa pana ayapaṭṭachinnasaṅkhapaṭalaṃ viya samā honti. Tasmā
anya-e0601n:805_1: pakārāgamaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ antaraṃ vemajjhe paripuṇṇapiṭṭhitaloti
anya-e0601n:805_2: attho. Ettha ca aṃsasaddo khandhatthe vattati. Vuttañhetaṃ abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:805_3: “aṃso nitthi bhujasiro, khandho tassandhi jattu ta”nti.
anya-e0601n:806_0: Anati jīvati etenāti aṃso, khandho. Anadhātu pāṇe sopaccayo. Nassa niggahitādeso.
anya-e0601n:806_1: Sarīrassa avayavabhāvena anati gacchati pavattatīti vā aṃso, dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:806_2: antaraṃ vemajjhanti antaraṃso, piṇati pūratīti pīno, piṭṭhitalaṃ. Piṇadhātu pinane
anya-e0601n:806_3: pūraṇe vā ṇa. Ṇassa no. Dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ antaraṃ vemajjhe pīnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:806_4: piṭṭhitalaṃ yassāti antaraṃsappapīno, jino. Uttarapadalopabahubbīhisamāsoyaṃ. Aññesañhi
anya-e0601n:806_5: taṃ ṭhānaṃ ninnaṃ hoti, dve piṭṭhikoṭṭā pāṭiekkaṃ paññāyanti. Tathāgatassa pana kaṭito
anya-e0601n:806_6: paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ yāva khandhā uggamma samussitasuvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya piṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0601n:806_7: chādetvā patiṭṭhitaṃ. Tasmā antaraṃsappapīnoti thometi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “citantaraṃso”ti
anya-e0601n:806_8: pāṭho. Tadaṭṭhakathāyañca “citantaraṃ soti antaraṃsaṃ vuccati dvinnaṃ koṭṭānamantaraṃ.
anya-e0601n:807_1: lakkhitapādataloti attho. Cakkena aṭṭhasatapādacakkena aṅkito lakkhito pādo yena
anya-e0601n:807_2: soti cakkenaṅkitapādo, jino. Tatiyābahubbīhi samāsoyaṃ. Aññesañhi pādatale aṭṭhasatapādacakka
anya-e0601n:807_3: lakkhaṇaṃ natthi. Tathāgatassa pādataleeva vicitraṃ aṭṭhasata pādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:808_0: Vuttañhi brahmāyusutte “heṭṭhā kho pana tassa bhoto gotamassa pādatalesu cakkāni
anya-e0601n:808_1: jātāni sahassārāni sanemikāni sanābhikāni sabbākāraparipūrānī”ti. Aṭṭhasatapādacakkalakkhaṇasarūpaṃ
anya-e0601n:808_2: pana yo pādapaṅkajamuduttalarā jikehīti gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttamevāti.
anya-e0601n:809_0: Aviraḷadasanoti avivaradanto. Avivaradantena sampannoti attho. Vivarati phullatīti
anya-e0601n:809_1: viraḷo. Varadhātu phullaneḷo. Assi. Na viraḷo aviraḷo, natthi viraḷo etassāti aviraḷo,
anya-e0601n:809_2: danto. Daṃsati vidaṃsati khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā etenāti dasano, danto. Daṃsadhātu
anya-e0601n:809_3: daṃsane yu. Niggahitalopo. Aviraḷo dasano danto yassāti aviraḷadasano, jino. Aññesañhi
anya-e0601n:809_4: kumbhilānaṃ viya dantā viraḷā honti. Macchamaṃsādīni khādantānaṃ dantantaraṃ pūrati.
anya-e0601n:809_5: Tathāgatassa pana kanakalatāya samussāpitavajira panti viya aviraḷā tulikāya dassitaparicchedā
anya-e0601n:809_6: viya dantā honti, tasmā aviraḷadasanoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:810_0: Mārajussaṅkhapādoti māraji ussaṅkhapādoti padacchedo. Ettha ca mārajīti pañcamārajitavā
anya-e0601n:810_1: buddho kattubhūto. So hi pañcamāre jitavāti mārajīti vuccati. Ussaṅkhapādoti pādassa
anya-e0601n:810_2: upari ṭhitena saṅkhasadisattā saṅkhanāmikena gopphakena samannāgatoti attho. Saṃsuṭṭhuṃ
anya-e0601n:810_3: pathaviṃ khanatīti saṅkhe. Saṃpubbakhanudhātu avadāraṇe kvi. Apadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:810_4: pana “saṃsuṭṭhuṃ khādanto khaṇanto gacchatīti saṅkhe. Samuddajalapariyante caramāno
anya-e0601n:810_5: gacchati caratīti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Saṅkhe viyāti saṅkhe, gopphako. Pādassa uddhaṃ
anya-e0601n:810_6: upari ṭhitaṃ saṅkhasadisaṃ gopphaka massāti ussaṅkhapādo, jino. Vuttañhi brahmāyusuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:810_7: “uddhaṃ patiṭṭhitagopphakattā ussaṅkhā pādā assāti ussaṅkhapādo”ti. Aññesañhi piṭṭhipāde
anya-e0601n:810_8: gopphakā honti. Tena tesaṃ pādā āṇibaddhā viya baddhā honti. Na yathāsukhaṃ parivattanti.
anya-e0601n:810_9: Gacchantānaṃ pādatalāni na dissanti. Tathāgatassa pana abhirūhitvā upari gopphakā
anya-e0601n:810_10: patiṭṭhahanti. Tenassa nābhito paṭṭhāya uparimakāyo nāvāya ṭhapita suvaṇṇapaṭimā
anya-e0601n:810_11: viya niccalo hoti. Adhokāyova iñjati. Sukhena pādā parivattanti. Puratopi pacchato
anya-e0601n:810_12: ubhayapassesupi ṭhatvā passantānaṃ pādatalāni paññāyanti. Na hatthīnaṃ viya pacchatoyevāti.
anya-e0601n:811_0: Tiṭṭhanto nonamantobhayakaramudunā jaṇṇukānāma santoti ettha tiṭṭhanto no namanto
anya-e0601n:811_1: ubhaya karamudunā jaṇṇukāni āmasantoti padavibhāgo. Tiṭṭhantoti ṭhitakova. Nonamantoti
anya-e0601n:811_2: anamamāno hutvā. Ubhaya karamudunāti sukhumena hatthadvayena. Jaṇṇukānīti jaṅghāni.
anya-e0601n:811_3: Jāyati gamanāgamanaṃ anenāti jaṇṇu, janadhātu janane ṇu. Soeva jaṇṇukā, jaṅghorūnaṃ
anya-e0601n:811_4: sandhi labbhati. Tāni. Āmasantoti parimajjituṃ sakkonto. Ettha ca tiṭṭhanto nonamantoti
anya-e0601n:811_5: iminā tathāgatassa akhujjaavāmanabhāvo dīpito. Avasesajanā hi khujjā vā honti vāmanā
anya-e0601n:811_6: vā. Khujjānaṃ uparimakāyo aparipuṇṇo hoti vāmanānaṃ heṭṭhimakāyo. Te aparipuṇṇakāyattā
anya-e0601n:811_7: na sakkonti nonamanto jaṇṇukāni parimajjituṃ. Tathāgato pana paripuṇṇaubhayakāyattā
anya-e0601n:811_8: sakkoti, tasmā tiṭṭhanto…pe… jaṇṇukā nāmasantoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:812_0: Vaṭṭakkhandhoti suvaṇṇāliṅgo viya samavaṭṭitagaliko. Vuttañhi brahmāyusutte “samavaṭṭakkhandho”ti.
anya-e0601n:812_1: Parimaṇḍalā kārena vaṭṭati pavattatīti vaṭṭo, parimaṇḍalo. Vaṭṭadhātu vaṭṭane a.
anya-e0601n:812_2: Bhojanaṃ khādati etena galenāti khandho, galo. Khādadhātu khādane bhakkhane vā kvipaccayo.
anya-e0601n:812_3: Khādāmagamānaṃ khandhandhagandhāti suttena padasiddhi veditabbā. Abhidhānaṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:812_4: pana “kaṃ matthakaṃ dadhātīti kandho. Soeva kakārassa khakārakaraṇavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:812_5: Vaṭṭo samaparimaṇḍalo khandho galo yassāti vaṭṭakkhandho, jino. Yathā hi eke koñcā
anya-e0601n:812_6: viya bakā viya varāhā viya ca dīghagalā vaṅkagalā puthugalā ca honti. Kathanakāle
anya-e0601n:812_7: sirājalaṃ paññāyati. Mando saro nikkhamati, na evaṃ tassa. Tathāgatassa pana suvaṭṭitasuvaṇṇāliṅgasadiso
anya-e0601n:812_8: khandho galo hoti. Kathanakāle sirājalaṃ na paññāyati. Meghassa viya gajjato saro
anya-e0601n:813_0: Puna jinoti buddho kattubhūto. Tassa pana padassa gotaruṇapakhumakotyādīhi padehi
anya-e0601n:813_2: cakkhubhaṇḍo viya vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍo, vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍena samannāgato vā.
anya-e0601n:813_3: Ettha ca pakhumakoti sakalaṃ cakkhubhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ. Cakkhubhaṇḍanti cakkhuparivāraṃ.
anya-e0601n:813_4: Cakkhubhaṇḍanti akkhidalanti keci. Akkhidalapattanti vadanti aññe. Akkhidale hi pana
anya-e0601n:813_5: saddhiṃ akkhibimbanti veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Patati cakkhuṃ parivāreti
anya-e0601n:813_6: etenāti pakhumaṃ, pamhādiparivāraṃ. Patadhātu parivāre umo. Takārassa kho. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:813_7: akkhino pakkhadvaye jātanti pakhumaṃ, pamhaṃ. Jātataddhite umo. Pakkhumanti vattabbe
anya-e0601n:813_8: kakāralopavasena pakhumanti vuccati. Pakhumaṃyeva pakhumako. Gotaruṇassa taṃmuhuttajātarattavacchassa
anya-e0601n:813_9: pakhumaṃ viya pakhumaṃ yassa soti gotaruṇapakhumako, jino. Gotaruṇassa taṃmuhuttajātarattavacchassa
anya-e0601n:813_10: pakhumasadisaṃ vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍaṃ atthīti attho. Aññesañhi akkhibhaṇḍo aparipuṇṇo
anya-e0601n:813_11: hoti. Hatthimūsikakākādīnaṃ akkhisadisehi viniggatehi gambhīrehipi akkhīhi samannāgatā.
anya-e0601n:813_12: Tathāgatassa pana dhovitvā majjitvā ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā viya mudusiniddhanīla sukhumapakhumācitāni
anya-e0601n:814_0: Sīhapubbaḍḍhakāyoti sīhassa pubbaḍḍhakāyo viya paripuṇṇakāyo. Vātātapādiparissayaṃ
anya-e0601n:814_1: sahati khamatīti sīho, sahadhātu khamane a. Īkārāgamo. Atha vā sūkaramahiṃsādayo
anya-e0601n:814_2: satte hiṃsatīti sīho. Hiṃsadhātu hanane ṇa. Hiṃsoti vattabbe akkharavipariyāyena
anya-e0601n:814_3: sīhoti vuccati. Atha vā sabbiriyāpathesu daḷhavīriyattā suṭṭhu īhati vāyamatīti sīho,
anya-e0601n:814_4: kesarasīho. Supubba īhadhātu cetāyaṃ a. Tena vuttaṃ saddanītiyaṃ “sahahiṃsa īhāvasā,
anya-e0601n:814_5: sīhasaddagatiṃ vade”ti. Sīhassa pubbaḍḍhe jāto kāyo viya paripuṇṇakāyo yassāti sīhapubbaḍḍhakāyo,
anya-e0601n:814_6: jino. Yathā hi sīhassa pubbaḍḍhakāyova paripuṇṇo hoti, na evaṃ tassa. Tathāgatassa
anya-e0601n:814_7: pana kāyo sabbaparipuṇṇoti attho. Sīhassa pana purimakāyova paripuṇṇo hoti, pacchima
anya-e0601n:814_8: kāyo aparipuṇṇo. Tathāgatassa pana sīhassa pubbaḍḍhakāyoiva sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo.
anya-e0601n:814_9: Sopi sīhasseva na tattha tattha vinatunnatādivasena dussaṇṭhita visaṇṭhito. Dīghayuttaṭṭhāne
anya-e0601n:814_10: pana dīgho. Rassakisathūla anuvaṭṭitayuttaṭṭhānesu tathāvidhova hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0601n:814_11: “manāpiye ca kho bhikkhave kammavipāke paccupaṭṭhite yehi aṅgehi dīghehi sobhati,
anya-e0601n:814_12: tāni aṅgāni thūlāni saṇṭhahanti. Yehi aṅgehi kisehi sobhati, tāni aṅgāni kisāni saṇṭhahanti.
anya-e0601n:814_13: Yehi aṅgehi vaṭṭehi sobhati, tāni aṅgāni vaṭṭāni saṇṭhahantī”ti. Iti nānācittena
anya-e0601n:814_14: puññacittena cittito dasahi pāramīhi sajjito tathāgatassa attabhāvo tassa loke sabbasippino
anya-e0601n:814_15: vā iddhimanto vā patirūpakampi kātuṃ na sakkonti. Tasmā sīhapubbaḍḍhakāyoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:816_0: 25. Tatiya gāthāyaṃ sugatoti buddho kattubhūto. Tassa pana padassa sattappīnotyādīhi
anya-e0601n:816_1: padehi tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho. Sattappīnoti dvihatthapāda aṃsakūṭa ekagalavasena
anya-e0601n:816_2: sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsikoti attho. Ācariyā pana paripuṇṇadvihatthapāda aṃsakūṭa
anya-e0601n:816_3: khandhasaṅkhātasattaṭṭhānoti atthaṃ vadanti. Maṃsena pīṇati paripūratīti pīno. Pīṇate
anya-e0601n:816_4: paripūrate vā pīno. Pīṇadhātu pīṇane, pūraṇe vā ṇa. Ṇassa no. Dve hatthapiṭṭhiyo
anya-e0601n:816_5: dve pādapiṭṭhiyo dve aṃsakūṭāni ekagalo cāti sattasu ṭhānesu pīno paripuṇṇo maṃso
anya-e0601n:816_6: assāti sattapīno, sugato labbhati. Aññesañhi hatthapādapiṭṭhīsu nhārujālā paññāyanti
anya-e0601n:816_7: aṃsakūṭagalesu aṭṭhikoṭiyo. Te manussā petā viya khāyanti. Na tathāgato. Tathāgato
anya-e0601n:816_8: pana sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussadattā niguḷanhārujālehi hatthapiṭṭhādīhi vaṭṭetvā
anya-e0601n:816_9: ṭhapitasuvaṇṇavaṇṇāliṅgasadisena galena sīlārūpakaṃ viya cittakammarūpakaṃ viya ca
anya-e0601n:817: Brahmāyusutte pana “sattussado”ti pāṭho. Tassa pana sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussadoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:818_0: Dīghaṅgulīti dīghaaṅgulīti padacchedo. Samaāyatahattha pādaṅgulīti attho. Aṅgati
anya-e0601n:818_1: uddhaṃ gacchatīti aṅguli. Aṅgati taṃ taṃ kāyaṅgaṃ parāmasati etāyāti vā aṅguli, karasākhā.
anya-e0601n:818_2: Agidhātu gatiyaṃ ulipaccayo. Atha vā aṅgaṃ kāyaṅgaṃ ulati gacchati parāmasati etāyāti
anya-e0601n:818_3: aṅguli, karasākhā. Aṅga saddūpapadauladhātu gatiyaṃ i. Samadīghā aṅguli hattha pādaṅguli
anya-e0601n:818_4: yassa soti dīghaṅguli, sugato. Samadīghā hatthapādaṅguli atthīti attho. Yathā hi
anya-e0601n:818_5: aññesaṃ kāci aṅguli dīghā hoti kāci rassā, na evaṃ tathāgatassa. Tathāgatassa pana
anya-e0601n:818_6: makkaṭasseva dīghahatthapādaṅguliyo mūle thūlā anupubbena gantvā agge tanukā niyyāsatelena
anya-e0601n:818_7: madditvā vaṭṭitaharitālavaṭṭasadisā honti. Tasmā dīghaṅgulīti thometi. Mathāti maathāti
anya-e0601n:818_8: padacchedo. Makāro hi padasandhikaro. Athāti atthantare nipāto. Tadaññanti attho.
anya-e0601n:819_0: Lomakūpekalomoti lomakūpaekalomoti padacchedo. Ekekalomakūpe ekekajātalomoti attho.
anya-e0601n:819_1: Cammamaṃsaṃ lunāti chindatīti lomo, vaḍḍhamānaṃ lunitabbanti vā lomo, lūdhātu chedane
anya-e0601n:819_2: manipaccayo. Kuvuccati udakaṃ, taṃ pāti rakkhatīti kūpo. Kupubbapādhātu rakkhane
anya-e0601n:819_3: kvi. Ussa dīgho. Kūpo viyāti kūpo, atha vā kuvuccati lomaṃ, taṃ pāti rakkhatīti kūpo.
anya-e0601n:819_4: Abhidhānaṭīkāyaṃ pana “kusadde po. Dīghādi. Kūpo. Kena ubhatīti vā kūpo. Bhassa po”ti
anya-e0601n:819_5: vuttaṃ. Lomassa kūpo lomakūpo. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jāto ekeka lomo yassāti lomakūpekalomo,
anya-e0601n:819_6: sugato. Yathā hi aññesaṃ ekekasmimpi lomakūpe anekāni lomāni jāyanti, na evaṃ tathāgatassa.
anya-e0601n:819_7: Tathāgatassa pana ekekasmiṃ lomakūpe ekekalomo jāyati. Vuttañhi brahmāyusutte “ekekalomo
anya-e0601n:819_8: kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo. Ekekāni lomāni lomakūpesu jātā nī”ti. Tasmā lomakūpekalomoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:820_1: Sampajjatīti sampanno. Saṃpubbapadadhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Tassa anno. Avadāyati avakhaṇḍiyati
anya-e0601n:820_2: aññavaṇṇobhāsanti odāto. Avapubba dādhātu avakhaṇḍane ta. Daṃsati odanādiṃ etāyāti
anya-e0601n:820_3: dāṭho, dantaviseso. Daṃsadhātu daṃsane ṭho. Daṃsissa dā. Sampanno ca odāto ca dāṭho
anya-e0601n:820_4: yassāti sampanno dātadāṭho, sugato. Aññesañhi pūtidantā uṭṭhahanti. Tena kāci dāṭhā
anya-e0601n:820_5: kāḷāpi vivaṇṇāpi honti. Tathāgato pana sukkadāṭho osadhitārakampi atikkamma virocamānāya
anya-e0601n:820_6: pabhāya samannāgatadāṭho hoti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “susukkadāṭho”ti pāṭho. Ayamevattho.
anya-e0601n:821_0: Kanakasamatacoti suvaṇṇena sadisacammo. Kanati dibbati obhāsenāti kanakaṃ. Kaniyati
anya-e0601n:821_1: icchiyati manusse hīti vā kanakaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Kanadhātu dittigatikantīsu akapaccayo,
anya-e0601n:821_2: saṃsadisena amati gacchati pavattatīti samaṃ. Saṃpubbaamadhātu gatiyaṃ a. Tacati
anya-e0601n:821_3: maṃsaṃ chādeti saṃvarati vāti taco, tacati dibbati suvaṇṇobhāsenāti vā taco, cammaṃ.
anya-e0601n:821_4: Tacadhātu saṃvaraṇadittīsu a. Kanakena suvaṇṇena samo sadiso taco yassāti kanaka
anya-e0601n:821_5: samataco, sugato. Yathā hi aññesaṃ taco koci nīlataco setataco pītataco hoti, na
anya-e0601n:821_6: evaṃ tathāgatassa. Tathāgatassa pana jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā nisadāya ghaṃsitvā
anya-e0601n:821_7: gerukaparikammaṃ katvā ṭhapita ghanasuvaṇṇarūpakaṃ viya kañcanasadisataco hoti. Pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:821_8: pana “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco”ti vutto. Ettha ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo
anya-e0601n:821_9: yassāti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, kañcanena sannibhaṃ sadisaṃ tacamassāti kañcanasannibhattacoti
anya-e0601n:821_10: vacanattho kātabbo. Ettha ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇanti iminā tathāgatassa ghanasiniddhasaṇhasarīrataṃ
anya-e0601n:821_11: dasseti. Kañcanasannibhattacoti iminā chavivaṇṇaṃ dasseti. Atha vā vevacanametaṃ
anya-e0601n:822_0: Nīlamuddhaggalomoti nīlaṃ uddhaṃ aggalomoti padacchedo. Nīlaṃ uddhaṃ aggā koṭi hutvā
anya-e0601n:822_1: mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamāno viya ṭhitalomo, nīlāni uddhaṃ aggāni koṭīni hutvā ṭhitāni
anya-e0601n:822_2: lomāni yassāti nīlamuddhaggalomo, sugato. Yathā hi aññesaṃ lomāni heṭṭhā aggāni hutvā
anya-e0601n:822_3: tiṭṭhanti, na evaṃ tathāgatassa. Tathāgatassa pana lomāni āvaṭṭapariyosāne uddhaṃ
anya-e0601n:822_4: aggāni hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamānāni viya tiṭṭhanti. Vuttañhetaṃ brahmāyusutte
anya-e0601n:822_5: “uddhaggalomo bhavaṃ gotamo. Uddhaggāni lomāni jātāni nīlāni añjanavaṇṇāni kuṇḍalāvaṭṭāni
anya-e0601n:823_0: Sambuddhoti tathāgato. So hi anaññabuddho hutvā sāmaṃyeva cattāri saccāni bujjhatīti
anya-e0601n:823_1: sambuddhoti vuccati. Tassa pana padassa thūlajivhotyādīhi tīhi padehi tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:824_0: Thūlajivhoti mududīghaputhula jivhāya sampannoti attho. Gāthābandhavasena hi mududīghasaddalopaṃ
anya-e0601n:824_1: katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mudujivhā dīghā thūlā vaṇṇa sampannā”ti.
anya-e0601n:824_2: Thūlati brūhatīti thūlā, jivhā. Thūladhātu buddhiyaṃ a. Jīvati pāṇaṃ dhāretīti jivhā,
anya-e0601n:824_3: rasanā. Jīvadhātu pāṇadhāraṇe hapaccayo. Jīvanti sattā etena rasenāti jīvitaṃ, chabbidharaso.
anya-e0601n:824_4: Taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā, jivhāpasādarūpaṃ. Sambhārajivhā ṭhānūpacārena labbhati. Jīvitasaddūpapada
anya-e0601n:824_5: avhadhātu avhāyane a. Jīvitaavhāti vattabbe niruttinayena vitasaddalopaṃ katvā jivhāti
anya-e0601n:824_6: vuttaṃ. Thūlā mahantā dīghā mudukā jivhā yassāti thūlajivho, sambuddho. Aññesañhi
anya-e0601n:824_7: jivhā thūlāpi hoti kisāpi rassāpi thaddhāpi visamāpi. Tathāgatassa pana mudujivhā
anya-e0601n:824_8: dīghā puthulā vaṇṇa sampannā hoti. So taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pariyesituṃ āgatānaṃ brahmāyubrāhmaṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:824_9: kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ jivhāya mudukattā taṃ jivhaṃ kathinasūci viya vaṭṭetvā ubhopi
anya-e0601n:824_10: nāsikāsotāni parāmasati, dīghattā ubho kaṇṇasotāni parāmasati, puthulattā kesantapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0601n:824_11: kevalampi nalāṭaṃ paṭicchādeti, evaṃ tassā mududīghaputhulabhāvaṃ pakāsento kaṅkhāvinodeti,
anya-e0601n:824_12: evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ jivhaṃ sandhāya thūla jivhoti thometi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “pahūtajivho”ti pāṭho. Ayamevattho.
anya-e0601n:825_0: Athāti atthantaratthe nipāto. Tadaññanti attho. Sīhahanukoti sīhassa heṭṭhā hanu
anya-e0601n:825_1: viya paripuṇṇa hanuko. Sīhasaddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Hanati odanādīnaṃ vaṇṇavisesaṃ
anya-e0601n:825_2: nāsetīti hanu. Hanadhātu hiṃsāyaṃ u. Sīhassa heṭṭhā hanu viya hanu yassāti sīhahanuko,
anya-e0601n:825_3: sambuddho. Samāsante ko. Sīhassa hi heṭṭhimahanumeva paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, na uparimaṃ.
anya-e0601n:825_4: Tathāgatassa pana sīhassa heṭṭhimaṃ viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyaṃ pakkhassa candasadisāni
anya-e0601n:826_0: Jālikappādahatthoti kusalena vaḍḍhakinā vātapāne sammāyojitajālaṃ viya cammena appaṭibaddhahatthapādaṅgulantaro.
anya-e0601n:826_1: Jalati dibbatīti jālaṃ, jaladhātu dittiyaṃ ṇa. Jālaṃ assa atthi tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti
anya-e0601n:826_2: jālikaṃ, vātapānaṃ. Assathyatthe ṇiko. Atha vā jālaṃ eva jālikaṃ. Pajjati gacchati
anya-e0601n:826_3: etenāti pādo, caraṇo. Padadhātu gamane ṇa. Taṃ taṃ bhāraṃ haratīti hattho, karo.
anya-e0601n:826_4: Haradhātu haraṇe tho. Jālikaṃ viya hatthapādaṅgulantaraṃ yassāti jālikappādahattho,
anya-e0601n:826_5: sambuddho. Kusalena vaḍḍhakinā vātapāne sammāyojitāni jālasadisāni hatthapādaṅgulantarāni
anya-e0601n:826_6: honti. Na ca cammena paṭibaddhaaṅgulantarānīti attho. Ettha jālikappādahatthaṅgulantaranti
anya-e0601n:826_7: vattabbe uttarapadalopena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Cammena paṭibaddhahatthapādaṅgulantaro hi
anya-e0601n:826_8: phaṇahatthako purisadosena upahato pabbajjampi na labhati. Tathāgatassa pana catasso
anya-e0601n:826_9: hatthaṅguliyo pañcapi pādaṅguliyo ekappamāṇā honti. Tāsaṃ ekappamāṇa tāya yavalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:826_10: aññamaññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṭṭhati. Athassa hatthapādā kusalena vaḍḍhakinā sammāyojitajālavāta
anya-e0601n:826_11: pānasadisā honti, tasmā jālikappādahatthoti thometi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “jālahatthapādo”ti pāṭho. Ayamevattho.
anya-e0601n:827_0: Nāthoti buddho kattuvasena. So hi nāthati vineyyānaṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācati, parasantānagataṃ
anya-e0601n:827_1: vā kilesabyasaṃ upatāpeti, paramena cittissariyena samannā gato. Sabbasatte vā guṇehi
anya-e0601n:827_2: īsati abhibhavati, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ vā āsīsatīti nāthoti vuccati. Vuttañhi saddanītiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:827_3: “nāthadhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsisane cāti catūsvatthesu pavattatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:828_0: Tassa pana padassa uṇhīsasīsotipadena tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho. Uṇhīsasīsoti
anya-e0601n:828_1: rañño baddhauṇhīsa paṭṭo viya virocamāno pakatimaṃsapiṇḍasaṅkhāto uṇhīsapaṭṭasīso.
anya-e0601n:828_2: Nalāṭe nahiyati bandhiyatīti uṇhīso. Upubbanahadhātu bandhane, īso. Vaṇṇavikāro.
anya-e0601n:833_0: Tattha ca avijjamānassa āgamā vaṇṇāgamo nāma. Vijjamānaakkharānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyavasena
anya-e0601n:833_1: vaṇṇavipariyāyo nāma. Aññakkharassa aññakkharāpajjanatā vaṇṇavikāro nāma. Vijjamānakkharavināso
anya-e0601n:833_2: vaṇṇavināso nāma. Tattha tattha yathāyogaṃ visesatthayogo dhātūnaṃ atthātisaya yogo
anya-e0601n:833_3: nāmāti adhippāyo. Ettha pana nakārassa ṇakāraṃ katattā vaṇṇavikāroti daṭṭhabbo. Mālādiṃ
anya-e0601n:833_4: siyati bandhiyatīti sīso, uttamaṅgo. Sidhātu bandhane īso. Rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭena
anya-e0601n:833_5: veṭhitasīso viya sīso yassāti uṇhīsasīso. Atha vā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha
anya-e0601n:834_1: dve atthavase paṭicca vuttaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭaṃ
anya-e0601n:834_2: uṭṭhahitvā sakalaṃ nalāṭaṃ chādayamānaṃ pūrayamānaṃ gantvā vāmakaṇṇacūḷikāya patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:834_3: Rañño baddhauṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocati. Pacchimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ kira imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:834_4: viditvā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ akaṃsu. Ayaṃ tāva eko attho. Aññe pana janā aparipuṇṇasīsā
anya-e0601n:834_5: honti. Keci kapisīsā, keci phalasīsā, keci aṭṭhisīsā, keci tumba sīsā, keci pabbhārasīsā.
anya-e0601n:834_6: Tathāgatassa pana āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaṃ viya suparipuṇṇaṃ udakapupphulasadisaṃ
anya-e0601n:834_7: sīsaṃ hoti. Tattha purimanayena uṇhīsaveṭhitasīso viyāti uṇhīsasīso. Dutiyanayena
anya-e0601n:834_8: uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha parimaṇḍala sīsoti uṇhīsasīso”ti. Taṭṭīkāyañca “dve attha
anya-e0601n:834_9: vase paṭicca vuttanti, yasmā buddhā cakkavattino ca paripuṇṇa nalāṭatāya paripuṇṇasīsabimbatāya
anya-e0601n:834_10: uṇhīsasīsāti vuccanti. Tasmā te dve atthavase paṭicca uṇhīsasīsoti vutta”nti vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0601n:835_1: sampannaṃ. Itievaṃ vuttappakāraṃ guṇaṃ itiguṇaṃ. Tena saha ito pattoti itiguṇasahito,
anya-e0601n:835_2: mahesī. Aññe hi dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi sampannā na honti, cakkavattirājāno
anya-e0601n:835_3: mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi sampannāpi ṭhapetvā kosohitavattha guyhalakkhaṇaṃ avasesehi
anya-e0601n:835_4: sampannā honti. Tathāgatoyeva sabbamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato. Tasmā bhagavantaṃyeva
anya-e0601n:835_5: itiguṇasahitanti thomanaṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ mahesinti sīlakkhandhādike ca
anya-e0601n:835_6: nibbānañca esati gavesatīti mahesī. Taṃ mahesiṃ ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:837_0: 23. Ayaṃ pana imāsu tīsu gāthāsu saṅkhepatthayojanā. Buddho kattubhūto nigrodhabimbo
anya-e0601n:837_1: nigrodhassa parimaṇḍalo viya parimaṇḍalasarīro mudukaracaraṇo saṇhahatthapādo, brahmaghoso
anya-e0601n:837_2: brahmuno saro viya aṭṭhaṅgasampannasaravanto, eṇijaṅghā eṇimigassa jaṅghā viya suvaṭṭajāṇuko,
anya-e0601n:837_3: kosacchādaṅgajāto usabhavāraṇā dīnaṃ aṅgajāto viya suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇikasadisena vatthakosena
anya-e0601n:837_4: paṭicchannena guyhaṅgajātena samannāgato, punarapi punaapi, sugato buddho suppatiṭṭhitapādo
anya-e0601n:837_5: suvaṇṇa pādukatalamiva bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitapādo, mūdo dātuṇṇalomo bhamukantare
anya-e0601n:837_6: jāto saṇhasukhumo seto suddho uṇṇalomavanto, athamapi tadaññaṃapi, sugato buddho,
anya-e0601n:837_7: brahmujuggattabhāvo brahmuno ujuuggata attabhāvo viya ujumeva attabhāvo, nīlakkhī
anya-e0601n:837_8: atinīlanettena samannāgato, dīghapaṇhi āyatapaṇhi paripuṇṇapaṇhi vā, sukhumamalachavī
anya-e0601n:837_9: saṇhamalavisuddhataco saṇhamala virahitataco vā, thomyarasaggasaggī thomitabbasattara
anya-e0601n:838_0: 24. Jino pañcamārajitavā buddho, cattālīsaggadanto samacattālīsauttamadanto, samakalapanajo
anya-e0601n:838_1: kakacena chinditvā ṭhapito viya samadanto, antaraṃsappapīno dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:838_3: lakkhita pādatalo, aviraḷadasano avivaradantena sampanno, māraji pañcamārajitavā
anya-e0601n:838_4: buddho, ussaṅkhapādo pādassa upari ṭhitena saṅkhasadisattā saṅkhanāmikena gopphakena
anya-e0601n:838_5: samannāgato, tiṭṭhanto ṭhitakova nonamanto anamamāno hutvā ubhayakaramudunā sukhumena
anya-e0601n:838_6: hatthadvayena jaṇṇukāni jaṅghāni āmasanto parimajjituṃ sakkonto, vaṭṭakkhandho suvaṇṇāliṅgo
anya-e0601n:838_7: viya samavaṭṭitagaliko, gotaruṇa pakhumako taṃmuhuttajātarattavacchassa cakkhubhaṇḍo
anya-e0601n:838_8: viya vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍo, vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍena samannāgato vā, sīhapubbaḍḍhakāyo
anya-e0601n:839_0: 25. Sugato buddho, sattapīno dvihatthapādaaṃsakūṭaekagalavasena sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsiko,
anya-e0601n:839_1: dīghaṅguli samaāyatahatthapādaṅguli, atha tadaññaṃ loma kūpekalomo ekekalomakūpe
anya-e0601n:839_2: ekekajātalomo, sampannodātadāṭho sampannasukkadāṭho, kanaka samataco suvaṇṇena sadisacammo
anya-e0601n:839_3: nīlamuddhaggalomo nīlaṃ uddhaṃ aggā koṭi hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamāno viya ṭhitalomo,
anya-e0601n:839_4: sambuddho tathāgato, thūlajivho mududīghaputhulajivhāya sampanno, atha tadaññaṃ,
anya-e0601n:839_5: sīhahanuko sīhassa heṭṭhāhanu viya paripuṇṇahanuko, jālikappāda hattho kusalena vaḍḍhakinā
anya-e0601n:839_6: vātapāne sammāyojita jālaṃ viya cammena appaṭibaddhahatthapādaṅgulantaro, nātho buddho,
anya-e0601n:839_7: uṇhīsasīso rañño uṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocamāno pakatimaṃsapiṇḍasaṅkhāto uṇhīsapaṭṭasīso,
anya-e0601n:839_8: iti guṇasahitaṃ evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaguṇena samannāgataṃ
anya-e0601n:839_9: taṃ mahesiṃ buddhaṃ tīhi dvārehi ahaṃ namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:841_0: Imissaṃ pana namakkārapāḷiyaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ buddhavacanapāḷiyaṃ āgatanayānukkamena
anya-e0601n:841_1: na vuttaṃ. Gāthābandhavasena chandānurakkhaṇatthameva pana nigrodhabimbotyādinā akkamena
anya-e0601n:841_2: vuttaṃ. Tasmā pātheyyavagge lakkhaṇasutte vuttaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇakkamaṃ
anya-e0601n:843_0: . Buddho suppatiṭṭhitapādo 2. heṭṭhāpādatalesu cakkajāto 3. āyatapaṇhi 4. dīghaṅguli
anya-e0601n:843_1: 5. mudutaluna hatthapādo 6. jālahatthapādo 7. ussaṅkhapādo 8. eṇijaṅgho 9. ṭhitakova

anya-e0601n:843_6: 25. aviraḷadanto 26. susukkadāṭho 27. pahuta jivho 28. brahmasaro 29. abhinīlanetto
anya-e0601n:843_7: 30. gopa khumo 31. uṇṇā bhamukantare jātā odātā mudutūla sannibhā 32. uṇhīsasīsoti
anya-e0601n:843_8: dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇassa kamo veditabbo. Imāni pana bhagavato dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0601n:843_9: pāramīpuññakammena yathārahaṃ kammasarikkhakaṃ labbhantīti veditabbāni. Tāni pana
